RECORD.lx: The cruel man abandoned his wife and child./r/n 那个狠心的男人抛弃了他的妻儿。/r/n They had abandoned all hope./r/n 他们已经放弃了一切希望。/r/n

Scratch the subject of defence and acronym, abbreviation, and buzzwords fly out./r/n 话题触及国防，缩合字，缩写字和行话就满天飞。/r/n An abbreviation for formula calculation language, a high-level programming language not too widely used./r/n 公式计算语言的简称，应用不太广泛的一种高级程序设计语言。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．腹，下腹（胸部到腿部的部份）
RECORD.lx: The spider has a bulgy abdomen./r/n 蜘蛛长着凸出的腹部。/r/n He always feels pain in his abdomen./r/n 他的腹部经常疼痛。/r/n
Everyone must abide by the law./r/n 所有的人都应遵守法律。/r/n She can't abide that man./r/n 她不能忍受那个人。/r/n
The weather is abnormal this year./r/n 今年的气候不正常。/r/n An abnormal fear of high places./r/n 恐高症对于高处的一种不正常的恐惧/r/n

An Australian aboriginal dance festival held at night to celebrate tribal victories or other events./r 狂欢会澳大利亚土著的一种舞蹈节，在晚上召开以庆祝部落胜利或其他事件/r Any of the languages of the aboriginal peoples of Australia./ 澳洲土著语任何澳洲土著民族的语言
Tropical plants abound in the jungle. 丛林中有大量的热带植物。 He abounds in courage. 他很有胆量。

An implement with cutting edges or a pointed end for boring holes in hard materials, usually by a rotating abrasion or repeated blows; a bit./r/n 钻带切割刃或尖端的工具，用于在坚硬材料上钻孔，一般靠旋转磨损或反复击打实现钻孔/r/n A minor scratch or abrasion./r/n 擦伤一个轻微的擦伤或磨损/r/n
It was abridged from the original work./r/n 这是原书的节录本。/r/n This is an abridged edition of "war and peace"./r/n 这是“战争与和平”的节略版。/r/n
He has some abstract notion of wanting to change the world./r/n 他有一种要改造世界的空想。/r/n We may talk of beautiful things, but beauty itself is abstract./r/n 我们尽可谈论美的事物，然而美本身却是抽象的。/r/n
What an absurd suggestion!/r/n 多荒谬的建议啊！/r/n It was absurd of you to suggest such a thing./r/n 你居然建议这样的事，太可笑了。/r/n
There was an abundance of corn last year./r/n 去年玉米丰收。/r/n The state of being profuse; abundance./r/n 丰富极其丰富的状态；充沛/r/n
It's easy to abuse one's power./r/n 人容易滥用权力。/r/n They talked about how the uses and abuses of figures to prove things in politics./r/n 他们谈到人们如何在政治问题上使用及滥用数字来混淆视听。/r/n
The car accelerated as it overtook me./r/n 那辆汽车一加速就超越了我./r/n The leader is losing ground as the rest of the runners accelerate./r/n 领先者在其余赛跑者加速时就逐渐失去了优势。/r/n
The tight jumper only accentuated his fat stomach./r/n 那件紧身套头毛衣反更突出了他那肥胖的肚子./r/n
Citizens may have free access to the library./r/n 市民可以免费使用这个图书馆。/r/n He is a man of easy access./r/n 他是一个很好接近的人。/r/n
A manager should be accessible to his staff./r/n 一个管理人员应该让职员感到平易近人。/r/n This island is accessible only by boat./r/n 这个小岛只能坐小船去。/r/n
Our meeting was quite accidental./r/n 我们的相遇是很偶然的。/r/n A sequence of events that although accidental seems to have been planned or arranged./r/n 巧合，凑巧虽是偶然的，但似乎是经计划或安排的一系列事件/r/n

Acclaim or praise for exceptional achievement./r/n 名声，威信对杰出成就所作的称赞或颂扬/r/n A person of remarkable talent or ability who achieves great success or acclaim at an early age./r/n 少年得志因早年具有非凡的才智和能力而获得极大成功或受到称赞的人/r/n
He was accorded a warm welcome./r/n 他受到热烈的欢迎。/r/n He joined the army of his own accord./r/n 他自愿参军。/r/n

By investing wisely she accumulated a fortune./r/n 她由于投资精明而积蓄了一笔财产。/r/n However, as the evidence began to accumulate, experts from the zoo felt obliged to investigate./r/n 然而，当证据日趋增多时，该动物园的专家们感到有必要进行调查。/r/n
Opened the show with an acoustic set./r/n 不用电子乐器开始演出/r/n An acoustic instrument./r/n 非电传音乐器/r/n

The acoustics of the hall are so good that you can hear everything even from the cheapest seats./r/n 这座会堂的音响效果极佳，连最便宜的座位也能听得一清二楚。/r/n German physicist noted for his contributions to mathematics, acoustics, and the measurement of electrical resistance./r/n 欧姆，格奥尔格·西蒙1789－1854德国物理学家，因其对于数学、声学和电阻测量做出的贡献而著名/r/n
I have a slight acquaintance with Japanese./r/n 我略通日文。/r/n He is my acquaintance./r/n 他是我的熟人。/r/n
The audience held its/their breath as the acrobat walked along the tightrope./r/n 杂技演员在钢丝绳上表演时，观众们屏息观看。/r/n One that tumbles, especially an acrobat or a gymnast./r/n 翻筋斗者翻滚者，尤指杂技演员或体操运动员/r/n

Scratch the subject of defence and acronym, abbreviation, and buzzwords fly out./r/n 话题触及国防，缩合字，缩写字和行话就满天飞。/r/n Refers to push-down stack procedures and is the acronym for last in/first out, a buffer procedure./r/n 一种把数据压入堆栈的过程，即数据缓冲的过程。LastIn／FirstOut的缩写。/r/n

I think if you flip the blue switch near the bottom it will activate the air conditioner./r/n 我想，如果你把下方的蓝色开关轻轻地推上，冷气就会出来了。/r/n Select it to activate the slider bar on the right, then use the leave and right arrows to adjust the volume./r/n 使用时先选择该项，激活右边的滑动条，然后用左箭头或右箭头来进行音量调整。/r/n
This area has an acute shortage of water./r/n 这个地方缺水严重。/r/n We agreed with his acute analysis of the political situation./r/n 我们都同意他对政治形势的深刻分析。/r/n
An addiction, especially to a narcotic drug./r/n 上瘾上瘾，特别是对毒品上瘾/r/n His addiction to drugs propelled him towards a life of crime./r/n 他吸毒成瘾使他走上了犯罪的道路。/r/n
My teacher is adept at designing robots./r/n 我的老师对设计机器人是个内行。/r/n Helen is adept in music and her husband is adept in drawing./r/n 海伦精通音乐，而她的丈夫擅长绘画。/r/n
We should adhere to our opinions./r/n 我们应当坚持我们的意见。/r/n Paste is used to make one surface adhere to another./r/n 糨糊是用于使一个接触面粘住另一个接触面的。/r/n
His house is adjacent to mine./r/n 他的寓所与我的相毗连。/r/n An edge and the area immediately adjacent to it; a border./r/n 边缘，边界边和邻近的区域；边界/r/n
As they had no children of their own, they adopted an orphan./r/n 他们没有亲生儿女，就收养了一个孤儿。/r/n Most countries adopt metric system./r/n 大多数国家采用米制。/r/n
The boys adore their mothers./r/n 男孩们敬慕他们的母亲。/r/n All the girls in our school adore the handsome mathematics teacher who happens to be a bachelor./r/n 我们学校里所有女孩子都崇拜那个恰巧是单身汉的英俊数学老师。/r/n
Since the advent of atomic power, there have been great changes in industry./r/n 自从原子动力问世以后，工业发生了巨大的变化。/r/n The advent of the computer changed people's life greatly./r/n 计算机的出现极大地改变了人们的生活。/r/n
It is deemed advisable./r/n 这认为是可取的./r/n It will not be advisable so pack this course into your already busy schedule./r/n 把这门课硬排进你本来已经很紧的计划是不明智的。/r/n

Shops not only by running special advisory services for novices, but by offering consumers bits and pieces which they can assemble at home./r/n 商店不仅为新手经营专门的咨询服务，而且为消费者提供可以在家里组装的零件。/r/n A governing, advisory, or disciplinary body of some colleges and universities composed of faculty members and sometimes student representatives./r/n 大学评议会某些学院和大学中由全体教员及有学衔的行政人员，有时还有学生代表，组成的管理，顾问，或纪律机构/r/n
The climate affected his health./r/n 气候影响了他的健康。/r/n It is said that the rhythm of tides is affected by the moon./r/n 据说潮汐的涨落受月亮的影响。/r/n
Every mother has affection for her children./r/n 每个母亲都爱她的孩子。/r/n He is held in affection./r/n 他极为大家所爱戴。/r/n

An affirmative statement or vote./r/n 肯定的陈述肯定的陈述或表示赞成/r/n A figure of speech consisting of an understatement in which an affirmative is expressed by negating its opposite, as in This is no small problem./r/n 间接肯定法用有节制的陈述所构成一种修辞手法，即通过否定其反面来表达肯定的意思，例如在这并不是一个小问题中/r/n
Could you run (me) off twenty copies of the agenda?/r/n 你把议事日程表给（我）复印二十份好吗?/r/n This agenda will form the basis of our next meeting./r/n 本议程将成为下次会议的中心议题./r/n
The lack of rain aggravated the already serious shortage of food./r/n 干旱少雨使原本就很严重的粮食短缺问题更加严重。/r/n Don't aggravate me, child./r/n 孩子，不要惹我生气。/r/n
The television audience aggregated 30 millions./r/n 电视观众合计达3000万人./r/n Our team scored the most goals on aggregate./r/n 整个来说, 我们队得分最多./r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj．好斗的，进取的ag（一再）＋gress（走）＋ive→一再走→进取的
RECORD.lx: He is an aggressive man./r/n 他是一个好斗的人。/r/n A successful businessman must be aggressive./r/n 一个成功的商人必须有进取心。/r/n
He was in a state of great agitation./r/n 他处于异常焦虑的状态。/r/n The agitation of the strike arose repeatedly./r/n 罢工风潮迭起。/r/n
He was in an agony of remorse./r/n 他处于悔恨的海洋中。/r/n The boxer folded up in agony./r/n 那拳击手痛苦地倒下了./r/n
We are in agreement with their decision./r/n 我们同意他们的决定。/r/n Finally we reached an agreement./r/n 我们最终达成了协议。/r/n
What ailment is on you?/r/n 你有什么病?/r/n He's prone to minor ailments./r/n 他动不动就生点小病。/r/n
Mick Clark, alias Sid Brown, is wanted for questioning by the police./r/n 米克·克拉克, 又名锡德·布朗, 被警方通缉审问./r/n The criminal Mick Clark has/uses several aliases./r/n 那个叫米克·克拉克的罪犯有[使用]好几个化名./r/n

You surely won't print (ie publish, esp in a newspaper) such a scandalous allegation./r/n 你绝不会让这种造谣中伤的言论披露见报的吧./r/n Formal reply to an allegation make in court, especially defence make by a respondent to a divorce petition/r/n 答辩状，对在法庭所作断言的答复，尤指被告对离婚起诉的抗辩。/r/n
The soldiers swore allegiance to their motherland./r/n 士兵们宣誓效忠于他们的祖国。/r/n Steadfast in allegiance to one's homeland, government, or sovereign./r/n 忠心的对自己的祖国，政府或主权无限忠诚的/r/n
An allergy to cocktail parties./r/n 对鸡尾酒会的厌恶/r/n Constantly blowing his nose in allergy season./r/n 在过敏的季节不断地擤他的鼻子/r/n
Allergic children; highly allergic to penicillin./r/n 过敏的儿童；对青霉素高度过敏/r/n Ben is allergic to pollen./r/n 班对花粉过敏。/r/n
The doctor gave her an injection to alleviate the pain./r/n 医生给她注射以减轻疼痛./r/n They alleviated the boredom of waiting by singing songs./r/n 他们以唱歌来减轻等候的厌烦./r/n
We tried one idea after the other, but they all seemed to be leading to blind alleys./r/n 我们想了一个又一个主意，但它们似乎都行不通。/r/n This business is right up my alley./r/n 这种事情正是我熟悉的。/r/n

We've spent our entire allocation for the year./r/n 我们已经把今年拨给我们的全部经费都花光了./r/n Austrian-born British economist. He shared a1974 Nobel Prize for work on the theory of optimum allocation of resources./r/n 海克，弗雷德里希·奥古斯特·冯生于1899出生于奥地利的英国经济学家，因在能源最佳配置理论方面的研究而获1974年诺贝尔奖/r/n
Brass is an alloy of copper and zinc./r/n 黄铜是铜和锌的合金。/r/n Ornaments, objects, or utensils made of this alloy./r/n 黄铜制品用这种合金制的装饰品、物件或器皿/r/n
That football team is our ally./r/n 那个足球队是我们的同盟者。/r/n Britain was an ally of America in the World War I./r/n 英国在第一次世界大战中是美国的同盟国。/r/n
There have been a few alterations to the timetable./r/n 时间表上有一些变动。/r/n My coat needs alteration./r/n 我的上衣需要改改。/r/n

Wrapping aluminium foil round a joint allows the meat to cook in its own juice/juices./r/n 用铝箔把肉包住使之在原汁中烹制./r/n By mixing aluminium with other metals, scientists have been able to produce a variety of alloys, some of which have the strength of steel but weigh only one third as much./r/n 把铝和其他金属混合，科学家们能够制造出各种合金，其中一些具有钢一样的强度，但其重量只是钢的三分之一。/r/n
That which is gathered or amassed; a collection or an accumulation./r/n 收集物被收集或聚集的东西；一种收集物或获得物/r/n He is planed to amass a fortune for a rainy day./r/n 他正打算积蓄财富以备不时之需。/r/n
He give us an ambiguous answer./r/n 他给了我们一个模棱两可的答复。/r/n An intentionally noncommittal or ambiguous statement./r/n 暧昧的回答，故意的不信任故意说得模棱两可的话，不明确的话/r/n
A state of ambiguity or obscurity./r/n 含糊不清或者晦涩的状态/r/n Signal which prevents accidental operation by spurious signals or avoids possible ambiguity./r/n 防止假信号的意外作用或者避免二义性而设置的信号。/r/n
This case is not amenable to the normal rules./r/n 这件事经不起常规的检验./r/n
That representative brought forth an amendment to the press law./r/n 那位代表提出了一项对新闻法的修正案。/r/n The amendment is an appendage of that contract./r/n 这个修改是那个合同的附件。/r/n
He is an amiable person./r/n 他是个可亲的人。/r/n Do you really want to go or are you merely being amiable?/r/n 你是真想去呢，还是仅仅为了表示友好？/r/n
We have ample time./r/n 我们有充足的时间。/r/n The house has an ample parlor./r/n 这座房子有宽敞的客厅。/r/n

A figure of a head worn by actors in Greek and Roman drama to identify a character or trait and to amplify the voice./r/n 面具古希腊和罗马的戏剧演员佩戴的人物面具或头部面具，用以标明戏中人物性格或品质，同时扩大声音/r/n Any of several devices that convert incident electromagnetic radiation of mixed frequencies to one or more discrete frequencies of highly amplified and coherent ultraviolet, visible, or infrared radiation./r/n 激光器使偶然的混杂频率的电磁辐射，变为一个或更多的高度强化和连续的紫外线、可见光或红外线辐射的分离频率仪器中的一种/r/n
Her arm is so badly injured they will have to amputate (it)./r/n 她的胳膊伤势严重, 他们不得不锯掉（它）./r/n Her leg was so badly damaged that the doctors had to amputate./r/n 她的那条腿伤得很厉害，医师只得将其截除。/r/n
Aspirin is a mild analgesic./r/n 阿司匹林是药性平和的止痛药./r/n An agent, such as an analgesic drug, that relieves pain./r/n 镇痛剂一种药剂，如止痛药，减轻疼痛/r/n

It is not always reliable to argue by analogy./r/n 用类推法论证并不总是可靠的。/r/n Other executives think the Japanese influence will be less dramatic and dismiss the automobile analogy, saying that manufacturing cars is a far cry from the creative nature of Hollywood's endeavors./r/n 其他高级职员认为日本的影响不会那么大，认为不能与汽车相提并论。他们说制造汽车与好莱坞的创造性企业截然不同。/r/n
He told me some anecdote about our English teacher./r/n 他告诉我几个关于英语老师的掌故。/r/n
A gaseous anesthetic, such as nitrous oxide./r/n 气体麻醉剂一种气态的麻醉剂，如二氧化氮/r/n
The child was badly hurt and was in anguish all the evening./r/n 这个孩子受了重伤，整夜都在痛苦之中。/r/n Physical disability causes mental anguish./r/n 生理伤残会引起心理苦闷./r/n
We could see how excited he was by the animation in his face./r/n 我们从他脸上的神气就能看出他多麽兴奋。/r/n Lacking animation, variety, or distinction; dull./r/n 无精打彩的，乏味的缺少生气、变化或差别的；乏味的/r/n
He hurt his left ankle in the broad jump./r/n 他跳远时扭伤了左踝。/r/n She broke her ankle weeks ago and it's still in plaster./r/n 她的踝关节数周前骨折, 至今仍打著石膏./r/n
Radio communication has annihilated space./r/n 无线电通讯已消除了空间的阻隔。/r/n The invasion force was annihilated./r/n 侵略军被消灭了。/r/n
Some people annotate as they read./r/n 有的人一面读书一面做注解。/r/n
An anonymous poet who flourished in the tenth century; painted when Impressionism was flourishing./r/n 一位活跃在10世纪的无名诗人；在印象主义最蓬勃的时期作画/r/n The author chooses to remain anonymous./r/n 作者愿不署名./r/n
You could sense the antagonism between them./r/n 你能觉察出他们之间有对立情绪./r/n The antagonism he felt towards his old enemy was still very strong./r/n 他对旧冤家的敌对情绪仍然很大./r/n

A sparrow fluttering about the church is an antagonist which the most profound theologian in Europe is wholly unable to overcome./r/n 在教堂附近飞来飞去的麻雀，是为欧洲学识最深的神学家们完全无法克服的敌手。/r/n I am bound to furnish my antagonists with arguments, but not with comprehension./r/n 我一定要向对手提供争论点，但并无予以理解的必要。/r/n
You should fix the television antenna before receiving programs./r/n 接收节目前，你应该先装天线。/r/n Extended the radio antenna./r/n 把收音机的天线拉到最长/r/n
Anthems are often with words taken from the Bible./r/n 圣歌的歌词多取自于《圣经》。/r/n The town band led off by playing the national anthem./r/n 市乐队以国歌开始他们的演奏。/r/n
The anthology reveals a prejudice in favour of lyric poets./r/n 这部选集显示出对抒情诗人有所偏爱./r/n Something, such as a set of data, a report, or an anthology, that is compiled./r/n 汇编指编辑好的一套数据、一篇报道或一部选集/r/n

One of my friends majored in anthropology in a university in Illinois./r/n 我的一个朋友在伊利诺斯州的一所大学学习人类学。/r/n Either of two basic units in cultural anthropology that make up a tribe on the basis of unilateral descent./r/n 一个分支在文化人类学中，在单系血统基础上构成一个部落的两个基本的部落分支的任意一个/r/n
Antibiotic can be used against infection./r/n 抗菌素可以用来防止感染。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．抗体（身体中的抗病物质）
RECORD.lx: Relating to the correspondence between an antigen and the antibody produced in response to it./r/n 同源的与抗原和对其反应产生的抗体同的对应现象有关的/r/n A substance, such as an antibody, capable of dissolving or destroying cells./r/n 细胞溶素一种能溶解或破坏细胞的物质，如抗体/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．抗原（注射于动物体内，能使之产生抗体的物质）
RECORD.lx: A protein substance produced in the blood or tissues in response to a specific antigen, such as a bacterium or a toxin. Antibodies destroy or weaken bacteria and neutralize organic poisons, thus forming the basis of immunity./r/n 抗体，免疫体血液或组织针对某种抗原如细菌或毒素而产生的蛋白质物质。抗体消灭细菌或削弱其作用，中和有机毒素，因而形成免疫力/r/n Relating to the correspondence between an antigen and the antibody produced in response to it./r/n 同源的与抗原和对其反应产生的抗体同的对应现象有关的/r/n
In business, you've got to anticipate how your competitors will act./r/n 在生意上，你必须事先估计到你的竞争对手会如何行动。/r/n It is unwise to anticipate your earnings by spending a lot of money./r/n 大量花钱提前使用自己的收入是不明智的。/r/n
Do you have any antidote for a snakebite?/r/n 你有治疗毒蛇咬伤的解毒药吗？/r/n An antidote against poison, especially a confection formerly held to be an antidote to all poisons./r/n 解毒药解除毒性的解毒剂，尤指用来对付一切毒药的解毒膏/r/n
Carbolic acid can be used to make antiseptic./r/n 石炭酸可用来做防腐剂。/r/n She gargle with an antiseptic mouthwash./r/n 她用具有消毒灭菌作用的漱口剂来清洁口腔。/r/n
The aperture in the door is so wide./r/n 门上的孔隙太大了。/r/n What aperture are you using?/r/n 你使用多大的光圈?/r/n

Your allegations are completely untrue, and I demand an immediate apology./r/n 你的说法完全不真实，我要求立即道歉。/r/n The Finance Director sends her apology and is unable to attend the meeting./r/n 财务董事派人带话说，她因不能出席会议而向大家道歉。/r/n

Recognizing who the customer was, the manager was most apologetic and reprimanded the assistant severely./r/n 经理认出顾客是谁，所以赔了一千个不是，并狠狠地斥责了店员。/r/n The chairman led in with some apologetic remarks./r/n 会议主席一上来就说了几句抱歉的话。/r/n
The prospect of another war appalled us./r/n 想到有可能发生另一场战争，我们不寒而栗。/r/n We were appalled when we heard that the chairman had been murdered./r/n 听说主席被谋杀，我们都吓坏了。/r/n
Nothing can extenuate such appalling behavior./r/n 这种骇人听闻的行径罪不可恕。/r/n Nothing can extenuate such appalling behaviour./r/n 这种骇人听闻的行径罪无可恕./r/n
He was appealing for funds to build a new school./r/n 他在恳求拨款修建一所新学校。/r/n She appealed to the high court against her sentence./r/n 她不服判决而向高等法院上诉。/r/n
She is suffering from lack of appetite./r/n 她食欲不振。/r/n The long walk gave him a good appetite./r/n 长时间的走路使他食欲旺盛。/r/n
Applicable to or characteristic of attorneys or their profession./r/n 律师的适用于律师或律师行业的，律师或律师行业的特点的/r/n Above rate applicable until further notice./r/n 除非另有通知，上述运费率适用。/r/n
A fracture or crack in a rock mass along which no appreciable movement has occurred./r/n 裂缝，裂口岩石块中的碎片或缝隙，在其周围未发生过可被觉察到的运动/r/n Appreciable changes in temperature./r/n 可察觉到的温度上的变化/r/n
He felt some apprehension over the result./r/n 他对结果有点担心。/r/n We waited for their decision with a great deal of apprehension./r/n 我们怀着极其焦虑的心情等待他们作出决定。/r/n
Plain, simple clothes are appropriate for school wear./r/n 简单朴素的衣服适合在学校里穿。/r/n The minister was found to have appropriated government money./r/n 部长被查出挪用了公款。/r/n
Your guess only approximates to the facts./r/n 你的猜测仅仅是接近事实。/r/n The color of the curtains approximates that of the rug./r/n 窗帘的颜色和地毯相近。/r/n
My apron is so dirty that I have to wash it./r/n 我的围裙太脏了，我不得不洗它。/r/n Could you tie this apron round me?/r/n 你受累把围裙给我系上行吗?/r/n

Aquatic animals that live in the substrate of a body of water, especially in a soft sea bottom./r/n 底内动物生活在水体底部的水生动物，尤指栖于松软海底的水生动物/r/n An air-filled sac or structure that aids in the flotation of an aquatic organism./r/n 气囊水生动植物器官中用来帮助飘浮用的充满气体的囊或结构/r/n
The choice of players for the team seems completely arbitrary./r/n 对队员的挑选似乎完全是主观决定的。/r/n Most presidents in this African country are arbitrary rulers./r/n 这个非洲国家的总统大多数是专横的统治者。/r/n
My leader asked to find him an ancient document in the archives./r/n 我的上级要我给他在档案里找一份老掉牙的文件。/r/n The company's archives goes back to its foundation in1892./r/n 该公司的档案可追溯至其创建的1892年。/r/n
I am an ardent supporter of the local football team./r/n 我是本地足球队的球迷。/r/n She was ardent in her admiration of the artist./r/n 她非常倾慕那位艺术家。/r/n
It's an arduous task./r/n 这是一项艰巨的任务。/r/n He mastered these words through the arduous consultation of the dictionary./r/n 通过勤查字典，他掌握了这些单词。/r/n
She entered the political arena after her husband's death./r/n 她丈夫死后，她进入了政界。/r/n The Roman arena was very famous./r/n 罗马竞技场是很出名的。/r/n
The little boy was not good at arithmetic./r/n 这个小男孩算术不太好。/r/n I'm good at history but not so hot at arithmetic./r/n 我的历史成绩不错, 但算术不太好./r/n
He is an arrogant man./r/n 他是一个自高自大的人。/r/n He often speaks in an arrogant tone./r/n 他经常以一种傲慢的口气说话。/r/n
Gout is a form of arthritis./r/n 痛风是关节炎的一种。/r/n She was plagued with arthritis./r/n 她患关节炎十分痛苦./r/n
She's unusually articulate for a ten-year-old./r/n 作为一个十岁的孩子来说，她的表达力是非常强的。/r/n I'm a little deaf, please articulate your words carefully./r/n 我有些耳聋，请把话仔细地说清楚。/r/n
Artillery fire caused heavy loss./r/n 炮火造成重大损失。/r/n The artillery did great execution./r/n 这种大炮的威力很大。/r/n
The airplane ascended higher and higher./r/n 飞机渐渐升高。/r/n The point of greatest intensity or force in an ascending series or progression; a culmination./r/n 顶点，最高点在上升的序列或过程中达到的最大强度或力量；极点/r/n
Who was the first man to make an ascent in a balloon?/r/n 第一个乘气球升空的人是谁?/r/n The last part of the ascent is very steep./r/n 最后一段上坡路很陡。/r/n
The detective was trying to ascertain exactly who was at the party./r/n 这个侦探试图查明都有谁参加了聚会。/r/n I ascertain that he was murdered./r/n 我确定他是被谋杀的。/r/n
An aseptic smile./r/n 漠然的微笑/r/n
She was filled with the aspiration to succeed in life./r/n 她渴望有所成就。/r/n The generalship was his aspiration./r/n 将官之职位是他梦寐以求的目标。/r/n
They made an assault on the enemy's position./r/n 他们突袭敌人的阵地。/r/n Six women have been sexually assaulted in the area recently./r/n 最近这一带有六个女子遭受强奸猥亵。/r/n
She asserted that he was innocent./r/n 她断言，他是无罪的。/r/n We encouraged him to assert his view of the matter./r/n 我们鼓励他坚持自己对此事的看法。/r/n
The firm has an important asset in the person of the director of research./r/n 公司有一巨大财富，就是研究部主任这个人。/r/n The tennis player's speed is his great asset./r/n 那个网球运动员动作迅速, 这是他的一大优势./r/n
The USA has assimilated people from many different countries./r/n 美国已经同化了许多来自不同国家的人。/r/n Some foods are assimilated more easily than others./r/n 有些食物比另一些食物容易吸收。/r/n
She positively assured me that it was true./r/n 她向我明确地保证那是事实./r/n Having or showing confidence; assured./r/n 有信心的，显示信心的；确定的/r/n
They were waiting with assurance for me to discover the truth for myself./r/n 他们自信地等待我自己发现事实真相。/r/n Marked by assurance, as of success./r/n 以确信为特征的，如对成功的确信/r/n
It is an astute move to sell just before price goes down./r/n 正好在价格下跌前脱手，真是精明之举。/r/n He is astute in business./r/n 他做生意精明。/r/n
Here is an asylum for the care of mentally ill or destitute people./r/n 这儿是一家精神病院。/r/n The people ask for political asylum./r/n 人们请求政治避难。/r/n
The atlas contains forty maps./r/n 这个地图集有四十幅地图。/r/n The atlas was published by our company./r/n 这个地图集是由我们公司出版的。/r/n
He is attentive to his little brother./r/n 他很关心他的小弟弟。/r/n You should be attentive to what your parents have said./r/n 你应该注意倾听父母所说的话。/r/n
He was selected as the district attorney./r/n 他被选为地方检察官。/r/n The attorney argue that the decision involve prejudice to his client./r/n 律师论辨说这一裁决侵害了他的委托人。/r/n
They attribute their success to their teacher's encouragement./r/n 他们把成功归因于老师的鼓励。/r/n The sword is an attribute of a fighter./r/n 剑是斗士的象征。/r/n
We will put the car up for auction./r/n 我们将把这辆小车拍卖。/r/n The car is sold by auction./r/n 这辆小车被拍卖了。/r/n
I'm going to the audition but I don't expect I'll get a part./r/n 我去试音, 可并不指望会给我个角色演出./r/n None of the actresses we've auditioned is suitable./r/n 我们试听的这些女演员都不合适./r/n

As usual, the yearly audit will take place in December./r/n 跟往常一样，年度审计将在十二月份进行。/r/n Don't let that firm handle your auditing; they made a complete balls-up of ours./r/n 不要让那家公司来处理你的帐目，他们把我们的帐弄得一塌糊涂。/r/n
He augments his income by teaching in the evenings./r/n 他晚上去教书以增加收入。/r/n Having the ability or tendency to augment./r/n 有增加或扩大作用的具有增加的能力或趋势的/r/n
Is that an authentic painting or a copy?/r/n 那幅画是原作还是复制品？/r/n Not genuine or authentic./r/n 不真的，不可靠的/r/n
This is an authoritative order./r/n 这是一个必须服从的命令。/r/n Don't speak in an authoritative tone./r/n 不要用一种命令的口吻说话。/r/n
He confidentially authorized me to act for him while he was abroad./r/n 他信任地委托我在他出国期间代行他的职务。/r/n I've been authorized by the court to repossess this property./r/n 我得到法庭认可重新拥有这笔财产。/r/n

May I see your authorization for this?/r/n 我可以看看你做这件事的授权书吗?/r/n An official authorization appended to a passport, permitting entry into and travel within a particular country or region./r/n 签证附加于护照的一种官方认可，允许进入和在某一特定的国家或地区内旅游/r/n
The separatist is demanding full autonomy for their state./r/n 分裂主义者在要求他们的州完全自治。/r/n If we decentralize, the provinces will have more autonomy./r/n 我们把权力下放, 各省就有更多的自主权./r/n
We have an auxiliary generator in case of power cuts./r/n 我们有一台万一断电时使用的备用发电机。/r/n She is an auxiliary nurse./r/n 她是一名助理护士。/r/n
What a precarious situation we were in when the avalanche started!/r/n 雪崩发生的时候我们的处境多么危险啊！/r/n He was buried by an avalanche and had to be dug out./r/n 他遇雪崩被埋住了，得把他挖出来。/r/n
She averted her eyes from the terrible sight./r/n 她转移目光不看那可怕的情景。/r/n He managed to avert suspicion./r/n 他设法避嫌。/r/n
The children stared at the teacher with awe./r/n 孩子很敬畏地凝视着老师。/r/n The silence awed the boy./r/n 寂静使这个小男孩害怕了。/r/n

Does the earth rotate on an axis?/r/n 地球是绕轴旋转的吗？/r/n In computer graphics, turning all or part of a display image180 degrees about an axis in the plane of the display surface./r/n 在计算机制图技术中，显示图象的全部或一部分对显示面所在平面中某个轴线翻转180度的处理方法。/r/n
The baby babbled for hours./r/n 那婴孩呀呀学语了好几个小时。/r/n No one could understand the little baby's babble./r/n 没人能听懂这个小婴孩的话。/r/n
I saved my bacon by arriving just in time for the meeting./r/n 我刚好及时到会，才算没受责备。/r/n The bacon is all frizzled up!/r/n 腌肉都煎糊了!/r/n
Many diseases are caused by bacteria./r/n 许多疾病是由细菌引起的。/r/n Bacteria are too small to see with the naked eye./r/n 细菌太小，肉眼看不见。/r/n
He was awarded a merit badge for his bravery in the battle./r/n 他因为在战斗中的勇猛被授予一枚奖章。/r/n What is that badge on your lapel?/r/n 你翻领上的是什麽徽章?/r/n
The beautiful scenery baffles description./r/n 这美丽的景色难以形容。/r/n The question baffled me completely and I could not answer./r/n 这个问题把我彻底难倒了，我答不出来。/r/n
Earth worms are often used as bait./r/n 蚯蚓常用作鱼饵。/r/n The steaming cake was a bait for the hungry boy./r/n 那热气腾腾的蛋糕对这个饥饿的男孩是个诱惑。/r/n
He took off the hat and revealed his bald head./r/n 他脱下帽子，露出秃头。/r/n We planted some trees on the bald hill./r/n 我们在一座秃山上种了些树。/r/n
I was bankrupt and unable to pay his debts./r/n 我破产了，不能偿还他的债务。/r/n That company made him bankrupt./r/n 是那家公司让他破产的。/r/n
The bank of bankruptcy is investigated by the court./r/n 那家破产的银行正被法院调查。/r/n Ten bankruptcies were recorded in this town last year./r/n 去年这个镇已有十起破产事件。/r/n
The patriots fought under the banner of freedom./r/n 爱国者在自由的旗帜下战斗。/r/n The banner lent color to the streets./r/n 旗帜给街道增添了色彩。/r/n
The sunshine bodes well for our barbecue./r/n 明媚的阳光对我们的烤肉野餐是个吉兆。/r/n Want to join us for a barbecue?/r/n 想同我们一起去烧烤野餐吗?/r/n
Those trees have very beautiful white bark./r/n 那些树长着非常漂亮的白色树皮。/r/n The dog barked when the stranger came near./r/n 当陌生人走近时，狗叫了起来。/r/n
The wind unroofed the barn./r/n 风掀掉了谷仓的顶。/r/n The cows were feeding on hay in the barn./r/n 母牛正在牲口棚里吃乾草呢./r/n
The barometer began to fall./r/n 气压计的读数开始下降。/r/n A recording barometer./r/n 自动记录的气压计/r/n
Nothing can grow in this barren land./r/n 在这块不毛之地上什么也不能生长。/r/n It's useless to continue such a barren argument./r/n 继续这种无聊的争辩是无用的。/r/n
The soldiers stormed the barricades erected by the rioting crowd./r/n 士兵们向暴乱分子设置的街垒发起了猛攻./r/n They barricaded themselves in (their rooms)./r/n 他们把自己关在（自己的屋子）里面./r/n
The horse took the barrier easily./r/n 那匹马轻松地越过了障碍。/r/n Heavy duties on imports and exports are a barrier to international trade./r/n 进出口的高关税是国际贸易的障碍。/r/n
The prisoners tried to barter with the guards for their freedom./r/n 囚犯们企图和看守做换取自由的交易。/r/n On these islands a system of barter is used./r/n 在这些岛上仍然实行着物物交换的制度。/r/n
These beacons on the coast are to warn and guide ships./r/n 这些海滩上的信号灯是用来提醒和指示船舶的。/r/n This is a beacon to help aircraft discover their position./r/n 这个闪光灯是帮助飞机确定位置的。/r/n
She beamed at me./r/n 她对我微笑。/r/n We enjoy seeing the glorious beams of the rising sun./r/n 我们喜欢观赏初升太阳的灿烂光辉。/r/n
His father beat the disobedient boy./r/n 他的父亲打那个不听话的男孩。/r/n We heard the beat of the drum./r/n 我们听到鼓声。/r/n

She seems very plain but he dotes on her, but beauty is in the eye of the beholder./r/n 她看上去相貌平平，但他非常爱她，情人眼中出西施。/r/n I don't understand how he can think she is good looking, but beauty is in the eye of the beholder./r/n 我不明白他怎么会认为她漂亮，不过情人眼里出西施罢了。/r/n
It's a beneficial result to us./r/n 对我们来说那是有利的结果。/r/n Fresh air is beneficial to our health./r/n 新鲜空气有益于健康。/r/n
My mother's character is very benign./r/n 我母亲非常慈祥。/r/n Is the growth benign or cancerous?/r/n 这个肿瘤是良性的还是癌肿性的?/r/n
He betrayed his country./r/n 他背叛了他的国家。/r/n The smoke from cooking betrayed the presence of the enemy./r/n 炊烟暴露了敌人的存在。/r/n
What beverage would you like?/r/n 你想喝什么饮料？/r/n The beverage prepared from the seeds of this plant./r/n 咖啡饮料用这种植物的种子作出的饮料/r/n
Bibliography usually appears at the end of a book./r/n 参考书目通常在书后列出。/r/n The book ought to include a bibliography of the subject./r/n 这本书应包括一份关于这一学科的参考书目。/r/n
He is bilingual (in French and Spanish)./r/n 他操（法语和西班牙语）两种语言./r/n

A style of painting, sculpture, and ornamentation in which natural forms and monstrous figures are intertwined in bizarre or fanciful combinations./r/n 奇异风格，形状怪诞的图案一种自然的形式和奇异的图形以一种奇异或古怪的方式结合在一起的绘画雕塑和装饰风格/r/n The story has a certain bizarre interest./r/n 这个故事听起来别有风趣。/r/n
She was sent to prison for blackmail./r/n 因犯敲诈勒索罪她被送进监牢。/r/n It's a clear case of blackmail!/r/n 这显然是敲诈!/r/n
The blade needs sharpening./r/n 这刀刃需要磨一磨。/r/n The blade is chipped in a few places./r/n 刀锋有几个地方缺口。/r/n
The priest blessed the ship before it left port./r/n 牧师在船离港之前为其祝福。/r/n God bless you!/r/n 愿上帝保佑你！/r/n
I've made an awful blunder./r/n 我做了一件大错特错的事。/r/n The police blundered badly by arresting the wrong man./r/n 警方抓错了人，犯了荒唐的大错。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．模糊不清的事物 v．使…模糊
RECORD.lx: A blur on a developed photographic image./r/n 模糊不清洗好的照片图象上的模糊处/r/n The racing cars passed in a blur./r/n 竞赛的汽车影绰不清地飞驰而过。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．螺栓，门栓 v．急逃，脱离
RECORD.lx: The frightened boy bolted all the doors and windows./r/n 这个吓坏了的孩子闩上了所有的门窗。/r/n We need an eye bolt to fit this valve./r/n 我们需要一个有眼螺栓来固定这个阀门。/r/n
The act or an instance of assisting; a boost./r/n 帮助协助的行为或实例；支援/r/n A big boost in salary./r/n 一次工资大增加/r/n
She has become an awful bore since she got married to him./r/n 她自从和他结婚后，就变得令人厌烦透了。/r/n Worms have bored into the wood./r/n 虫子已经蛀穿了木料。/r/n
In his speech there were bouquets for everyone who had helped him./r/n 在他的演讲里，他赞美了每一位帮助他的人。/r/n The characteristic smell of a wine or liqueur; bouquet./r/n 芳香葡萄酒或酒有特点的气味；酒香/r/n

RECORD.meaning: v．使稳固，架稳 n．支撑物
RECORD.lx: The struts are firmly braced./r/n 那些支柱上得很牢固。/r/n We braced ourselves for a bumpy landing./r/n 我们已做好准备, 著陆时会很颠簸./r/n
The driver braked his car suddenly./r/n 司机突然煞车。/r/n The brake doesn't grip properly./r/n 刹车不灵了。/r/n
Your action is a breach of our agreement./r/n 你的行动违反了我们的协议。/r/n You are in breach of your contract./r/n 你违反了你签的合同。/r/n
Stars are brilliant in the clear night sky./r/n 星星在晴朗的夜空闪亮。/r/n A brilliant sun lit up their rooms./r/n 灿烂的阳光照亮了他们的屋子。/r/n
He filled the cup to the brim./r/n 他倒了满满一杯。/r/n He brimmed a cup with wine./r/n 他斟满一杯酒。/r/n
There are many flowers on the brink of the pond./r/n 池塘边有许多花。/r/n He dissipated most of his money and was on the brink of bankruptcy./r/n 他挥霍掉了大部分钱财, 濒于破产。/r/n
My brother has chronic bronchitis./r/n 我的哥哥患有慢性支气管炎。/r/n If you would leave off smoking, your bronchitis would much improve./r/n 如果你戒烟的话，你的支气管炎就会好得多。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．一窝幼鸟 v．孵蛋，闷想
RECORD.lx: It's no use brooding over one's past mistakes./r/n 老是抱着过去的错误是没用的。/r/n Some insects produce seven or eight broods a year./r/n 有些昆虫一年产七八次卵。/r/n
We crossed that brook easily./r/n 我们很容易地跨过了小河。/r/n This important matter brooks no delay. We must talk about it now./r/n 这件要事不容耽搁，我们必须现在谈谈。/r/n
We crossed that brook easily./r/n 我们很容易地跨过了小河。/r/n This important matter brooks no delay. We must talk about it now./r/n 这件要事不容耽搁，我们必须现在谈谈。/r/n
I had a browse through the books on the shelf./r/n 我浏览了一遍书架上的书。/r/n I spent hours browsing in the bookstore./r/n 我花了几个小时在书店里浏览图书。/r/n

Many a rich businessman reached the top by trampling on others in the most brutal way./r/n 许多富商靠极其残酷地践踏别人而爬了上去。/r/n NATO's invasion of this independent country is a brutal violation of human rights./r/n 北约对这个独立的国家的侵略是对人权的野蛮侵犯。/r/n
The gas bubbled to the surface of the water./r/n 气体变成气泡升上水面。/r/n He bubbled questions./r/n 他接二连三地提问题。/r/n
They chatted idly for a few moments, then each buckled down to work./r/n 他们闲聊了一会儿；然后各人集中精神干活。/r/n He buckled up his belt tightly./r/n 他把裤带扣得紧紧的。/r/n
The police tested the room for bugs./r/n 警察检查房间里是否放有窃听器。/r/n Our test flight was to discover the bugs in the new plane./r/n 试验飞行是为了发现新飞机有何毛病。/r/n
Onions and lilies grow from bulbs./r/n 洋葱和百合是从球茎中长出的。/r/n We will have to change the bulb; it's gone./r/n 电灯泡爆了，我们需要换一个。/r/n
My pockets were bulging with apples./r/n 我的口袋因装着苹果而鼓起来了。/r/n I can't eat any more; my stomach is bulging./r/n 我一点也吃不下，肚子都鼓起来了。/r/n

The manager tried to bully his men into working harder by threatening them with dismissal./r/n 经理企图以解雇来威胁，迫使职工更卖力气。/r/n You've solved the puzzle at last? Well, bully for you!/r/n 你最後把这难题解决啦? 哦, 你可真棒!/r/n
A bumper is a part of a motor vehicle./r/n 保险杆是机动车辆的一部分。/r/n Please give me a bumper./r/n 请给我斟一满杯。/r/n
Salt water is more buoyant than fresh water./r/n 盐水比淡水浮力大。/r/n The raft would be more buoyant if it was less heavy./r/n 木筏若轻一点浮起的就更好了。/r/n
It was hard to understand all the minute gradations of their bureaucracy./r/n 很难弄清楚他们那套官僚体制全部细微的层次分别。/r/n The dead hand of bureaucracy is slowing our progress./r/n 官僚主义的流毒拖慢了我们的进步./r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．（兔子等）所掘的地洞，v．挖洞
RECORD.lx: She burrowed her head into my shoulder./r/n 她把头紧靠在我的肩膀上。/r/n It's said that a rabbit usually will have more than one burrows./r/n 据说兔子有不止一个洞穴。/r/n
He and his wife busted up a year ago./r/n 他和他的妻子一年前分居了。/r/n He got a bust in the nose./r/n 他鼻子上挨了一拳。/r/n
We managed to bypass the shopping centre by taking side-streets./r/n 我们尽量走小路以绕过购物中心区./r/n If we take the bypass we'll avoid the town centre./r/n 我们走旁道, 就能避开市镇的中心./r/n
More than 50 people were killed in this calamity./r/n 这次灾难中有五十多人丧生。/r/n The attack on Pearl Harbor was a crushing calamity./r/n 偷袭珍珠港（对美军来说）是一场毁灭性的灾难。/r/n
We need some calcium everyday./r/n 我们每天需要些钙。/r/n Calcium is beneficial to our bones./r/n 钙对我们的骨骼有益。/r/n
A callous indifference to the suffering of others./r/n 对他人之痛苦漠不关心的铁石心肠的人/r/n
The lift has a capacity of 15 persons./r/n 这部电梯的载容量为15 人。/r/n Some people have a greater capacity for happiness than others./r/n 有的人享得起福，有的人享不起福。/r/n
He carved me some very nice pieces of chicken./r/n 他为我切了几块很好的鸡肉。/r/n The statue was carved out of marble./r/n 这座雕像是用大理石雕刻的。/r/n
The water formed a cascade down the mountain./r/n 水沿山泻下，形成一条瀑布。/r/n Climbing plants with their bright flowers hung in cascades over the garden wall./r/n 开出鲜艳花朵的爬藤植物瀑布般悬挂在花园墙上。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．催化剂，促使事情发展的因素
RECORD.lx: The offer of a new job provided just the catalyst she needed./r/n 这份新工作正是她所需要转变的契机。/r/n A substance, especially an enzyme, that initiates or modifies the rate of a chemical reaction in a living body; a biochemical catalyst./r/n 生物催化剂能在活的体内产生化学反应或改变生物体内化学反应速度的物质，尤指酶；生物化学催化剂/r/n
A category, especially an overly restrictive one./r/n 分类，类别分类，尤指受过度限制分类/r/n Dealing with a more restricted category./r/n 小（项）的；小前提的与一个更严格的类别有关的/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj．（兴趣等）广泛的，（人）宽厚的
RECORD.lx: The atom bomb is of catholic concern./r/n 原子弹受到普遍的关注。/r/n She was a devout catholic./r/n 她曾是个虔诚的天主教徒。/r/n

A caustic verbal attack./r/n 讽刺刻薄的口头上的攻击/r/n An agent or instrument used to destroy abnormal tissue by burning, searing, or scarring, including caustic substances, electric currents, lasers, and very hot or very cold instruments./r/n 烧灼剂通过烧、灼或结疤手段用于破坏不正常人体组织的药剂或仪器，包括腐蚀物质、电流、激光以及极热或极冷的仪器/r/n
I have a toothache because there is a cavity in one of my teeth./r/n 我牙疼，因为我的一颗牙齿上有个洞。/r/n A cavity or hollowed surface, especially of a bone./r/n 腔尤指骨头的腔或凹陷的表面/r/n
The infatuated fan stalked the celebrity./r/n 那位着了迷的崇拜者追踪这位名人。/r/n She became a celebrity overnight./r/n 她一下变成名人了。/r/n
The plumber went down to the cellar to fix the leaky pipe./r/n 管道工到地下室去修漏水的管子。/r/n The cellar floods whenever it rains heavily./r/n 一下大雨地窖里就灌满了水./r/n
He was buried in this cemetery./r/n 他被安葬在这个公墓里。/r/n A vehicle for conveying a coffin to a church or cemetery./r/n 柩车装运棺材去教堂或墓地的车辆/r/n
The censor insisted on excising the passage from the film./r/n 电影审查员坚持剪去影片的这一段./r/n Two scenes were cut by the censor./r/n 有两个镜头被审查员剪掉了./r/n
Cereal products are good for our health./r/n 谷物产品对我们的身体有益。/r/n I have a bowl of cereal every morning./r/n 我每天早晨吃一碗麦片粥。/r/n
He had a cerebral palsy./r/n 他得了脑瘫。/r/n Either of the lateral halves of the cerebrum; a cerebral hemisphere./r/n 大脑半球大脑侧面半部分的任何一个；大脑半球/r/n

After the failure of the electricity supplies the city was in chaos./r/n 电力供应中断，城市陷于混乱之中。/r/n He sees that human stupidity and greed are about to plunge Europe into chaos./r/n 他看到人间的愚蠢和贪婪即将使欧洲陷入一片混乱。/r/n
She was always very generous in her charity./r/n 她行善时总是很慷慨。/r/n She regards his moral faults with charity./r/n 她宽恕他的品行不端。/r/n
The holiday-makers chartered a boat to go fishing./r/n 渡假者租了一艘船去钓鱼。/r/n The company was granted a charter trade in the occupied territory./r/n 这家公司被授予特权，可以在被占领地区进行贸易活动。/r/n
We must chase the enemy from our country./r/n 我们必须把敌人赶出我国。/r/n They caught the puppy after a long chase./r/n 他们追了很久才把小狗逮住。/r/n
She was a holy woman, innocent and chaste./r/n 她是一个圣洁的女人，天真而忠贞。/r/n Not chaste or modest./r/n 不贞洁的，淫荡的/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．(用斧头等)砍，(风)突然改变方向
RECORD.lx: He chopped in with a sarcastic remark./r/n 他突然插进一句讽刺的话。/r/n She chopped the block of wood in two with a single blow./r/n 她一斧头把木块劈成两半。/r/n
He is a member of the choir./r/n 他是唱诗班的一员。/r/n The choir sang the amens beautifully./r/n 唱诗班唱的阿门非常优美./r/n
The papers all chorused the praises of the President./r/n 各报都异口同声地对总统表示赞扬。/r/n The chorus is dressed as fairies./r/n 歌舞队的人都装扮成仙子。/r/n
I've completed a fair chunk of my article./r/n 我已经把文章的一大部分写完了./r/n The giant shovel is biting off big chunks from the hill./r/n 巨型铲土机正在把小山头一大口一大口地啃掉。/r/n
The cipher took me three weeks before I hit it./r/n 我费了3个多星期才把这密码解释出来。/r/n The army uses a special cipher so that military messages are kept secret./r/n ＂军队使用一种特殊密码，军事电讯因此得以保密。＂/r/n
People are indignant by their shooting of innocent civilians./r/n 对于他们枪杀无辜平民，人们感到义愤填膺。/r/n He resigned his commission to take up a civilian job./r/n 他辞去军职而从事平民工作./r/n
He clamped the reading lamp onto the edge of the table./r/n 他把台灯夹到桌子的边上。/r/n This clamp is mine./r/n 这个夹子是我的。/r/n
Being unable to think with clarity or act with understanding and intelligence./r/n 迷惑的不能清楚地思考或不能理智或清晰地行为/r/n Lacking clarity or distinctness; cloudy or obscure./r/n 模糊的不清楚的或者不明显的；含糊的或者朦胧的/r/n
The color of the curtains clashed with the color of the carpet./r/n 窗帘的颜色和地毯的颜色不协调。/r/n She clashed the pan down on the stone floor./r/n 她把炒锅当啷一声掉在石头地板上。/r/n
The books in the library are classified by subject./r/n 图书馆的书是按科目分类的。/r/n Would you classify her novels as serious literature or other?/r/n 你认为她的小说属于文学类，还是其它类?/r/n
There is a hierarchy in the classification of all living creatures./r/n 一切生物均可按等级分类./r/n One who assigns names, as in scientific classification./r/n 命名者命名的人。如在科学分类中/r/n
A haemophiliac's blood will not clot properly./r/n 血友病患者的血液凝固不良./r/n You silly clot!/r/n 你这个大笨蛋!/r/n
You clumsy oaf ---that's the second glass you've broken today./r/n 你这个笨家伙!这是你今天打坏的第二个玻璃杯。/r/n It's not easy walking in these clumsy shoes./r/n 穿着这双笨重的鞋走路真难受。/r/n
You can see stars in clusters in the night sky./r/n 你可以看到夜空中的星群。/r/n The men clustered together round the fire and sang songs./r/n 人们聚集在篝火周围唱歌。/r/n
The views of party leaders coalesced to form a coherent policy./r/n 党的领导人的各种观点已统一为一致的政策./r/n
Some of the parties in Spain formed a coalition government./r/n 西班牙的一些政党组成了一个联合政府。/r/n The two parties have united to form a coalition./r/n 这两个党已结成联盟./r/n
He coaxed her into letting him take her to the cinema./r/n 他哄她同意带她去看电影。/r/n She coaxed him out of his bad temper./r/n 她循循善诱地劝他改掉坏脾气。/r/n
Power or ability to coerce./r/n 强制的权力或能力/r/n
The combining of separate elements or substances to form a coherent whole./r/n 综合把分别的元素或物质连接成连贯的一个整体/r/n The views of party leaders coalesced to form a coherent policy./r/n 党的领导人的各种观点已统一为一致的政策./r/n
Absence of any cohesive principle, such as a common standard or purpose./r/n 混乱，无秩序无任何凝聚性准则，如共同标准或目标/r/n
They didn't coincide in opinion./r/n 他们的意见不统一。/r/n The demonstration had been carefully stage-managed to coincide with the Prime Minister's visit./r/n 这次示威活动事先作了精心安排, 正好在首相访问时进行./r/n
What a coincidence!/r/n 多巧的事啊！/r/n By coincidence, we arrived here at the same time./r/n 我们凑巧一同到达这儿。/r/n
The bank will insist on collateral for a loan of that size./r/n 银行对这样的大笔贷款一定要有抵押物。/r/n Lacking the protection of insurance or collateral security./r/n 未经保险的未发保险的，无附加担保的/r/n
The bank will insist on collateral for a loan of that size./r/n 银行对这样的大笔贷款一定要有抵押物。/r/n Lacking the protection of insurance or collateral security./r/n 未经保险的未发保险的，无附加担保的/r/n
The ships collided in the fog./r/n 轮船在雾中相撞./r/n The bus and the van collided./r/n 公共汽车与客货车相撞./r/n
The liner is reported to have been in collision with an oil tanker./r/n 据报道，这艘客轮与一艘油轮相撞。/r/n Five persons died during the collision between two buses./r/n 5个人死于公共汽车相撞。/r/n
It requires government spending on a colossal scale./r/n 这要求政府付出巨额开支。/r/n

Petrol is (highly) combustible./r/n 汽油（极）易燃./r/n A hypothetical substance formerly thought to be a volatile constituent of all combustible substances released as flame in combustion./r/n 燃素，热素原来假设的在所有燃烧物质中挥发性的一种物质成分，在燃烧中作为火焰而被释放出来/r/n
The second term commences in March./r/n 第二学期自三月开始。/r/n I commence from this point./r/n 我从此点开始。/r/n
She commended the child to her sister's care./r/n 她将孩子委托给她妹妹照管。/r/n His work was highly commended./r/n 他的工作备受赞赏。/r/n
His political commitment is only skin-deep./r/n 他政治上的承诺只是表面文章。/r/n The President affirmed America's commitment to its transatlantic (ie European) allies./r/n 总统申明美国履行对其欧洲盟国承担的义务./r/n

The country is heavily dependent on its exports of agricultural commodities./r/n 这个国家很大程度上依靠农产品的出口。/r/n The goods were inspected by the China Commodity Inspection Bureau before shipment./r/n 这批货在装船前由中国商品检验局进行过检验。/r/n
You are making a great commotion about nothing./r/n 你简直是在无理取闹。/r/n The discovery caused a tremendous commotion in the scientific world./r/n 那项发现在科学界引起极大的震动。/r/n
He received a compact package./r/n 他收到一个扎得很紧的包裹。/r/n The Commonwealth agreed to make a compact with this country./r/n 英联邦同意和这个国家订约。/r/n
He received a compact package./r/n 他收到一个扎得很紧的包裹。/r/n The Commonwealth agreed to make a compact with this country./r/n 英联邦同意和这个国家订约。/r/n
I had compassion for him./r/n 我怜悯他。/r/n We had compassion for the poor widow./r/n 我们同情这个可怜的寡妇。/r/n

Not compatible or sympathetic, as in character./r/n 志趣不同的指性格上不宽容，无同情心的/r/n Pertaining to a degree of standardization of computer system components to allow for combinations and large variety of compatible units./r/n 修饰或说明计算机系统部件的标准化的程度，模块化设计允许部件组合和出现很多种类的兼容部件。/r/n

One that adapts, such as a device used to effect operative compatibility between different parts of one or more pieces of apparatus./r/n 适应物，转接器，接合器适应物，如用于在一件或多件仪器的不同部件之间实现有效兼容性的装置/r/n Compatibility is a condition of a successful marriage./r/n 和谐与否是婚姻成功的先决条件/r/n
The heavy rain compelled us to stay indoors./r/n 大雨迫使我们呆在户内。/r/n His cleverness and skill compel our admiration./r/n 他的聪明和技巧使我们赞叹不已。/r/n
Nothing can compensate for the loss of one's health./r/n 什么都不能补偿健康受损。/r/n Who will compensate for the losses?/r/n 谁将赔偿损失？/r/n
It take year of hard work to compile a good dictionary./r/n 编纂一部好词典要花多年心血。/r/n It takes years of hard work to compile a good dictionary./r/n 编一部好词典需要多年的艰苦工作。/r/n
This great victory changed the complexion of the war./r/n 这次大捷使整个战局为之改观。/r/n He has a dark complexion./r/n 他肤色黝黑。/r/n
In compliance with your wishes (ie As you have requested) we have withdrawn our suggestion./r/n 遵照你的要求我们已将建议撤销./r/n Compliance (with the rules) is expected of all members./r/n 要求全体人员都遵守（制度）./r/n
Everyone should comply with the law./r/n 每个人都应该遵守法律。/r/n She was told to pay the fine, but refused to comply./r/n 通知她交纳罚款，但她拒不服从。/r/n
Your presence is a great compliment./r/n 承蒙光临，不胜荣幸。/r/n He complimented us with tickets for the football game./r/n 他送给我们足球赛的门票。/r/n

A small or reduced flower, especially one of the grasses and composite plants, such as a daisy./r/n 小花尤指禾木植物或菊科植物的一朵小花或小花穗，例如雏菊花/r/n In microwave system the separate input from various sources must be brought together to give a composite input which is then transmitted and received by radio./r/n 在微波系统中，来自各处的分散的输入必须被汇集在一起，以形成一个综合的输入，然后由无线电发送和接收。/r/n
She has a comprehensive grasp of the subject./r/n 她已全面掌握了这一学科。/r/n The reporter has made a comprehensive report./r/n 记者已做了全面的报道。/r/n
The farmers compressed straw into blocks for burning./r/n 农民们将干草压成块用来烧火。/r/n The film compresses several years into half an hour./r/n 这部电影将几年的事压缩于半小时内。/r/n

They refused to compromise their principles by doing a deal with the terrorists./r/n 他们拒绝同恐怖分子做交易，以免原则受到损害。/r/n Progress has been made towards a political compromise between the two nations./r/n 两国之间的政治和解已经取得进展。/r/n
Is military service compulsory in your country?/r/n 你们国家实行义务兵役制吗？/r/n Is English a compulsory subject?/r/n 英语是必修科目吗？/r/n
He computed his losses at USD5,000./r/n 他估计自己损失5000美元。/r/n Scientists have computed the probable course of the rocket./r/n 科学家利用计算机计算了火箭可能运行的轨道。/r/n
A quick computation revealed that we would not make a profit./r/n 粗略计算後可以看出我们无利可图./r/n Addition and division are forms of computation./r/n 加法和除法都是计算方法./r/n
I concede that you are right./r/n 我承认你是对的。/r/n You must concede that I have tried my best./r/n 你必须承认我已经尽力了。/r/n
We will make some concession in price./r/n 我们将在价格上做些让步。/r/n I hope you can make some concession./r/n 我希望你能做些让步。/r/n
I can't conceive of your allowing the child to travel alone./r/n 我想不通你怎么会让孩子独自去旅行。/r/n It was then that I conceived the notion of running away./r/n 就在那时我产生了逃跑的念头./r/n
The act or procedure of giving or receiving concise preparatory instructions, information, or advice./r/n 简介给予或接受简洁的预备性的指令、信息或忠告的行为或步骤/r/n Teaching content should be concise./r/n 教学内容要少而精。/r/n

She'd concocted some unlikely tale about the train being cancelled./r/n 她胡编了一通瞎话, 说什麽那班火车给取消了./r/n One wonders also why Nature, with some snakes concocted poison of such extreme potency./r/n 人们也不知道大自然为何在一些蛇身上调制出这样高效的毒液来。/r/n

A brief shot that interrupts the visual continuity of the main action of a film, often to depict related matter or supposedly concurrent action./r/n 切换镜头一种中断电影的主要情节画面的连续性的简短镜头，通常用来描绘相关事件或可能同时发生的情节/r/n
The criminal was condemned to death./r/n 这个罪犯被判死刑。/r/n We condemned him for his bad conduct./r/n 我们责备他行为不检点。/r/n
Fresh air is conducive to health./r/n 新鲜空气有助于健康。/r/n Regularity ought to be observed, as regularity is very conducive to health./r/n 生活应遵守规律，因为规律对健康有益。/r/n

Something resembling this structure in configuration or pattern./r/n 蜂窝状物在外形或结构上类似这种构造的东西/r/n For some remote systems, the translation of configuration information into machine language./r/n 对于某些远程系统，将配置信息翻译成机器语言的过程。/r/n
Confronted by an angry crowd the police retreated./r/n 警察面对愤怒的人群只好后撤了。/r/n They confronted the prisoner with his accusers./r/n 他们让犯人与原告对质。/r/n
He had a serious congestion of the lungs./r/n 他得了严重的肺充血。/r/n There is always traffic congestion in that street./r/n 那条街经常交通阻塞。/r/n
An American conglomerate holds a major share in the company./r/n 一家美国的大联合企业持有该公司的大部分股份。/r/n The firm has been taken over by an American conglomerate./r/n 该公司已被美国一企业集团接管。/r/n
The goods were consigned to you by railway./r/n 货物已由铁路托运到你处。/r/n The captured criminals were consigned to the dungeons./r/n 抓到的罪犯被送进了地牢。/r/n
The goods have been sent to Chicago on consignment./r/n 货物已运到芝加哥，托人代销。/r/n Official consignment, as to a prison or mental health facility./r/n 官方拘留官方的授权，给监狱或心理健康机构/r/n
There are many lights and electrical instruments on the computer console./r/n 电脑控制板上有许多小灯和电子设备。/r/n Nothing could console him when his pet dog died./r/n 他的爱犬死后，什么事情也不能使他宽慰。/r/n
He bribes his leader to consolidate his position./r/n 他贿赂他的领导来巩固他的地位。/r/n The two companies consolidated last year./r/n 这两个公司去年合并了。/r/n
Lincoln is a conspicuous example of a poor boy who succeeded./r/n 林肯是一个穷苦孩子而功成名就的出色例子。/r/n A traffic sign should be conspicuous./r/n 交通标志应该明显。/r/n

He revealed their conspiracy to overthrow the government./r/n 他泄露了他们推翻政府的阴谋。/r/n It has recently come to light that a second official was implicated in the conspiracy./r/n 最近有消息披露：又有一名高级官员与这个阴谋有牵连。/r/n
Do you know the constituents of the mixture?/r/n 你知道这种混合物的成份吗？/r/n Analyze the sentence into its constituent parts./r/n 把这条句子的各个成份加以分析。/r/n
He has contagious laughter./r/n 他有着容易感染人的笑声。/r/n Scarlet fever is highly contagious./r/n 猩红热传染性很强。/r/n
The police contemplated various kinds of trouble after the football match./r/n 警方料想足球赛后会发生各种各样的麻烦。/r/n The doctor contemplated the difficult operation he had to perform./r/n 医生细想他要进行的棘手的手术。/r/n
Their sense of justice gave them armor against the contempt of others./r/n 他们的正义感保护他们不被别人轻视。/r/n They showed nothing but contempt for him./r/n 他们对他轻蔑已极./r/n

My contention is that the government's plan would never have been successful whatever had happened./r/n 我的论点是无论发生什么事情，政府的计划都不会成功。/r/n The border has always been a bone of contention between these two countries./r/n 这两国之间的边界问题历来是争议的焦点./r/n

California and Mexico are contiguous./r/n 加利福尼亚和墨西哥相邻。/r/n In Series/1, a series of contiguous records in a volume that describe the contents in terms of allocated data sets and free space./r/n 在IBMSeries／1中，文卷里的一串连续记录，这些记录用于描述已分配数据集和自由空间。/r/n
There are seven continents in the world./r/n 世界上有七大洲。/r/n The Antarctica is a continent centered roughly on the South Pole./r/n 南极洲是一片大致以南极为中心的大陆。/r/n

The classification of propositions on the basis of whether they assert or deny the possibility, impossibility, contingency, or necessity of their content./r/n 模态逻辑命题的限制条件，建立在其内容的肯定或否定其可能性，不可能性，偶然性或必然性基础之上/r/n It's impossible to legislate for every contingency./r/n 为每一偶发事件都立法是不可能的./r/n
The city contracted for a library with their firm./r/n 市政当局和他们公司订立了修建图书馆的合同。/r/n Marriage is, first of all, a contract which must be governed by justice./r/n 婚姻首先是一种契约，它必须以公正为制约。/r/n
The city contracted for a library with their firm./r/n 市政当局和他们公司订立了修建图书馆的合同。/r/n Marriage is, first of all, a contract which must be governed by justice./r/n 婚姻首先是一种契约，它必须以公正为制约。/r/n
"I'll" is a contraction of "I will"./r/n “I'll”是“I will”的缩写。/r/n The contraction of muscle is a reaction of the body./r/n 肌肉的收缩是人体的一种反应。/r/n
Can you contrive to be here early?/r/n 你能不能设法早到点？/r/n The prisoner contrived a way to escape./r/n 囚犯图谋越狱。/r/n
The new government appointments have caused much controversy./r/n 政府在人事上作的新的委任，引起了许多争论。/r/n The mayor will try to accord the controversy over the housing scheme./r/n 市长试图调解在住房建筑规划方面的争议。/r/n
Some say that capitalism and socialism will eventually converge./r/n 有人说资本主义和社会主义最终会合而为一。/r/n The roads converge just before the station./r/n 四面八方的道路会聚在火车站前。/r/n
Coal can be converted to gas./r/n 煤可以转化成煤气。/r/n He is a recent convert to Christianity./r/n 他最近改信基督教了。/r/n

Conversion to gas central heating will save you a lot of money./r/n 改用煤气集中供暖将节省大笔开支。/r/n When he saw how the theory increased unemployment, he underwent quite a conversion./r/n 当他看到这个理论加重了失业后，他彻底改变了看法。/r/n
Dollars convertible into yen./r/n 可兑换成日元的美金/r/n A convertible sofa bed./r/n 可变换的沙发床/r/n
This company is concerned about its corporate image./r/n 这家公司关心它自身的法人形象。/r/n This university is a corporate body formed from several colleges./r/n 这所大学是由几个不同学院组成的。/r/n
The criminal was convicted of murder./r/n 歹徒被判谋杀罪。/r/n The escaped convict has been caught by the police again./r/n 越狱的逃犯已经再次被警方抓获。/r/n
I have the conviction that he is right./r/n 我深信他是对的。/r/n They have no previous convictions./r/n 他们没有前科。/r/n

The poor girl from an isolated village was deeply impressed by the copious quantities of food in the big city./r/n 大城市里大量丰富的食品给这个来自荒僻的小山村的穷苦的小女孩留下了深刻的印象。/r/n She was a copious writer./r/n 她是一位多产作家。/r/n
This material is copyright./r/n 本资料享有版权./r/n The poem is still under copyright, so you have to pay to quote it./r/n 该诗仍然享有版权, 因此你必须支付引用费./r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．日冕（月球经过太阳前面时，太阳外围呈现的光环），冠（状物）
RECORD.lx: A faint glow enveloping the high-field electrode in a corona discharge, often accompanied by streamers directed toward the low-field electrode./r/n 电晕在电晕放电中在高压电极出现的一种微弱光辉，常伴随有朝向低压电极的电流/r/n
We can often correlate age with frequency of illness./r/n 年龄的大小往往与发病率有关./r/n The results of this experiment do not correlate with the results of earlier ones./r/n 这次试验的结果与以往试验的结果毫不相干./r/n
They are our Hong Kong correspondents./r/n 他们是我们派驻香港的通讯员。/r/n He is a poor correspondent./r/n 他是个懒于写信的人。/r/n
Physics is governed by cosmic laws./r/n 物理学受宇宙法则的制约./r/n
The kimono is part of the national costume of Japan./r/n 和服是日本民族服装的一部分。/r/n She wore an antique gown to the costume party./r/n 她穿着一件过时的长袍参加化妆舞会。/r/n
The room has a nice cosy feel./r/n 这房间给人非常温暖舒适的感觉。/r/n He lives in a cosy little room./r/n 他住在一个舒适的小屋里。/r/n
His black leather couch looks expensive./r/n 他的黑色皮沙发看上去很昂贵。/r/n Dad is sleeping on the couch./r/n 爸爸在长椅上睡觉。/r/n
They will counteract the effects of his bad influence./r/n 他们要清除他的不良影响。/r/n We must counteract extremism in the party./r/n 我们应该抵制党内的极端主义。/r/n
Counterfeit or fake./r/n 假冒的，伪造的/r/n She counterfeited alarm when he confessed his love./r/n 当他向她示爱时她假装惊讶的样子。/r/n
The pedals of a cycle are attached to the crank./r/n 自行车的踏板与曲柄相连。/r/n He started to crank the engine./r/n 他开始用曲柄启动发动机。/r/n
A large crater formed by volcanic explosion or by collapse of a volcanic cone./r/n 火山口火山爆发而形成的环形山或大山核心部分的崩塌而形成的环形山/r/n Flames blazed out from the crater of the volcano./r/n 火焰从火山口猛烈地喷出来。/r/n
The flaps of his jacket pocket were sewn down so that they did not crease or wrinkle./r/n 他的夹克口袋上的口袋盖给缝上了，这样就不会打皱。/r/n A crease in the skin, especially on the face; a wrinkle./r/n 皱纹皮肤褶皱，尤指脸上的；皱纹/r/n
I was really up the creek when I lost my keys./r/n 我丢掉钥匙之后，真正遇到了麻烦。/r/n I'll be up the creek if I don't pass this history test./r/n 我若不能通过这次历史考试，麻烦可就大了。/r/n
There is a crevice in the wall./r/n 墙上有个裂缝。/r/n A winding channel, passage, or crevice./r/n 弯曲的沟渠，弯曲的通道，弯曲的裂缝/r/n
The picture on the wall is crooked./r/n 挂在墙壁上的画是歪的。/r/n She crooked her little finger as she drank her tea./r/n 她喝茶时弯起小指头。/r/n
He crouched down among the tangled foliage./r/n 他蹲下把身子藏在紊乱的叶丛中。/r/n They did not crouch under the oppression./r/n 他们受压迫而不屈服。/r/n
It was crude of him to say that./r/n 他那样说太粗鲁了。/r/n China is a country rich in crude oil./r/n 中国是一个原油丰富的国家。/r/n
She crumb the bread before feeding it to the birds./r/n 她把面包弄碎，然后喂给鸟吃。/r/n She swept up the crumbs./r/n 她打扫了碎屑。/r/n
Most of the paint had crumbled off./r/n 油漆大都剥落。/r/n He crumbled the bread in his fingers./r/n 他用手指把面包捏碎了。/r/n
He put on a crumpled suit./r/n 他穿上一件皱巴巴的西装。/r/n The front of the car crumpled on impact./r/n 汽车的前部被撞扁了。/r/n
The dress pattern doesn't really explain how the cuff joins onto the sleeve./r/n 这个裙样没有真正地示明袖口是怎样与袖子连接在一起的。/r/n She braid the neckline, hem and cuff of the dress./r/n 她用穗带装饰连衣裙的领口、摺边和袖口。/r/n

John always tries to cultivate people who are useful to him./r/n 约翰经常设法和对他有用的人结交。/r/n We must cultivate our own garden and find the joy of doing it in our own heart./r/n 我们都要做好自己工作，并且要在工作中找到精神上的乐趣。/r/n
An apparatus for lifting heavy or cumbersome objects./r/n 起重机用来提举重物或难处理物体的设备/r/n Clumsy or cumbersome./r/n 不灵活的或妨碍的/r/n
She got rattled when she saw the policeman and drove the car up over the curb./r/n 她一看见警察就紧张起来，结果把车开到马路边上了。/r/n He pulled over to the curb./r/n 他把车子停靠在道路边缘。/r/n
He lay on the floor with a cushion under his head./r/n 他躺在地板上，头下枕着一个垫子。/r/n She embroidered the cushion with flowers./r/n 她把垫子绣上了花./r/n

One that is employed to look after or take charge of goods, property, or a person; a custodian./r/n 照顾者，看管人被雇来照料或看管货物、财产或人的人；保管人/r/n The custodian of a minor child's estate; the custodian of an absentee landlord's property./r/n 年幼孩子财产的监护人；地主外出时其地产的看管人/r/n
His cynical attitude gave us a surprise./r/n 他那愤世嫉俗的态度让我们惊奇。/r/n They've grown rather cynical about democracy./r/n 他们逐渐感到所谓民主制度也不过如此。/r/n
The sun darts forth its beams./r/n 阳光四射。/r/n The child made a dart across the road./r/n 这个小孩冲过大路。/r/n
The negotiations have reached a deadlock./r/n 谈判陷入僵局。/r/n We can only make minor concessions, but it might break the deadlock./r/n 我们只能做些较小的让步，但这就可能打破僵局。/r/n
The sea tided the debris ashore./r/n 潮水把碎片杂物冲上海滩。/r/n A heavy woven net of rope or wire cable placed over a blasting site to keep debris from scattering./r/n 防爆毯用于爆炸现场、防止碎片飞散的厚的绳网或电缆网/r/n
His deceit is disgusting; he took everybody in!/r/n 他的欺诈手段令人憎恶，弄得人人上当！/r/n He is full of deceit./r/n 他诡计多端。/r/n
I can't decipher what is inscribed on the pillar./r/n 我认不出刻在柱子上的是什么。/r/n Difficult to read or decipher./r/n 字迹模糊的，不易辨认的/r/n
A prism decomposes light./r/n 棱镜可以分解光线。/r/n There is a decomposing corpse of a deer./r/n 那儿有一具鹿的腐尸。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．命令，法令，v．颁布命令，公告
RECORD.lx: The dictator decreed that his birthday would be a public holiday./r/n 该独裁者发布命令，将其生日定为公众假期。/r/n This decree has the force of law behind it./r/n 这一裁决有法律的力量作後盾./r/n
An old, rickety vehicle, especially a decrepit automobile or aircraft./r/n 破旧汽车，破旧飞机一种用久而破烂的交通工具，尤指破坏了的汽车或飞机/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．行为，（土地或建筑物的）契约、证书
RECORD.lx: Deeds are better than words when people are in need of help./r/n 当有人需要救助的时候，行动胜于言语。/r/n His deed claims our respect./r/n 他的行为值得我们尊敬。/r/n
He deems it his duty to help his needy friends./r/n 他认为帮助穷朋友是他的义务。/r/n I deem it proper to refuse./r/n 我看还是拒绝为好。/r/n
I default on the installment payment./r/n 我没有付分期应付的款。/r/n The team lost a game by default./r/n 那个队因没有出席而输掉比赛。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．缺点，瑕疵 v．变节，脱党
RECORD.lx: A defect in the fuel lines prevented the missile from blasting off./r/n 燃料管路上的一个缺陷妨碍了导弹的发射。/r/n If it were not for this defect, I shall hire him at once./r/n 如果不是因为这个缺点，我会马上雇用他。/r/n
The defendant is accused of theft./r/n 被告被控偷窃。/r/n The courtroom buzzed as the defendant was led in./r/n 被告被带进来时, 审判室里发出一阵嘈杂声./r/n
I have a slight calcium deficiency./r/n 我有点缺钙。/r/n The deficiency of this plan is very clear and it can't possibly succeed./r/n 这项计划的缺陷是很明显的，它不可能成功。/r/n
The company had a deficit of 5000 dollars./r/n 公司亏空了五千美元。/r/n We have a great deficit this year./r/n 我们今年有很大亏损。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: v．弄污，弄脏 n．（山间）小道
RECORD.lx: They that touch pitch will be defiled./r/n 近墨者黑。/r/n They climbed up the mountain through a defile./r/n 他们通过一条小路爬到山上。/r/n
The photo lacks definition./r/n 这张照片不够清晰。/r/n To give a definition of a word is more difficult than to give an illustration of its use./r/n 给一个词下定义要比举例说明它的用法困难。/r/n
The ball hit one of the defenders and was deflected into the net./r/n 球射中一名後卫後反弹进网./r/n The missile deflected from its trajectory./r/n 导弹已偏离轨道./r/n
The smallest deflection of the missile could bring disaster./r/n 导弹有极微小的偏斜也可能酿出大祸./r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj．灵巧的，熟练的（a deft hand能手）
RECORD.lx: She is deft at dealing with reporters./r/n 她善於与记者周旋./r/n With deft fingers she untangled the wire./r/n 她用灵巧的手指解开了金属线./r/n
This degenerate seduced my daughter!/r/n 这个道德败坏的人勾引我的女儿!/r/n Her commitment to a great cause degenerated from a crusade into an obsession./r/n 她致力於一伟大事业, 但其崇高的奋斗精神已变质成为偏执的狂热./r/n
He was elected as a delegate to the annual conference./r/n 他被选为年会代表。/r/n A boss must know how to delegate (work)./r/n 当老板的要知人善任./r/n
Delete his name from the list./r/n 把他的名字从名单上删去。/r/n The attack is to wipe out data, to delete flies, or to format the hard disk./r/n 常见的攻击方式是消除数据、删除文件或者格式化硬盘。/r/n
He entered the room with deliberate steps./r/n 他从容不迫地走进室内。/r/n He told us a deliberate lie./r/n 他存心说谎。/r/n
The first chapter delimits her area of research./r/n 第一章阐明了她的研究领域./r/n
The debtor fell delinquent./r/n 债务人逾期不能偿还债务。/r/n A delinquent account./r/n 一笔拖欠的款项/r/n

Now she returned to the subject of juvenile delinquency in that country./r/n 现在她又回过来讲那个国家少年犯罪的问题。/r/n The rise in delinquency is an indictment of our society and its values./r/n 为非作歹现象有增无已, 这是对我们的社会及其价值观的控诉./r/n
Sports fans in delirium after their team's victory./r/n 球迷在他们所支持的球队胜利后的极度兴奋/r/n
There are fertile fields in the Nile Delta./r/n 尼罗河三角洲土地肥沃。/r/n Sediment deposited by flowing water, as in a riverbed, flood plain, or delta./r/n 冲积层河床、洪水淹没的平原或三角洲中的流水淤积所产生的沉积层/r/n
He deluded her with empty promises./r/n 他用虚假的诺言哄骗了她。/r/n Don't be deluded by appearances./r/n 不要被外表欺骗。/r/n
When the snow melts, the mountain stream becomes a deluge./r/n 雪融化时, 山间溪流变成山洪暴发./r/n I got caught in the deluge on the way home./r/n 我在回家的路上遇到倾盆大雨./r/n
They have demolished the slum district./r/n 贫民区已被拆除。/r/n Her article brilliantly demolishes his argument./r/n 她的文章精辟地批驳了他的论点。/r/n
The US coin of the lowest denomination is the cent./r/n 美国硬币的最小单位是美分。/r/n Not restricted to or associated with a religious denomination./r/n 非教派的不受宗教派别约束的或与宗教别无联系的/r/n
They denounced him to the police as a criminal./r/n 他们向警方告发他是罪犯。/r/n The minister's action was denounced in the newspaper./r/n 部长的行为受到报界的指责。/r/n
This expense has depleted our funds./r/n 这笔花费已使我们的资金所剩无几./r/n Our stock of food is greatly depleted./r/n 我们的食物储备已消耗殆尽./r/n
The accused has made a deposition./r/n 被告已宣誓作证./r/n He makes a deposition that he have witness the accident./r/n 他宣誓作证自己目睹了那起事故。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．代理 人，代表，副警长
RECORD.lx: I must find someone to act as a deputy for me during my absence./r/n 我必须找一个人，在我离开期间代理我的职务。/r/n He is the deputy mayor of the city./r/n 他是本市的副市长。/r/n

Several derelict cars are fished out of the canal every month./r/n 每月都从运河里捞出几辆弃旧汽车。/r/n Doors of derelict houses may be boarded and nailed up to prevent children from getting in./r/n 无人居住的房子，可以用木板把门户钉起来，以防止小孩进入。/r/n
Armed thieves descended on the helpless travelers./r/n 一群武装盗贼袭击了无依无靠的旅客。/r/n The sun descended behind the hills./r/n 太阳下山了。/r/n

He is a descendant of Queen Victoria./r/n 他是维多利亚女王的后裔。/r/n A member or descendant of a northern Semitic people, claiming descent from Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob; an Israelite; a Jew./r/n 希伯来人，犹太人北方闪米特民族的一员或后裔，自称是亚伯拉罕、以撒克和雅各的后代；古以色列人；犹太人/r/n
Our host descried a gentleman of unusual appearance standing at the far end of the hall./r/n 我们的男主人远远看到有个外表不俗的绅士站在大厅的尽头。/r/n I descry a sail on the horizon./r/n 我看见在天水交接处的轮船./r/n
His official designation is Financial Controller./r/n 他的职称是财务总监./r/n A name or designation, especially for a class or group./r/n 名称，称谓名称或称谓，尤指一个阶层或团体的名称/r/n

It isn't really desirable to have him working here./r/n 让他在这里工作其实并不必要。/r/n A procedure causing a system, process, or operation to take on its most desirable configuration or procedures in the best or most efficient way; for example, when arranging instructions and data in storage so that a minimum of machine time or space is used for storing or accessing them./r/n 使一个系统、一个过程或一个操作能取其最希望的结构的方法，或以最好、最有效的方式进行所采取的一些措施。例如，在存储器中合理安排指令和数据的存放位置以便存入和访问时花费的机器时间或空间最小。/r/n
The rocky, desolate surface of the moon./r/n 月球多石的、荒凉的表面/r/n Bands of outlaws lived in the desolate mountains after breaking the laws./r/n 成群的歹徒犯法后栖身于荒山中。/r/n

It will cause pollution and the destruction of our seas and oceans./r/n 这会引起污染，破坏我们的海洋和江河。/r/n The intentional, usually remote-controlled destruction of a space vehicle, rocket, or missile after launching, as for defective performance or reasons of safety./r/n 毁灭，摧毁因为方案不完善或为了安全的原因，经常通过遥控对已发射的宇宙飞船、火箭或导弹实施的有意的摧毁/r/n
He detached a link from a chain./r/n 他从链子上拆下一个链环。/r/n A number of soldiers were detached to guard the building./r/n 许多士兵被派去保护这座建筑物。/r/n
He answered with an air of detachment./r/n 他以超然的神态回答。/r/n He showed detachment in his judgements./r/n 他表现出独到的见解。/r/n

The act of detaining./r/n 扣押，拘留拘留的行为/r/n A period of time during which a vehicle, person, or material suspected of carrying a contagious disease is detained at a port of entry under enforced isolation to prevent disease from entering a country./r/n 检疫期，隔离期当运输工具、人或材料被怀疑带有传染性疾病，被扣留在港口进行强行隔离的一段期限，以防止疾病传入某个国家/r/n

Given that we do not have complete information about animal detection capabilities, we can only guess as to what the animals are actually sensing./r/n 鉴于我们对动物的察觉能力没能完整的资料，对动物真正感觉到什么我们只有推测。/r/n Pertaining to the detection and isolation of a malfunction or mistake./r/n 用于修饰或说明与故障或错误的检测和隔离有关的特性。/r/n

Repulse after repulse failed to deter Alec, who persisted day by day, at first with a marriage license and holy words./r/n 苔丝一次又一次的严辞拒绝未能制止亚历克，他整天缠住苔丝，先是用结婚证书和神圣的誓言来说服她。/r/n Several factors deter new industry from coming to the city./r/n 许多因素造成了新工业无法进入这座城市。/r/n
I've tried this new detergent with excellent results./r/n 我试用了这种新型洗涤剂, 效果很好./r/n A hard detergent./r/n 抗腐蚀清洁剂/r/n
Relation between the two countries have deteriorate sharply in recent week./r/n 最近几周那两个国家间的关系严重恶化了。/r/n Food is apt to deteriorate in summer./r/n 食物在夏天容易变质。/r/n
She detests having to talk to people at parties./r/n 她讨厌在宴会上为应酬而和人交谈。/r/n I detest all affectation./r/n 我厌恶一切矫揉造作的行为./r/n
This tax can not be introduced without detriment to the economy./r/n 这一税收制度一旦施行，必定会危害国民经济。/r/n He works long hours to the detriment of his health./r/n 他长时间的工作，有损健康。/r/n
Smoking is detrimental to health./r/n 吸烟封健康是有害的。/r/n Something useless, detrimental, or worthless, especially an animal unfit for breeding./r/n 废物无用的、有害的或无价值的东西，尤指不适于配种的动物/r/n
Our Embassy was devastated by three bombs of NATO./r/n 我们的使馆被北约的三枚炸弹炸毁了。/r/n I was devastated by the news of the wreck./r/n 我获悉失事的消息感到十分震惊。/r/n
The area is subject to devastating seasonal winds./r/n 这个地区常遭破坏性季风的袭击。/r/n

Tending to deviate, as from a normal or recognized type; aberrant./r/n 变异的倾向于偏离，如从一个正常的或被承认了的类型；畸变的/r/n If the multitude ever deviate into the right, it is always for the wrong reason./r/n 纵使大众也曾偏向正途也罢，那总是出于错误的原因。/r/n
He works with greater devotion./r/n 他工作得更专心了。/r/n His devotion to music is plain to see./r/n 他对音乐的挚爱是显而易见的。/r/n
The child devours fairy tales./r/n 这孩子专注地听着童话故事。/r/n He sat by the fire, devouring beef and onions./r/n 他坐在火炉旁，狼吞虎咽地吃着牛肉和洋葱。/r/n
He was dictating a letter to his secretary./r/n 他在向秘书口授信稿。/r/n I will not be dictated to./r/n 我不愿受人摆布。/r/n
Hitler is a notorious dictator./r/n 希特勒是一个臭名昭著的独裁者。/r/n They are the dictator and his minions./r/n 他们就是那个独裁者和他的奴仆。/r/n
His secret died with him, for he never told anyone./r/n 他的秘密至死也不为人知，因为他从未告诉过别人。/r/n She's dying to know where you've been./r/n 她极想知道你到哪儿去了。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: v．散布，（光等）漫射，adj．漫射的，散漫的
RECORD.lx: The light was diffused by the leaves./r/n 树叶使光线漫射。/r/n Fashion trends diffuse themselves rapidly around the globe./r/n 时装新潮很快就在全世界流行起来。/r/n
The house is very dilapidated but it has possibilities./r/n 这房子已破旧不堪, 但还有可利用的价值./r/n
The cat dilated its eyes in the darkness./r/n 猫在黑暗中睁大眼睛。/r/n The horse dilated its nostrils./r/n 那匹马张大它的鼻孔。/r/n
Faced with that dilemma, he was perplexed./r/n 他面对进退两难的局面，不知如何是好。/r/n The bad weather put us in a dilemma./r/n 糟糕的天气使我们进退两难/r/n
An inert substance used to dilute./r/n 稀释剂一种惰性物质/r/n
They were unable to sleep because of the din coming from the bar./r/n 酒吧里传来的喧闹声吵得他们无法入睡。/r/n The shouts of the boys dinned his ear./r/n 孩子们的吵闹声把他的耳朵都快吵聋了。/r/n
He lives in a dingy room./r/n 他住在一个肮脏的屋子里。/r/n Rooms in cheap hotels are often dingy./r/n 在低级旅馆中全是又黑又脏的房间。/r/n

They can't be prosecuted for this offence - they have diplomatic immunity./r/n 他们不会因这次违法行为而受到检控 - 他们享有外交豁免权。/r/n He tried to be diplomatic when he refused their invitation./r/n 他在拒绝他们的邀请时，尽可能地婉转些。/r/n
Changing offices has left my papers in complete disarray./r/n 办公室搬迁, 使我的文件全部乱了套了./r/n The troops fled in disarray./r/n 部队仓皇逃散./r/n
They had led the country into economic disaster./r/n 他们把国家带入了经济灾难中。/r/n The disaster caused him to waver in his faith./r/n 这件灾难使他对信仰发生了动摇。/r/n
The new system has had a disastrous effect on productivity./r/n 新制度已对生产力造成了灾难性的影响。/r/n This environmental effect of this new factory could be disastrous./r/n 这家新工厂给自然环境带来的影响可能是灾难性的。/r/n
He was just able to discern the road from the dark./r/n 他在黑暗中只能勉强辨认出道路。/r/n I soon discerned that the man was lying./r/n 我马上察觉出那人在撒谎。/r/n
The judge discharged the prisoner./r/n 法官把囚犯释放了。/r/n How long will the discharge of the cargo take?/r/n 卸货需要多久？/r/n

The manufacturers disclaim all responsibility for the damage caused by misuse./r/n 因使用不当造成的损坏，生产厂家不负任何责任。/r/n The manufacturer disclaim all responsibility for damage cause by misuse./r/n 使用不当而造成的损坏，生产厂家不负任何责任。/r/n
The judges had solemn discourse together./r/n 法官们在一起严肃地交谈。/r/n They listened to his discourse on human relations./r/n 他们听他作关于人际关系的演讲。/r/n
It was not discreet of you to say that./r/n 你那样说有欠考虑。/r/n I'll certainly be most discreet in my conversation./r/n 我在谈话中当然会十分小心的。/r/n

The hours of the meetings will be fixed at the monitor's discretion./r/n 开会时间将由班长自行决定。/r/n I won't tell you what time to leave, you're old enough to use your own discretion./r/n 我不告诉你什么时候离开，你已经长大了，该自己作出决定。/r/n

The price tag says$100 and you charged me for$120; how do you explain the discrepancy?/r/n ＂货物标签上写的是一百美元，你向我索价一百二十美元，这个差异该怎么解释？＂/r/n I thought I had explained away the discrepancy but he had the actual figure and so I left myself wide open to a charge of telling lies./r/n 我以为我已经有矛盾之处作了辩解，但是他掌握了确凿的数字，因此当他把控我说谎时，我毫无招架之势。/r/n

Any of several devices that convert incident electromagnetic radiation of mixed frequencies to one or more discrete frequencies of highly amplified and coherent ultraviolet, visible, or infrared radiation./r/n 激光器使偶然的混杂频率的电磁辐射，变为一个或更多的高度强化和连续的紫外线、可见光或红外线辐射的分离频率仪器中的一种/r/n A discrete part or portion of a work, such as a painting, building, or decorative object, especially when considered in isolation./r/n 细部某项作品（例如绘画、建筑、装饰）的一部分，尤指这些部分被分开来独立考虑的部分/r/n
He disdained that man for snobbishness and was unwilling to talk to him./r/n 他鄙视那个势利小人，不愿和他说话。/r/n I have nothing but disdain for such a person./r/n 对这样一个人，我只有鄙视。/r/n
His illness was a blessing in disguise, because he afterwards married his nurse./r/n 他生病倒是因祸得福，因为后来他和他的护士结了婚。/r/n It proved difficult to disguise his anxiety./r/n 他的焦虑难以掩饰。/r/n
Overloading his stomach with a heavy meal, he was disinclined for any serious work./r/n 吃了不易消化的东西，他不愿去干那些难做的工作。/r/n Be disinclined to do sth./r/n 无意干某事，不愿干某事/r/n
Disinfectant kills germs./r/n 消毒剂灭杀细菌。/r/n Dip your injured finger in the disinfectant to soak out the poison./r/n 把你受伤的手指浸在消毒剂里，把毒浸泡出来。/r/n
Flights have been dislocated by thefog./r/n 大雾将飞机的班次搅乱了./r/n
Rich and poor live side by side but in conditions of extraordinary disparity./r/n 虽然富人和穷人住在一起，但是条件相差极为悬殊。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: v．派遣，一下子做完、吃完n．迅速
RECORD.lx: We soon dispatched the chocolate cake./r/n 我们很快就吃完了巧克力蛋糕。/r/n A messenger was dispatched to take the news to the soldiers at the front./r/n 一名通讯员被派去给前线士兵送消息。/r/n
The company is trying to dispel rumour about a take-over./r/n 公司力图澄清有关接管的流言。/r/n How can we dispel their doubt?/r/n 我们怎么才能驱散他们的疑虑呢？/r/n
The chance of promotion disposed him to accept the offer./r/n 有晋升的机会使他有意接受该提议。/r/n I disposed of my old magazines./r/n 我把旧杂志卖了。/r/n
They showed a disposition to sign the contract./r/n 他们表示有签订合同的意愿。/r/n The choice is no longer in their disposition./r/n 选择权已不在他们手中了。/r/n
They use the press to disseminate right-wing views./r/n 他们利用报刊来传播右翼观点./r/n
He soon dissipated his fortune./r/n 他很快就把财产浪费光了。/r/n The sun dissipated the mist./r/n 太阳驱散了雾。/r/n
Having eyes with greatly distended pupils./r/n 眼珠暴突的具有带有膨大的瞳孔的眼睛的/r/n Swollen or distended beyond normal size by fluid or gaseous material./r/n 肿胀的液体或气体材料超过正常尺寸的肿胀或膨胀/r/n
Purification of water may be achieved by distillation./r/n 水的净化可由蒸馏获得。/r/n We may purge water by distillation./r/n 我们可以用蒸馏法使水净化。/r/n
He passed the examination with distinction./r/n 他以优异成绩通过考试。/r/n We should make a distinction between right and wrong./r/n 我们应该分清是非。/r/n
Premier Zhou is a distinguished politician./r/n 周总理是一位卓越的政治家。/r/n I think grey hair makes you look rather distinguished./r/n 我觉得你灰白的头发使你看上去很有尊严。/r/n
What are you looking so distressed for?/r/n 什么事情使你看起来如此烦恼？/r/n The lifeboat went out to a ship in distress./r/n 救生船去救一艘遇险的船只。/r/n

The noise of cars passing along the road is a continual disturbance to our quiet at home./r/n 马路上来往的车辆声音不断地破坏我们家的安宁。/r/n Those men were charged by the police with causing a disturbance./r/n 那些人因制造骚乱被警方控诉。/r/n
Our views diverged so greatly that it was impossible to agree./r/n 我们的观点存在着严重的分歧，绝无调和余地。/r/n The stream diverges here./r/n 小溪在这儿分岔。/r/n
A point of divergence, especially one of great moment./r/n 转折点分岔点，尤指需要作出重大决择的时刻/r/n Divergence or disagreement, as between facts or claims; difference./r/n 矛盾，不相符不符合或不一致，如在事实和宣称之间；差异/r/n
Her interests are very diverse./r/n 她的兴趣非常广泛。/r/n The program deals with subjects as diverse as pop music and Beijing Opera./r/n 节目涉及从流行音乐到京剧这样形形色色的题材。/r/n
We should get a thorough understanding about the cultural diversity of the United States./r/n 我们应该对美国文化的多样性有一个全面的了解。/r/n A diversity lead to prosperity./r/n 穷则变，变则通。/r/n
The company declared a large dividend at the end of the year./r/n 公司在年底宣布分发高额股息。/r/n An expression to be divided by another; a dividend./r/n 被除数被另一个数除的表达式；被除数/r/n
They have docked us of two days of our annual leave./r/n 他们已从我们每年的休假里扣除了两天。/r/n The two modules docked in outer space./r/n 两个飞行舱在外层空间对接。/r/n
He dodged the falling rock and escaped unhurt./r/n 他闪身躲过了滚落的岩石，安然脱险了。/r/n He dodged past me./r/n 他躲躲闪闪地从我旁边走过。/r/n
The kitchen is my wife's domain, she doesn't like me going into it./r/n 厨房是我妻子的领地，她不愿让我进去。/r/n Military history is really outside my domain./r/n 我对军队史实在一窍不通。/r/n
The dome of St. Paul Cathedral is well known in the world./r/n 圣保罗教堂的圆顶闻名于世。/r/n Upward pressure from underlying magma domes the surface./r/n 地下岩浆的向上推力使地面成圆顶形。/r/n
He's become a lot more domesticated since his marriage./r/n 他婚後已非常恋家了./r/n

A protective case, covering, or structure, such as a plant bud, in which an organism remains dormant for the winter./r/n 离体条芽一种保护性的外壳、表皮或结构，例如植物的芽，在其内部一个有机体处于冬眠状态/r/n He would try to awake their dormant and sluggish faculties./r/n 这位教授应该试图唤醒他们沉睡和懒散的天赋。/r/n
In the accident, the workers received a heavy dose of radiation./r/n 在这次事故中，工人受到大剂量的辐射。/r/n Take one dose of this cough syrup three times a day./r/n 每天服三次这种止咳糖浆，每次服一剂量。/r/n
The tears ran down her cheeks./r/n 泪水沿着她的面颊流下。/r/n It gets cold quickly when the sun goes down./r/n 太阳下山后天气很快就会冷下来。/r/n

The drainage system has been aged./r/n 排水系统已经老化了。/r/n The city was even equipped with a drainage system, for a great many clay pipes were found beneath the narrow streets./r/n 这座城市甚至还敷设过排水系统，因为在窄窄的街道底下发现了许多陶土制的管道。/r/n
It is very dreary to do the same job everyday./r/n 每天都做同样工作是很单调的。/r/n I'm tired of his dreary speech./r/n 我厌倦了他的枯燥无味的演说。/r/n
She has dual nationality./r/n 她有双重国籍。/r/n His dual role as a composer and a conductor made him very busy./r/n 他作曲家和指挥家的双重身份使他非常繁忙。/r/n
One who is easily swindled; a dupe./r/n 傻瓜容易上当受骗的人；易被愚弄的人/r/n A fool or dupe./r/n 蠢人，容易受骗的人/r/n
He finished the work of three years' duration./r/n 他用三年的时间完成了这项工作。/r/n Well, I'm stuck here for the duration./r/n 哎，这段时间我只得呆在这儿了。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．侏儒，矮小的植物v．阻碍…的正常发育
RECORD.lx: The kind dwarf asked the little princess to have dinner with him./r/n 善良的小矮人邀请小公主和他一起吃晚饭。/r/n There is a dwarf apple tree in our garden./r/n 在我们的花园里有一棵矮苹果树。/r/n
My money had dwindled away./r/n 我的钱渐渐花光了。/r/n Drought has dwindled the crops./r/n 干旱使农作物歉收。/r/n
We are looking for dynamic persons to be salesmen./r/n 我们正在寻找充满活力的销售人员。/r/n He has a dynamic personality./r/n 他是个性活跃的人。/r/n
Many people think they have religion when they are merely troubled with dyspepsia./r/n 许多人，当他们只是在患消化不良之时，却以为自己有了宗教信仰。/r/n
Painting was then at its lowest ebb./r/n 那时绘画艺术非常不景气。/r/n A crab was left stranded on the beach when the tide ebbed./r/n 退潮时，一只蟹被困留在沙滩上。/r/n
The club seemed full of eccentrics./r/n 这个俱乐部里好象都是怪人。/r/n She is an eccentric old lady./r/n 她是个古怪的老太太。/r/n
One of his eccentricities is sleeping under the bed instead of on it./r/n 他的怪僻之一是睡觉睡在床底下而不睡在床上./r/n His eccentricity had become legendary long before he died./r/n 在他去世之前他的古怪脾气就早已闻名遐尔了。/r/n
Our happiness was soon eclipsed by the terrible news./r/n 我们的快乐没多久就被可怕的消息蒙上了一层阴影。/r/n It was reported that there would be an annular eclipse tomorrow./r/n 据报道说，明天有日环食。/r/n
Our electricity bills are higher than we can afford we must start to economize./r/n 我们的电费已经高得付不起了--得节省些了./r/n The need to economize scarce energy resources./r/n 节约使用稀有能源的必要性/r/n
We were in ecstasy at the thought of going home./r/n 一想到回家，我们就兴奋不已。/r/n He listened to the music with ecstasy./r/n 他听音乐听得入神。/r/n
The mist eddied round the old castle./r/n 薄雾在那座古老的城堡的周围打转转。/r/n The little paper boat was caught in an eddy and spun round and round in the water./r/n 小纸船卷进了漩涡中，在水中直打转。/r/n
The noisy youths were ejected from the cinema./r/n 吵闹的年青人都已从影院被逐出去了。/r/n Cartridges are ejected from the gun after firing./r/n 开枪后子弹从枪膛里弹出去。/r/n
What you've told me of your plan sounds most interesting; would you care to elaborate?/r/n 你给我讲的这个计划很有意思，你能详细地谈一谈吗？/r/n The curtains had an elaborate pattern of flowers./r/n 窗帘上绘有精美的花卉图案。/r/n
What you've told me of your plan sounds most interesting; would you care to elaborate?/r/n 你给我讲的这个计划很有意思，你能详细地谈一谈吗？/r/n The curtains had an elaborate pattern of flowers./r/n 窗帘上绘有精美的花卉图案。/r/n
The elaborations of the plot made it a difficult book to read./r/n 这本书因内容节外生枝而很难懂./r/n
Three years have elapsed since we met last time./r/n 我们上次相见至今已经三年了。/r/n Three years have elapsed since we last met./r/n 我们上次相见至今已过了三年./r/n
Rubber is elastic./r/n 橡皮是有弹性的。/r/n He has an elastic temperament./r/n 他有开朗的性情。/r/n
Having or exhibiting no elasticity./r/n 无弹性的无弹性的或显示出没有弹性的/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj.得意洋洋的 振奋的
RECORD.lx: Highly pleased; elated./r/n 洋洋得意的；兴高采烈的/r/n He was elated at the news./r/n 这个消息使他很兴奋。/r/n
He succeeded in eliciting the information he needed from her./r/n 他从她那里问出了他所需要的信息。/r/n So remarkable as to elicit disbelief; fantastic./r/n 如此特别以至让人难以相信；精彩绝伦的/r/n

Anyone with an annual income of under 5000 may be eligible to apply./r/n 凡年收入在5000英镑以下者均可申请./r/n If you are eligible for a free upgrade( first90 day, extended service plan), the download number will be include./r/n 如果你有获得免费升级的资格（首90天，扩展服务计划），下载数字会包含在通知里。/r/n
Their team was eliminated in the first round./r/n 他们队在第一轮就被淘汰了。/r/n This new process has eliminated the need for checking the products by hand./r/n 采用这种新方法无须再用手工检验产品。/r/n
A member of a group of elite, highly loyal supporters./r/n 禁卫军一支精锐的皇家军队中的成员/r/n
These ruins are an eloquent reminder of the horrors of war./r/n 这些废墟形象地提醒人们不要忘记战争的恐怖。/r/n He addressed the audience in an eloquent speech./r/n 他向听众发表了雄辩的演说。/r/n
I admire him for his eloquence./r/n 我佩服他的口才。/r/n His eloquence did not avail against the facts./r/n 他的雄辩在事实面前不起什么作用。/r/n
Please elucidate the reasons for your decision./r/n 请把你作出决定的理由解释清楚。/r/n The note help to elucidate the most difficult parts of the text./r/n 这些注释有助於弄清文中最难懂的部分。/r/n

Interpol have searched all the corners of the earth for the elusive hijackers./r/n 国际刑警组织已在世界各地搜查在逃的飞机劫持者。/r/n Men like to pursue an elusive woman, like a cake of wet soap in a bathtub- even men who hate bath./r/n 男人们喜欢追逐那些象浴缸里的湿肥皂般难以捉摸的女人，即使是讨厌洗澡的男人也无不如此。/r/n
The emancipation of women depends on themselves./r/n 妇女的解放依靠她们自己。/r/n The Emancipation Proclamation abolished slavery in the United States./r/n 《解放黑人奴隶宣言》废除了美国的奴隶制。/r/n
The embargo impacted on export revenues./r/n 禁运封出囗总收入有很大的影响。/r/n The minister has lifted the embargo on the export of firearms./r/n 部长已经解除对火器出口的贸易禁令。/r/n
The harpoon struck but did not embed./r/n 鱼叉击中了但并没有插入/r/n

Lewis had created a situation whereby it was possible for the man at the top to fiddle elections, embezzle union funds and do away with potential rivals./r/n 路易斯制造的局面使得该政府首脑不仅能够在竞选中弄虚作假，而且还可以肆意侵吞联邦公款，除掉可能的竞争对手。/r/n
She embodies her principles in her behavior./r/n 她把自己的原则体现在行动中。/r/n The new car embodies many improvements./r/n 这辆新车包含了许多改进的项目。/r/n
She embroidered her initials on the handkerchief./r/n 她把她姓名的起首字母绣在手帕上。/r/n She embroiders very well./r/n 她很会刺绣./r/n
I am too busy to make any embroidery now./r/n 我现在太忙，没有时间刺绣了。/r/n This kind of floss is used for embroidery./r/n 这种丝线用来刺绣。/r/n
It has emerged that he stole the money./r/n 现在终于发现，是他偷了那笔钱。/r/n The sun emerged from behind the clouds./r/n 太阳从云层后面露出来了。/r/n
The rioting grew worse and the government declared a state of emergency./r/n 骚乱恶化，政府只得宣布进入紧急状态。/r/n Ring the bell in an emergency./r/n 情况紧急时请按铃。/r/n
He emigrated from Britain to Australia in order to find a better job./r/n 他从英国移居到澳大利亚，想找一份更好的工作。/r/n Go back there? I'd sooner emigrate!/r/n 回去? 我宁可移居海外也不回去!/r/n
The most eminent doctors treated the king in his illness./r/n 医术最精湛的医生们在国王生病时诊治他。/r/n Characterized by excellence or distinction; eminent./r/n 卓越的，杰出的以卓越或杰出为特点的；卓著的/r/n
A volcano emits smoke and ashes./r/n 火山散发着烟和灰。/r/n The cheese was emitting a strong smell./r/n 干酪散发出强烈的气味。/r/n

Emission and propagation of energy in the form of rays or waves./r/n 发射以光线或波的形式发出和传播能量/r/n In cathode ray tube display, the continuation of light emission from phosphor after excitation by the electron beam./r/n 在阴极射线管显示器中，用电子束激励后荧光物质光发射的持续现象。/r/n

Inquiry into the nature of things based on logical reasoning rather than empirical methods./r/n 自然科学基于逻辑推理而不是凭经验得来的方法来探究事物的本质/r/n Employment of empirical methods, as in science./r/n 经验方法的运用，例如在科学中/r/n
The police had to employ force to break up the crowd./r/n 警察不得不使用武力驱散人群。/r/n Our company employed about one hundred people./r/n 我们公司雇佣了大约一百人。/r/n
The proverb tells us to emulate the industry of the ant./r/n 这格言告诉我们要效法蚂蚁的勤勉。/r/n I wish he'd stop holding the elder brother as an example to emulate./r/n 我希望他不再把哥哥作为自己的学习榜样。/r/n

She worked hard in emulation of her elder sister./r/n 她努力赶超姐姐。/r/n The initial design development stage wherein, at first, it is certain that errors will be discovered which will require design changes. It is in this period that design aids, emulation techniques, and supportive design techniques are essential to quick design./r/n 初始设计开发阶段，首先必须发现可能存在的错误，并作相应的设计修改。正是在这个时期中，设计辅助程序、仿真技术和设计支援技术对于快速设计都是必不可少的。/r/n
