This story encapsulates scenes from his childhood./r/n 这个故事讲的是他童年的事./r/n The chairman's short statement encapsulates the views of the committee./r/n 主席的简短陈辞概括了委员会的观点./r/n
She was enchanted with the flowers you sent her./r/n 她非常喜欢你送的花。/r/n Enchanting as if with a magic spell; fascinating./r/n 令人心醉的使如同有魔咒般迷住的；迷人的/r/n
There is the members' enclosure at the racecourse./r/n 那儿是这个赛马场上的会员座区。/r/n She keeps a horse in that enclosure./r/n 她在那个围栏里养了一匹马。/r/n

Last sheet of paper in a legal document which, when fold, become the outside sheet and carry the endorsement./r/n 法律文件的最后一页，当折叠时，它成了外边的一页并带有背书。/r/n After the endorsement of his home state the candidate campaign in the neighboring state./r/n 得到了本州的支持後，这个竞选者就到邻州游说去了。/r/n
It's an engrossing story./r/n 这是个引人入胜的故事。/r/n She was engrossed in painting./r/n 她全神贯注于绘画。/r/n

A bed of loose sand mixed with water forming a soft, shifting mass that yields easily to pressure and tends to engulf any object resting on its surface./r/n 流沙一种由松散的沙子和水混合成的沙层，形成一堆松软、移动的物质，在压力下很容易塌陷，并可吞没置留在沙面上的任何物质/r/n If an earthquake were to engulf England tomorrow, the English would manage to meet and dine somewhere among the rubbish, just to celebrate the event./r/n 假使明天会有一场地震席卷英国，英国人也会设法在颓垣败瓦中找个地方见面饮宴来庆祝这件大事的吧。/r/n
Long ago enormous animals lived on the earth./r/n 很久以前，地球上生活着巨大的动物。/r/n Of enormous size or magnitude; huge./r/n 巨大的，庞大的规模巨大或大得出奇的；巨大的/r/n
The ensemble of central administrative and governmental services in imperial Rome./r/n 中央行政管理部门罗马帝国时期中央行政管理部门/r/n The principal part in a duet or ensemble composition./r/n 第一声部合（重）奏或合（重）唱中最主要的部分/r/n
My fishing line got entangled in some weeds./r/n 我的钓鱼线同杂草纠缠在一起。/r/n How did Mary manage to entangle her hair so badly in the brambles?/r/n 玛丽的头发缠紧在荆棘上了，她是怎么搞的？/r/n
The new book is entitled Love Story./r/n 这本新书名叫《爱情故事》。/r/n She read a poem entitled The Apple Tree'./r/n 她读了一首题为《苹果树》的诗./r/n

Representing one or all of the members of a class; not designating a unique entity./r/n 非特定的代表某一种类的所有成员或其中一个的；不标志唯一存在的/r/n The inland part of a political or geographic entity./r/n 内陆一个政治或地理实体的内陆部分/r/n
He was accustomed to command, not to entreat./r/n 他习惯于发号施令，而不是恳求他人。/r/n He entreated her not to be angry./r/n 他恳求她不要发怒。/r/n
One, especially an entrepreneur, that undertakes a task or job./r/n 承担者；企业家承担任务或工作的人，尤指企业家/r/n An unsuccessful entrepreneur./r/n 一个不成功的企业家/r/n
Can I entrust you with the secret plans?/r/n 我能把这些秘密计划委托给你吗？/r/n He's entrusted his children to my care for a day./r/n 他托我照看一天孩子。/r/n
She enumerated the items we had to buy./r/n 她列出了我们要买的东西。/r/n The teacher enumerated many examples to us for understanding./r/n 为了我们理解，老师列举了很多事例。/r/n
Nobody can envisage the consequences of total nuclear war./r/n 没有人能想像出全面核子战争的後果./r/n I can't envisage the plan('s) working./r/n 我无法设想计划能否行得通./r/n

An enzyme that promotes the passage of a substance across a cell membrane./r/n 透性酶激活另一种物质穿透细胞膜的一种酶/r/n A substance, especially an enzyme, that initiates or modifies the rate of a chemical reaction in a living body; a biochemical catalyst./r/n 生物催化剂能在活的体内产生化学反应或改变生物体内化学反应速度的物质，尤指酶；生物化学催化剂/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj．朝生暮死的，生命短暂的
RECORD.lx: Short-lived or ephemeral, as a life./r/n 短命的或短暂的，如生命/r/n Perhaps the least prepossessing quality of Fox was that he cares too much about the ephemeral in politics: and Ford displays excessive zeal, to my mind, in teasing out these cares to the last twist and turn./r/n 也许福克斯最不逗人喜欢的一点就是他把短促的政治生命看得过于重了。而在我看来，福特在诱使福克斯说出他的这些关心时显得过分热情，手法千奇百怪，使尽了手段。/r/n
I have an influenza epidemic./r/n 我得了流行性感冒。/r/n There has recently been an epidemic of crime in our major cities./r/n 近来我们一些大城市中罪案频繁。/r/n

Fortinbras speaks the epilogue in Shakespeare's Hamlet'./r/n 在莎士比亚的《哈姆雷特》中, 由福丁布拉斯念收场白./r/n An actor in Elizabethan drama who recites the prologue and epilogue to a play and sometimes comments on the action./r/n 解说员在伊丽莎白戏剧中朗诵序言和尾声以及有时关于演出评论的演员/r/n
Einstein's theory marked a new epoch in physics./r/n 爱因斯坦理论开创了物理学的新纪元。/r/n The teaching method marked a now epoch in education./r/n 这种教学方法标志着教育的新时代。/r/n
The equilibrium of force must be established in Europe./r/n 必须确立欧洲的均势。/r/n An influence or force tending to produce equilibrium; counterpoise./r/n 平衡力趋向于产生平衡的影响或力量；平衡、均衡/r/n
Impartial; just; equitable./r/n 公平的；公正的；无私的/r/n

They shared the work of the house with perfect equity./r/n 他们很公平地分担屋内的工作。/r/n Robert Hood, president of McDonnell Douglas's Douglas Aircraft Co., told reporters today that his company would soon reach an agreement with the Taiwan Aerospace Corp. about the equity sale of$2 billion. The Taiwan company confirmed last week that the deal was in the works./r/n 麦克唐纳·道格拉斯公司所属首格拉斯飞机公司总裁胡德今天告诉记者说，该公司与台翔公司将于短期内达成出售20亿美元股份的协议。台湾公司上周已证实项交易正在筹划中。/r/n
He changed his pounds for the equivalent amount in dollars./r/n 他把英镑兑换成等值的美元。/r/n Changing his job like that is equivalent to giving him the sack./r/n 那样调换他的工作等于是解雇了他。/r/n
The politician gave an equivocal answer./r/n 那政客的答覆模棱两可./r/n Having a grammatical structure that allows of two interpretations; equivocal./r/n 歧义的，模棱两可的一种语法结构可以有两种解释的；模棱两可的/r/n
He eradicated weeds in his garden./r/n 他把花园中的杂草根除了。/r/n Smallpox has almost been eradicated./r/n 天花几乎已经被消灭了。/r/n
She couldn't erase the incident from her memory./r/n 她难以忘记那次事件。/r/n He erases pencil marks./r/n 他擦去铅笔的痕迹。/r/n
The erosion of the coastline by the sea was ignored by people./r/n 海水对海岸的冲刷被人们忽视了。/r/n They had to face the steady erosion of the president's credibility./r/n 他们不得不面对总统的威信日渐丧失的局面。/r/n
You must do the two errands this week./r/n 你必须在一周内完成这两项任务。/r/n I'll go there to do an errand./r/n 我将去那里办件事。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj.反复无常的 古怪的
RECORD.lx: The singer gave an erratic performance./r/n 演唱者未唱出水平./r/n Deliveries of goods are erratic./r/n 不按规定送货./r/n
Violence has erupted on the streets./r/n 大街上突然发生了暴乱./r/n The demonstration erupted into violence./r/n 示威游行中突然出现了武斗./r/n
The eruption of volcano makes many people lose their lives./r/n 火山的爆发使许多人丧失了生命。/r/n The hostilities will be on eruption./r/n 战事即将爆发。/r/n
Even a limited confrontation can escalate into a major war./r/n 即使是局部的对抗也可能扩大成一场大战。/r/n
He offered to be her escort, but she declined it./r/n 他提出护送她，但她谢绝了。/r/n The troop ship was escorted by two warships./r/n 运兵船由两艘军舰护航。/r/n
Belonging to or reserved for a small, select group; esoteric./r/n 秘密的属于一个挑选出来的小群人的；专为其保留的；秘传的/r/n Some words are really too esoteric for this dictionary./r/n 有些单词实在太生僻了，未收入本词典内。/r/n
He keeps a large establishment./r/n 他拥有巨大家业。/r/n The establishment of that school took five years./r/n 兴建那所学校花了五年的时间。/r/n
The old man left an estate of two million dollars when he died./r/n 那老人去世时留下二百万美元的遗产。/r/n He has a beautiful estate near London./r/n 他在离伦敦不远处有一个美丽的庄园。/r/n
The forms of ceremony and etiquette observed by diplomats and heads of state./r/n 外交礼节外交官和国家元首遵守的礼节和礼仪形式/r/n Let us avoid the etiquette./r/n 让我们免除礼节。/r/n
The region near the erupting volcano was evacuated rapidly./r/n 火山爆发处附近已迅速撤空./r/n The soldiers evacuated the area as the enemy advanced./r/n 敌军推进时, 士兵都撤出了那地区./r/n
He could not evade the law./r/n 他逃避不了法律。/r/n Genius is the capacity of evade hard work./r/n 天才是避免苦干的能力。/r/n
John doesn't go out even in the summer./r/n 约翰甚至在夏天也不出门。/r/n He won the first game and I won the second, so now we are even./r/n 他赢了第一局，我赢了第二局，所以我们现在打平。/r/n
The lessor can evict the lessee for failure to pay rent./r/n 出租人可驱逐不付租金的承租人。/r/n The tenant was evicted for non-payment of rent./r/n 这个房客因为没有交房租而被赶出去了。/r/n
Tending or having the power to evoke./r/n 唤起…的，引起…的有能力唤起的/r/n Songs that evoke old memories./r/n 唤起往日回忆的歌曲/r/n
Scratching exacerbates a skin rash./r/n 皮疹搔後会恶化./r/n Her mother's interference exacerbated the difficulties in their marriage./r/n 她母亲从中干预使他们的婚姻雪上加霜./r/n
The seriousness of the situation has been much exaggerated by the press./r/n 形势的严重性被报纸夸大了。/r/n He has an exaggerated idea of his own importance./r/n 他自视过高。/r/n
I can say without exaggeration that she is an angel./r/n 我可以毫不夸张地说她是个天使。/r/n The selected truths, exaggerations, and lies of wartime propaganda./r/n 被选择出来的事实、夸张以及战时宣传的谎言/r/n

He was exalted to the position of general manager./r/n 他被提升到总经理的职位。/r/n All the people of whom you and I are the rag-tag and bobtail, all the camp followers of western civilization, we have taken it for granted that even if we did not live up to those exalted ethical standards, we did a great deal better than anyone else./r/n 我们所有的人，包括你和我这样的下层平民，以及所有西方文明的依附者都认为，即使我们尚未达到那些崇高的道德标准，我们也还是是比别的任何人都干得好得多。/r/n
She was exasperated at his stupidity./r/n 她因为他的愚笨而发怒。/r/n That child exasperates me./r/n 那孩子真让我生气。/r/n
`Stop that noise,' he cried out in exasperation./r/n ｀不要发出那种噪音,＇他愤怒地大喊./r/n
Excavate an ore-rich hillside./r/n 在富矿山上挖洞穴/r/n
Demand began to exceed supply./r/n 开始供不应求。/r/n His knowledge of history exceeds mine./r/n 他的历史知识超过我。/r/n
We found out that he was exceedingly fond of fishing./r/n 我们发现他极其喜欢钓鱼。/r/n My teacher asked me to answer an exceedingly difficult question./r/n 老师让我回答一个非常难的问题。/r/n
He excels all other composers of his period./r/n 他超过了同时期的所有其他作曲家。/r/n He excels in painting./r/n 他擅长绘画。/r/n
Most children like sweets, but there are some exceptions./r/n 大多数孩子都喜欢吃糖果，但也有一些例外。/r/n He took great exception to what I said./r/n 他极力反对我的话。/r/n
This weather is exceptional for June./r/n 六月里这样的天气是反常的。/r/n We've enjoyed an exceptional run of fine weather recently./r/n 我们这里最近天气好极了./r/n
The censor insisted on excising the passage from the film./r/n 电影审查员坚持剪去影片的这一段./r/n The surgeon excised the lump from her breast./r/n 外科医生切除了她乳房的肿块./r/n
The excision, if not done in time, tends to complications./r/n 如不及时切除，可能导致并发症。/r/n The surgical excision of one or both of the adrenal glands./r/n 肾上腺切除术一个或一对肾上腺的外科切除手术/r/n
We cannot exclude the possibility that he killed his wife./r/n 我们不能排除他杀了他妻子的可能性。/r/n No one was excluded from sentry duty./r/n 人人都得站岗放哨。/r/n
The exclusion of women from the temple made them feel sad./r/n 妇女被排斥于寺院之外使得她们很难过。/r/n He spends his spare time gardening, to the exclusion of all other interests./r/n 他把空余时间都用在园艺上了，没有任何其他爱好。/r/n
This company has exclusive rights for the sale of Ford cars in the city./r/n 这家公司享有福特汽车在本市的独家经销权。/r/n Dictionary-making has not been his exclusive employment./r/n 编字典一直都不是他唯一的工作。/r/n
We shall make an excursion to Hangzhou this weekend./r/n 这个周末我们将去杭州旅行。/r/n The excursion was the high spot of our holiday./r/n 我们那个假日的最大乐趣是远足。/r/n
The President of the United States is the chief executive./r/n 美国总统是行政首脑。/r/n He is a man of great executive ability./r/n 他是个具有极高管理才能的人。/r/n
He was appointed to act as the executor./r/n 他被指定为遗嘱执行人。/r/n The executor shared out the estate./r/n 遗嘱执行人把遗产分给各人。/r/n
Poor eyesight will exempt you from military service./r/n 视力不佳将使你免服兵役。/r/n These houses are exempt from paying rates./r/n 这些房子是免付捐税的。/r/n

An exemption from a church law, a vow, or another similar obligation granted in a particular case by an ecclesiastical authority./r/n 特许，赦免在特定情况下，由教会当权者授权赦免的教会法律、誓约或其他类似的义务的免除/r/n The document containing this exemption./r/n 特许状包含这种特许的文件/r/n
Her husband exerted a lot of pressure on her to succeed./r/n 她丈夫殷切地希望她能成功，给了她很大的压力。/r/n He exerted all his influence to make them accept his plan./r/n 他用尽一切影响力使他们接受他的计划。/r/n
Now that I'm 90, I find the exertions of travelling too great./r/n 我已经年届90，出远门已力不从心。/r/n Physical or mental exertion, especially when difficult or exhausting; work./r/n 劳动体力或脑力的运用，尤指出现困难或精疲力尽时；工作/r/n
She exhaled slowly to show her annoyance./r/n 她长叹以示厌烦。/r/n He lit his cigar and exhaled smoke./r/n 他点燃雪茄，然后吐出烟雾。/r/n
The mine was closed owing to exhaustion./r/n 这个煤矿因矿源枯竭而被关闭。/r/n He is in a state of exhaustion./r/n 他在疲惫状态中。/r/n
An exhaustive study./r/n 一项彻底的研究/r/n
The chairman exhorted the party workers to take action./r/n 主席敦促党的工作人员采取行动。/r/n He often exhorts Mary to work harder./r/n 他经常勉励玛丽要更加努力工作。/r/n
He was exiled from the country for one year./r/n 他被放逐一年。/r/n The king was sent into exile./r/n 国王遭到放逐。/r/n
The practice of lending money and charging the borrower interest, especially at an exorbitant or illegally high rate./r/n 高利贷借给他人钱并要求贷者付很高的利息的做法，尤其利息异常地或非法地高/r/n
The film retains much of the book's exotic flavour./r/n 这部电影保存了原著的许多异国情调./r/n Exotic tropical plants in a greenhouse./r/n 温室里引进的热带植物/r/n
The petals of many flowers expand in the sunshine./r/n 许多花的花瓣在阳光中绽放。/r/n Our foreign trade has expanded during recent years./r/n 近年来我们的对外贸易有所扩大。/r/n
Metals undergo expansion when heated./r/n 金属加热时会膨胀。/r/n This book is an expansion of the play he wrote before./r/n 这本书是他以前写的剧本的扩充。/r/n
Expedite offer afraid buyer ready withdraw as others contact him./r/n 糨公司正与之接触，请速予报价，否则买主准备撤走。/r/n Shipment is ready, expedite credit./r/n 船已装完，请速开信用证。/r/n
The mail is conveyed with expedition./r/n 那封信被迅速地传递出去。/r/n They planned to organize a scientific expedition./r/n 他们计划组织一次科学考察。/r/n
He was expelled from the school./r/n 他被学校开除了。/r/n The bullet was expelled from the gun./r/n 子弹从枪中射出。/r/n

An agent that destroys or causes the expulsion of parasitic intestinal worms./r/n 驱肠虫剂，灭肠虫剂可消灭或驱除肠内寄生虫的药物/r/n After his expulsion from the cabinet the minister became the subject of a smear campaign. It seems the media and the public alike take pleasure in hitting a man when he's down./r/n 自从被赶出内阁，这位部长便成了造遥中伤活动的目标，似乎宣传工具及公众舆论都同意喜欢使人雪上加霜。/r/n
I had expended much time on the work but they told me it's useless./r/n 我花了很多时间在这件工作上，他们却告诉我说这是无用的。/r/n The soldiers expended all their ammunition in that fight./r/n 士兵在那场战斗中用尽了所有的弹药。/r/n
The expenditure of money on weapons is very large./r/n 购置武器的开支很大。/r/n Limit your expenditure to what is essential./r/n 你要把开销限制在必要的范围内。/r/n

And the scientist in Boston will be able to call on the expertise of the scientist in Shanghai, and all of it in a matter of seconds./r/n 同样，在美国波士顿的一位科学家，也将能够向上海的一位科学家要求提供专门知识。而这种联系只需要几秒钟的时间就可以接通。/r/n But the areas of our mutual cooperation continue to expand. We have already agreed to cooperate more closely in trade, technology, investment, and exchanges of scientific and managerial expertise./r/n 但是我们彼此合作的领域还在不断增加。我们已经商定在贸易、技术、投资以及科学与管理专门知识的交流等方面更密切地合作。/r/n
My passport is due to expire in two months./r/n 我的护照再过两个月就到期了。/r/n Our current contract is about to expire, and we'll need to discuss a new one./r/n 欧文们现有合同快要期满了，需要再谈一个新合同。/r/n
The expiration of contract is coming./r/n 合同快到期了。/r/n When is the expiration of your driving license?/r/n 你的驾驶执照何时到期？/r/n
He gave me explicit directions on how to get there./r/n 他清清楚楚地告诉我怎样到达那里./r/n She was quite explicit about why she left./r/n 她对自己离去的原因直言不讳./r/n
People should read the related regulations before they exploit natural resources./r/n 在开发自然资源前，人们应该先了解相关的规定。/r/n Television advertisers can exploit a captive audience./r/n 电视广告商能利用被动观众./r/n
The experts are exploring every part of the island./r/n 专家们正在勘查这个岛的各个部分。/r/n He had an itch to get away and explore./r/n 他等不及要动身去探险。/r/n

They decided to make a full exploration of the accident./r/n 他们决定对事故做一次全盘研究。/r/n It is true during their explorations they often faced difficulties and dangers of the most perilous nature./r/n 确实在探险中，他们经常面临着各种最有危险性的艰难和险阻。/r/n

Swiss sculptor, painter, and exponent of surrealism who is best known for his elongated sculptures of human figures, such as Walking Man(1960)./r/n 贾科尼亚特提，阿尔贝托1901－1966瑞士雕刻家、画家、超现实主义者，他最著名的是他对人体外形的拉长的雕刻，如行走的人（1960年）/r/n French painter who was a leading exponent and theorist of the cubist movement./r/n 布拉克，乔治斯1882－1963法国画家，是立体派的主要倡导者和理论家/r/n
The industrial exposition will be held on September./r/n 工业博览会将于九月召开。/r/n He made an exposition of the advantages of nuclear power./r/n 他对核动力的优越性做了阐述。/r/n
You were expressly told not to touch my papers./r/n 已经明确地告诉过你不要动我的文件./r/n "I told you expressly to lock the door, but you didn't follow me."/r/n ＂我明白地对你说过要锁上门，但你没有听我的话。＂/r/n
Her name was expunged from the list./r/n 她的名字已从名册上除掉./r/n
Her skirt has very exquisite lace./r/n 她的裙子有非常精致的花边。/r/n The girl came up with a set of exquisite stamps./r/n 那姑娘拿出一套精美的邮票。/r/n
Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years./r/n 恐龙已绝种几百万年了。/r/n An extinct volcano./r/n 一座死火山/r/n
Is the human race threatened with complete extinction?/r/n 人类是否会受到完全灭绝的威胁呢？/r/n The race was threatened with extinction./r/n 这个种族这时眼看要灭绝了。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: v．强索(to extort money from him)
RECORD.lx: Something of value extorted in this manner./r/n 勒索之物通过此种手段强取的有价值之物/r/n An unwarranted fee, such as one extorted from a new prisoner by a jailer./r/n 勒索的金钱一笔不正当的费用，如看守向新囚犯勒索/r/n
He makes the most extravagant claims for his new system./r/n 他对他的新制度提出过分的要求。/r/n Don't be so extravagant; spend your money more carefully./r/n 不要如此挥霍；花钱要更小心。/r/n
He was driven crazy by the extremity of pain./r/n 极度的痛苦使他发狂。/r/n Either extremity of the main axis of a nucleus, a cell, or an organism./r/n 卵细胞的极细胞核、细胞或有机体的主轴两端的任一端/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj． (人)充满活力的(植物)茂盛的
RECORD.lx: The quality or condition of being exuberant./r/n 充沛，繁茂繁茂的性质或状态/r/n Characterized by coarse humor, exuberant learning, or bold caricature./r/n 文笔粗鄙幽默与讽刺的带有粗野幽默、丰富学识或辛辣讽刺的特征的/r/n
The cost of repairing the fabric of the church was very high./r/n 修理教堂结构的花费非常大。/r/n The whole fabric of the society was changed by the war./r/n 战争改变了整个社会结构。/r/n
He is a fabulous hero in that book./r/n 在那本书中他是个传奇式的英雄。/r/n The little boy's performance is fabulous./r/n 那个小孩的表演真是精彩。/r/n

Equipping an office or plant with computers to facilitate or automate procedures./r/n 给办公室或工厂装备计算机，使办公手续或生产过程更方便或自动化。/r/n A device, such as a saw, used to perform or facilitate manual or mechanical work./r/n 器具，工具用来进行或促进手工或机械工作的器具，例如锯子/r/n
Equipment used to produce such a graph or tracing in facsimile transmission./r/n 传真电报机传真通信中用以制作这样的图表或映描图的设备/r/n A fraudulent imitation or facsimile./r/n 摹本诈骗性的模仿或摹真本/r/n
The party split into petty factions./r/n 该党分裂成若干小派系。/r/n A member of a small governing faction./r/n 寡头政治集团成员一个小的统治集团的成员/r/n
Their love story sounds like a fairy tale./r/n 他们的爱情故事听起来像童话。/r/n There are many stories about the nymphs in Roman fairy tales./r/n 罗马神话中有许多关于仙女的故事。/r/n
That's not a real diamond necklace, it's just a fake!/r/n 那不是真钻石项链, 是假的!/r/n He looked like a postman but he was really a fake./r/n 他看上去像个邮递员, 但实际上是假冒的./r/n

The fallacy has been exposed in its naked absurdity./r/n 这谬论的荒诞性已被充分揭露。/r/n The old illustrator never let his pupils fall for the pathetic fallacy, that empty barrels are lonely./r/n 这位年老的插图画家从不让他的学生受到万物有情谬想的感染，认为空桶是孤独的。/r/n
Human beings are only fallible./r/n 人类本身易犯错误/r/n Everybody is fallible./r/n 人人都难免有错。/r/n
Try to discourage such familiarities from your subordinates./r/n 不要让属下对你这样不拘礼仪。/r/n His familiarity with the local languages surprised me./r/n 他对当地语言如此精通令我吃惊。/r/n
We call him a politics fanatic./r/n 我们叫他政治狂。/r/n She's fanatic about pop music./r/n 她对流行音乐很狂热。/r/n
We watched a fantastic play yesterday evening./r/n 昨天晚上我们看了一场非常精彩的演出。/r/n My daughter likes to describe her fantastic dreams to me./r/n 我女儿喜欢给我讲她那些奇怪的梦。/r/n
I think I fared quite well in the interview./r/n 我觉得我这次面试考得不错。/r/n I reminded her how much the fare was./r/n 我提醒她车票的价钱./r/n
The serpent fascinated its prey./r/n 蛇用目光吓住了它的猎物。/r/n The students were fascinated by his ideas./r/n 学生们都被他的思想吸引住了。/r/n
Mary is full of fascinating theories about men and women./r/n 玛丽对男人和女人充满了迷人的想法。/r/n If I had eyes, how happily would I embark upon so fascinating a study!/r/n 如果我有眼睛，我会多么幸福地从事如此迷人的研究！/r/n
The topic seemed to have a fascination for her./r/n 这个题目似乎对她很有吸引力。/r/n A strong or spellbinding appeal; fascination./r/n 迷人的魅力强烈的或使人沉迷的魅力；魅力/r/n
She is so fastidious about her food that I never invite her for dinner./r/n 她对食物过於挑剔，因此我从不请她吃饭/r/n One who is excessively fastidious in dress, manners, or taste./r/n 爱修饰的人过分讲究穿著、举止或嗜好的人/r/n
The ship sank in four fathoms./r/n 这条船沉下四英寻。/r/n I cannot fathom his meaning./r/n 我不能彻底了解他的意思。/r/n
Finally, her mind gave in to fatigue and she fell asleep./r/n 最后她的心力疲惫不堪，就睡着了。/r/n The patient fatigues easily./r/n 病人容易疲劳。/r/n
My father is always finding fault with the way I do things./r/n 我父亲总是对我做事的方式百般挑剔。/r/n There are several faults in the page of figures./r/n 那一页的数字中有几个差错。/r/n
It's quite clear that the electric car is technically feasible./r/n 很清楚，电动汽车在工艺技术上是可行的。/r/n The plan is feasible in reason but impractical./r/n 这个计划道理上行得通, 但不现实。/r/n
Apparently impossible feats are now accomplished by science./r/n 许多看起来不可能的伟大业绩现在已经由科学实现了。/r/n I was amazed to see his dangerous feat./r/n 他的危险技艺让我感到惊讶。/r/n

Meanwhile, you are allowed to feedback your thoughts and opinions regularly to develop our program and the club./r/n 及时反馈自己的意见和建议，以便不断提高我们节目的质量和促进俱乐部的发展。/r/n Part of the energy can be transferred from one part of a mechanism to another, in a direction opposite to its main flow. That's what we call feedback./r/n 部分能量能以与它主要传播方向相反的方向从一个机械部件传到另一个机械部件，那就是我们所称的反馈。/r/n
The climber fell from a great height./r/n 攀登者从极高的地方坠落下来./r/n I managed to grab hold of the jug before it fell./r/n 我设法抓住了那个罐子才未跌落。/r/n
The fermentation of milk causes it to curdle./r/n 牛奶发酵会凝结起来。/r/n Sugar is converted into alcohol through the process of fermentation./r/n 糖经过发酵变成酒精。/r/n
A person regarded as ferocious or violent./r/n 被认为是残酷和凶猛的人/r/n The ferocious winds seemed about to tear the ship to pieces./r/n 猛烈的狂风仿佛要把船撕成碎片似的。/r/n
We ferried the river on a small boat./r/n 我们用小船渡过那条河。/r/n He went down to the ferry but found the boat on the other side./r/n 他到了渡口，却发现渡船在对岸。/r/n
Fertile soil yields good crops./r/n 肥沃的土地能种出好庄稼。/r/n Producing abundantly; fertile./r/n 多产的，富饶的能大量生产的；肥沃的/r/n
It will be a fertility of year for much raining./r/n 因为雨水多，今年会是丰产的一年。/r/n The fertility of the soil has been greatly improved by the use of pesticides./r/n 土壤施用杀虫剂後肥力大增./r/n
She had a fervent farewell speech./r/n 她发表了热情的告别演说。/r/n Filled with or motivated by zeal; fervent./r/n 热情的充满热情的或为热情所动的；热烈的/r/n
He was fettered by his family and could not travel any longer./r/n 他被家庭束缚，不能再到处去旅游了。/r/n The prisoner was put into the jail with fetters./r/n 这个犯人被戴上脚镣投进了监狱。/r/n
Because of a family feud, he hasn't spoken to his wife's parents for years./r/n 由于两家不和，他已经多年不与岳父母说话。/r/n He eventually killed her because of a long-standing feud./r/n 因为宿怨，他最终杀了她。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj．（爱情或友谊上）易变的，不坚定的
RECORD.lx: He turned out to be fickle - he has left me./r/n 他原来是个善变的人 - 他离开我了。/r/n Fortune's fickle wheel./r/n 多变的命运之轮。/r/n
Fidelity to engagement is a virtue./r/n 信守诺言是一种美德。/r/n Good faith; fidelity./r/n 坚定信念；忠诚/r/n

Because there is so much unemployment, the competition for jobs is fierce./r/n 因为失业严重，求职的竞争十分激烈。/r/n They were having a fierce argument and I thought they might hit each other./r/n 他们正在恶狠狠地争吵，我想他们可能要打架了。/r/n
You don't really care a fig about status./r/n 你对地位真是一点儿也不在乎。/r/n The richly fig out young woman stand out at the party./r/n 那位衣饰富丽的年轻女郎在宴会上引人注目。/r/n

"A sweet temper" is a figurative expression, but "sweet coffee" is not./r/n "甜蜜的性情"是个比喻的说法，而"甜咖啡"则不是。/r/n A purifying or figurative cleansing of the emotions, especially pity and fear, described by Aristotle as an effect of tragic drama on its audience./r/n 情绪的净化情绪的净化或象征性清洗，尤指遗憾和恐惧，亚里土多德把他描述为悲剧对观众情绪的影响/r/n
Put this letter in the main file./r/n 把这封信放在主要文件夹中。/r/n Please file those letters./r/n 请把这些信件存档。/r/n
I don't know how you can read such filth./r/n 我不知道你怎么会看这种猥亵的读物。/r/n Go and wash that filth off your hand./r/n 去把你手上的脏东西洗掉。/r/n
This place is filthy; I don't believe anyone can live here./r/n 这个地方脏极了，我不相信有人能住在这。/r/n My hands are filthy; I'd better go and clean (myself) up./r/n 我的手脏了, 最好去洗洗./r/n

We are trying to get a thorough understanding of the government's fiscal policy./r/n 我们正努力对政府的财政政策进行全面的了解。/r/n Palm Inc, the No1 maker of hand-held electronic organizers, on Monday reported fiscal first-quarter operating results that topped analyst forecasts as sales more than doubled./r/n 掌上型个人电子助理制造商Palm周一公布财政年度第一季的财务报告，营运收入与获利均超越华尔街分析师的预估一倍以上。/r/n
The ship is engaged in pelagic fishery./r/n 这艘船从事远洋渔业。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj．（肌肉）松软的，意志薄弱的
RECORD.lx: Soft and flabby./r/n 柔软松弛的/r/n "I'm getting flabby lying here in bed, " he grumbled, "and look at my hands-smooth as a baby's bottom. What kind of hands are these for a working man to have? "/r/n "我躺在床上肌肉都变得松弛了，"他咕哝道："看看我的手-如此细皮嫩肉的。干活的人怎能有这样的手？"/r/n
After walking for four hours we were beginning to flag./r/n 步行了四个小时以后，我们开始累了。/r/n That plant with purple flowers is flag./r/n 那种开紫花的植物是菖蒲。/r/n
The fire flared up as I put more logs onto it./r/n 我加了几块木材，火顿时亮了起来。/r/n Her nostrils flared angrily./r/n 她气得鼻孔都鼓了起来。/r/n
I want to drink a flask of wine./r/n 我想喝一瓶酒。/r/n The graduations are marked on the side of the flask./r/n 烧瓶侧面有刻度标志./r/n
He's always flaunting his wealth./r/n 他总是摆阔。/r/n She flaunts her new clothes./r/n 她炫耀自己的新衣服。/r/n
The sheep's fleece was white as snow./r/n 羊毛是雪白的。/r/n These sheep have fine thick fleeces./r/n 这些绵羊的毛又细又厚./r/n

The author has managed to trace many incidents in which the long arm of confidence brought the heroine in fleeting touch with the members of the family./r/n 作者设法追溯了许多事件，在这些事件中，由于离奇的机遇，使女主角与这一家庭有了短时间的接触。/r/n A faint or fleeting indication; a trace./r/n 模糊的暗示模糊的或一闪即逝的暗示；迹象/r/n
Capable of being bent or flexed; pliable./r/n 柔软的可弯曲或扭曲的；柔韧的/r/n The gardeners flexed their muscles and began to dig./r/n 园丁们舒腰展臂后才开始挖地。/r/n
This tube is flexible but tough./r/n 这管子柔软但很坚固。/r/n We need a foreign policy that is more flexible./r/n 我们需要一个更为灵活的外交政策。/r/n
A slender smile still flickered across her face./r/n 她脸上闪过一丝微笑。/r/n All the lights flickered for a moment./r/n 所有的灯都闪了一会儿。/r/n
I don't like going to parties because my husband always flirts with every girl in the room./r/n 我不喜欢参加宴会，因为我丈夫老爱跟屋里的每个女孩调情。/r/n They say he's a terrible flirt./r/n 据说他是调情色鬼./r/n
There are many flocks of tourists in the palace./r/n 宫殿里有好几群游客。/r/n People are flocking to the cinema to see the new film./r/n 人们正蜂拥到电影院去看这部新电影。/r/n

A device that reads data from and writes data onto a storage medium, such as a floppy disk./r/n 驱动器从存储媒介（如软盘）上读出或写入数据的仪器/r/n The plastic or cardboard container that holds a floppy disk./r/n 磁盘套子装软磁碟片的塑料套或纸板套/r/n

Silver: quiet. Value fluctuate lower in line with other precious metals on both bullion and futures market./r/n 银：清淡。由于受最近交易低潮的影响，银和其他贵重金属一样，期货和现货市场的数量下降。/r/n Cotton: irregular, the cotton index fluctuate narrowly on the liverpool( england) market./r/n 棉花：涨落不定。在英国利物浦市场上，棉花指数涨落不大。/r/n
Having a fluffy or woolly appearance./r/n 絮状的有绒毛状或羊毛状外表的/r/n A long fluffy scarf made of soft material, such as fur or feathers./r/n 长围巾用如毛皮或羽毛等柔软材料制成的长而蓬松的围巾/r/n
He shielded his eyes from, the glare of the overhead fluorescent lights/r/n 他遮住头顶上方荧光灯曲目的光以保护眼睹。/r/n
She shows a flush of joy at his coming./r/n 对他的到来她表现出一阵兴奋。/r/n Mary flushed crimson with embarrassment./r/n 玛丽羞得脸红了。/r/n

An instrument for measuring a property of light, especially luminous intensity or flux./r/n 光度计用来测量光的性质、尤其是光的强度和通量的仪器/r/n A measure of the induced voltage in a circuit caused by a magnetic flux and equal to the flux times the number of turns in the coil that surrounds it./r/n 碰撞，匝链电路中由于磁通量而造成电伏减少的单位，等于穿过一载流线圈的磁通量与线圈匝数之积/r/n
These documents are useless - they are only wastebasket fodder./r/n 这些文件毫无用处，只配扔进废纸篓里。/r/n Timothy can be used as fodder for cattle./r/n 猫尾草可以作为喂牛的牧草。/r/n
This box of chocolate was wrapped round with foil./r/n 这盒巧克力用箔纸包着。/r/n Wrapping aluminium foil round a joint allows the meat to cook in its own juice/juices./r/n 用铝箔把肉包住使之在原汁中烹制./r/n
This box of chocolate was wrapped round with foil./r/n 这盒巧克力用箔纸包着。/r/n Wrapping aluminium foil round a joint allows the meat to cook in its own juice/juices./r/n 用铝箔把肉包住使之在原汁中烹制./r/n
The paper should be folded in half./r/n 这张纸应该对折。/r/n I folded the handkerchief and put it in my pocket./r/n 我折好手绢，放进口袋里。/r/n
We carried armfuls of foliage to the bonfire./r/n 我们给篝火堆挟来几抱枝叶。/r/n He crouched down among the tangled foliage./r/n 他蹲下把身子藏在紊乱的叶丛中。/r/n
Rice is our essential foodstuff in life./r/n 大米是我们生活的基本食物。/r/n Nowadays, the foodstuffs in our life are more various./r/n 如今，我们生活中的食品越来越五花八门了。/r/n
Anglo-Saxon is the forerunner of modern English./r/n 盎格鲁撒克逊语是现代英语的先驱。/r/n One that indicates or foreshadows what is to come; a forerunner./r/n 预言者指明或预示即将发生的事的人；先驱/r/n

He who murders pays the forfeit of his life./r/n 杀人者偿命。/r/n If man put his country in danger by helping the enemy, his life and possessions were forfeit to the crown./r/n 任何人如帮助敌人危害本国，他的生命财产便被国家没收。/r/n
They forged their manager's signature on the cheque./r/n 他们在支票上伪造了经理的签名。/r/n The ship forged ahead under a favorable wind./r/n 船乘风快速前进。/r/n
He was sent to prison for forgery./r/n 他因犯伪造罪被关进监狱。/r/n He confessed the letter a forgery./r/n 他承认那封信是伪造的。/r/n
They forged their manager's signature on the cheque./r/n 他们在支票上伪造了经理的签名。/r/n The ship forged ahead under a favorable wind./r/n 船乘风快速前进。/r/n
The book has been styled in a modern format./r/n 该书已按照现代版式制作。/r/n It also incorporate new optimization specific to particular server and local database format./r/n 它也把新的优化细节合并到特殊服务器与本地数据库格式中。/r/n
They climbed up the last part of the mountain in formidable weather conditions./r/n 他们在恶劣的天气条件下登上了山的顶峰。/r/n His mother is a most formidable lady./r/n 他的母亲是个最令人生畏的妇人。/r/n
The contract was formulated in difficult legal language./r/n 该合同是用深奥的法律术语订立的。/r/n He formulated his thought clearly./r/n 他清楚确切地表达了自己的思想。/r/n
He has forsaken the bad habit of smoking./r/n 他已改掉了吸烟的坏习惯。/r/n A homeless person, especially a forsaken or orphaned child./r/n 无家可归者一个无家可归的人，尤指一个被遗弃或无父母的孤儿/r/n
There are eight forts in this section of the Great Wall./r/n 这一段长城有八个垛口。/r/n The men in the fort capitulated./r/n 堡垒中的守军投降了。/r/n
There are many fortresses in this area./r/n 这片地区有许多堡垒。/r/n The soldier scaled the wall of the fortress by turret./r/n 士兵通过塔车攀登上了要塞的城墙。/r/n
Singing is not really my forte, but I'll try./r/n 唱歌实在不是我擅长的，但是我试着唱唱看。/r/n Cooking is her forte./r/n 她擅长烹调。/r/n
He bore the pain with great fortitude./r/n 他以极大的毅力忍受了痛苦。/r/n She was successful for her fortitude character./r/n 因为坚韧不拔的性格她成功了。/r/n
Occurring by chance; fortuitous./r/n 侥幸的碰巧发生的，幸运的/r/n In a other word, verb"be" is the most fortuitous verb of change./r/n 换句话说，动词“be”是个变化最不规则的动词。/r/n
There was a forum where meetings were held./r/n 那儿曾是集会的场所。/r/n The letters page serves as a useful forum for the exchange of readers' views./r/n 读者来信版是读者们交换意见的有益园地。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj．恶臭的，邪恶的，v．弄脏 n．（体育等）犯规
RECORD.lx: She has a foul temper./r/n 她脾气暴躁。/r/n The ball was foul./r/n 这球犯规了。/r/n
He is the founder of the party./r/n 他是该党的创建者。/r/n Who is the founder of the scientific socialism?/r/n 谁是科学社会主义的奠基人？/r/n
One forth is a proper fraction./r/n 四分之一是一个真分数。/r/n The door opened a fraction./r/n 门稍微开了条缝。/r/n
Speech is fractional; silence is integral./r/n 讲话是分数；沉默是整数。/r/n
Her leg fractured in two places./r/n 她的腿有两处骨折。/r/n Fracture of the leg can be very serious in old people./r/n 老年人腿骨骨折有可能成为严重疾患。/r/n
He's feeling a bit fragile after last night's party./r/n 他参加了昨晚的聚会之后，现在觉得有些虚弱。/r/n This glass plate is very fragile./r/n 这个玻璃盘子很容易碎。/r/n
The frail wooden bridge cracked./r/n 这座不牢固的木桥断裂了。/r/n I accept that he's old and frail; be that as it may, he's still a good politician./r/n 我承认他年老体衰，然而尽管如此，他仍是优秀的政治家。/r/n
She was frantic with worry./r/n 她愁得要命。/r/n The child's parents were frantic when she did not return home on time./r/n 那孩子没有按时回家，她父母都要急疯了。/r/n
This hair-tonic is a fraud; I'm as bald as ever./r/n 这生发剂是骗人的玩艺，我还是和以前一样秃。/r/n She went through the company's accounts, looking for evidence of fraud./r/n 她仔细审核公司的帐目, 查找欺骗作弊的证据./r/n
The expedition through the jungle was fraught with difficulties and danger./r/n 穿越森林的探险充满了艰辛和危险。/r/n The expedition into the jungle was fraught with danger./r/n 到原始森林去探险充满了危险。/r/n
People think she's a freak just because she's religious./r/n 就因为她信教，人们就把她当成怪物。/r/n He was really confused by the freak result./r/n 这个异乎寻常的结果让他非常困惑。/r/n
You are fretting yourself needlessly./r/n 你是在不必要地折磨自己。/r/n Babies often fret (themselves) when their mothers are not near./r/n 婴儿常常因母亲不在身边而哭闹./r/n
A fringe of trees stood round the pool./r/n 池塘四周耸立着一圈树木。/r/n The estate was fringed with stately elms./r/n 那片地以挺拔的榆树为边界。/r/n
She thought that reading romantic novels was a frivolous way of spending her time./r/n 她认为看浪漫小说是虚度时光。/r/n At 18, he's still rather frivolous and needs to grow up./r/n 他到了十八岁仍然很不懂事，很不成熟。/r/n
I'm feeling rather frustrated in my present job; I need a change./r/n 我感到现在干得很不顺心，需要换一换工作。/r/n The terrible weather frustrated our hopes of going out./r/n 恶劣的天气使我们外出的愿望无法实现。/r/n
She fumbled about in her handbag for a pen./r/n 她在手提袋中搜寻钢笔。/r/n She is fumbling the light switch./r/n 她正找电灯开关。/r/n
He fumed at the delay./r/n 他对耽搁感到愤怒。/r/n The burnt heaps of wood were still fuming./r/n 燃烧的木堆仍在冒着烟。/r/n
The country roads were muddy and full of furrows left by farm carts./r/n 乡间道路泥泞不堪，布满了牛车压出的车辙。/r/n A furrow or groove formed by running water./r/n 犁沟由流水形成的槽或小沟/r/n
There is sure to be a fuss when my parents find the window is broken./r/n 我父母发现窗子被打破后，一定会有一番斥责。/r/n Don't make so much fuss over losing a pen./r/n 别为了丢失一支笔就这样大惊小怪。/r/n
Some girls like fussy dresses./r/n 有些女孩喜欢讲究的衣服。/r/n Are you fussy about what you wear?/r/n 你介意自己的穿着吗？/r/n
A galaxy of film stars attended the premiere./r/n 一群影星参加了首次公演。/r/n There may be millions of worlds in the Milky Way Galaxy./r/n 银河系中也许有几百万个世界。/r/n
The ship lost her masts in the gale./r/n 这船的桅樯被强风吹断了。/r/n The gale blustered all night./r/n 大风刮了一夜。/r/n
He had the gall to sue for damages./r/n 他居然有脸要求赔偿。/r/n The saddle galled the horse's back./r/n 马鞍擦伤了马背。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj．勇敢的，（向女人）献殷勤的
RECORD.lx: He was very gallant at the ball./r/n 他在舞会上对妇女大献殷勤。/r/n These gallant soldiers will protect our country./r/n 这些勇敢的士兵会保卫我们的国家的。/r/n
He won many hearts by his gallantry./r/n 他以勇敢赢得芳心无数。/r/n He got a medal for his gallantry./r/n 他因勇敢而赢得一枚勋章。/r/n
The boy was caught and sold to be a galley slave./r/n 这个男孩被抓住，并被卖到战舰上做奴隶。/r/n The stewardess will get you some water from the galley./r/n 空中小姐会从厨房给你拿些水来。/r/n
He rode off at a gallop./r/n 他骑马疾驰而去。/r/n He galloped the horse along the track./r/n 他沿跑道策马疾驰。/r/n
The murderer was sentenced to the gallows./r/n 杀人犯被判处绞刑。/r/n Save a thief from gallows and he will help hang you./r/n 你救盗匪下绞架，盗匪送你上绞架。/r/n
The manager's arrival galvanized the workers into activity./r/n 经理一来, 工人闻风而动./r/n How can we galvanize the students into taking the responsibility for their work?/r/n 我们怎样才能激励学生对他们的作业负起责任来呢？/r/n
There are many children gamboling around./r/n 那儿有很多嬉戏蹦跳的儿童。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．全音阶，（一领域的）全部知识
RECORD.lx: He runs the whole gamut of dissipation./r/n 他干尽了放荡的事儿。/r/n In his short life he have run the entire gamut of crime, from petty theft to murder./r/n 他在短短的一生中，从小偷小摸到杀人，什么罪都犯过。/r/n

If you can arrive late, then so can I: what's sauce for the goose is sauce for the gander./r/n 你可以迟到, 那我也可以晚来: 一视同仁嘛./r/n If Roger is allowed the day off, why shouldn't I be? What is sauce for the goose is sauce for the gander./r/n 如果允许罗杰休假一天，为什么不允许我休假呢？应该一视同仁嘛。/r/n
Please clear the gangway, thanks for your cooperation./r/n 请别堵住通道，谢谢各位合作。/r/n Seeing him out of the plane and down the gangway gave me a lump in my throat./r/n 看着他从飞机中出来，走下舷梯，我激动得哽咽起来。/r/n
That woman is a garment worker./r/n 那位妇人是一位制衣工人。/r/n The band around the collar of a garment./r/n 领圈一件服装的围绕衣领的圈/r/n
These are cheap and gaudy clothes./r/n 这是些廉价而花哨的衣服。/r/n He dislikes gaudy decorations./r/n 他不喜欢俗丽的装饰。/r/n
It was difficult to gauge how people would respond./r/n 大家的反应如何难以估计。/r/n It's a rain gauge./r/n 这是一个测雨器。/r/n
The old house stood gaunt and empty, a complete ruin./r/n 那栋旧房子荒凉空洞地伫立着，像一堆废墟。/r/n Having a lean, gaunt frame with prominent bones./r/n 骨瘦如柴的身材又细又瘦，骨骼突出的/r/n
She sat gazing out of the window./r/n 她坐着凝视着窗外。/r/n She gazed at me in disbelief when I told her the news./r/n 我告诉她这消息时，她以怀疑的目光注视著我。/r/n
My secretary is an absolute gem./r/n 我的秘书真是个难能可贵的人。/r/n The price of this gem is expensive -- as much so as astronomical figures./r/n 这个宝石的价格十分昂贵－－简直是个天文数字。/r/n

This hatred was generated by racial prejudice./r/n 这种仇恨是由种族偏见引起的。/r/n In fact, virtual reality is exploiting software and hardware of the computer to generate a simulation of an environment, such as an easeful classroom, a breathtaking action and so on./r/n 实际上，虚拟现实就是利用计算机的软件和硬件去产生一种境界的仿真，如仿真一个学习场所，一次惊险的行为等等。/r/n
We have an auxiliary generator in case of power cuts./r/n 我们有一台万一断电时使用的备用发电机。/r/n The generator shuts off automatically./r/n 这台发动机能自动停止运转。/r/n

The generic term for wine, spirits and beer is alcoholic beverages'./r/n 葡萄洒、 烈性洒、 啤酒的通称是酒类饮料./r/n A generic term for all mathematical and logical operations carried out according to precise rules of procedure./r/n 一种用于按照严格的过程规则实现的数学和逻辑运算的通用术语。/r/n
I appreciate your generosity in this matter./r/n 我很欣赏你在这件事上表现出来的宽大胸怀。/r/n His boundless generosity moved us deeply./r/n 他的无限的慷慨深深地感动了我们。/r/n

He chose genetic engineering to be his lifelong career./r/n 他选择了遗传工程学作为终生的事业。/r/n The natural formation in offspring of genetic combinations not present in parents, by the processes of crossing over or independent assortment./r/n 重组父母没有表现而其子嗣自然形成基因重组之现象，这是由于采用了杂交或独立分类的方法而出现的/r/n
Genetics is beyond my scope./r/n 遗传学我是外行。/r/n One who specializes in genetics./r/n 遗传学家在遗传学方面从事专门研究的人/r/n
Her genial smile made every guest feel at home./r/n 她亲切的笑容使每个人都感觉宾至如归。/r/n The man was so genial, so I was drawn to him at once./r/n 这人这么和蔼, 我立刻为他着迷。/r/n
The fact is not germane to this issue./r/n 此事实兴此问题无密切关系。/r/n
There is no ginger in him./r/n 他身上没有活力。/r/n Do you like ginger beer?/r/n 你喜欢姜汁啤酒吗？/r/n

She added a touch of glamour by wearing a beautiful dress./r/n 她换上一件漂亮衣服，增添了一分魅力。/r/n The moon-light cast a glamour over the scene as they danced the Sword Dance./r/n 他们跳起了剑舞，这时明月当空，使景色更加增添了迷人的气氛。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: v．发出眩目光芒，怒目而视
RECORD.lx: The sun glared on the sea./r/n 太阳在海上发出令人目眩的光芒。/r/n They stood there, glaring at each other./r/n 他们站在那，互相怒视着对方。/r/n
The lighthouse of the island gleamed in the distance./r/n 远处岛上的灯塔在闪耀着。/r/n I could see the faint gleam of light in the distance./r/n 我能看见远处微弱的灯光。/r/n
The figure skater glided gracefully over the ice./r/n 花样滑冰者在冰上优雅地滑行。/r/n Youth glided past without our awareness./r/n 青春在我们不知不觉中逝去。/r/n
He showed no glimmer of interest in what you had offered./r/n 他对你给他的东西没流露出一丝兴趣。/r/n The sky was pink with the first glimmer of the dawn./r/n 天空因第一丝曙光而呈淡红色。/r/n

I only caught a glimpse of him sitting in the car, so I can't tell exactly what he looked like./r/n 我只瞥见他坐在车里，所以我无法确切说出他长得什么样。/r/n I glimpsed at her among the crowd before she disappeared from sight./r/n 就在她即将消失在人群里之前，我瞥见了她。/r/n
The street glistened in the rain./r/n 街道在雨水中闪光。/r/n Her eyes glistened with tears./r/n 她眼中的泪水在闪烁。/r/n
The news of defeat cast a gloom over the town./r/n 战败的消息给小城蒙上了一层忧郁。/r/n My eyes slowly grew accustomed to the gloom./r/n 我的眼睛对黑暗慢慢适应了./r/n
It's a gloomy day./r/n 这是一个令人沮丧的日子。/r/n She is always in that gloomy mood./r/n 她总是那样情绪低沉。/r/n
The minister has put a different gloss on recent developments./r/n 部长就局势的最新发展作了另一番解释。/r/n The gloss and glitter of Hollywood seemed fascinating to the girl./r/n 好莱坞的虚荣与繁华似乎强烈吸引着这个女孩。/r/n

The glut of apples sent the prices down./r/n 苹果大量上市，使价钱低了下来。/r/n Children at any party will glut themselves with cake and ice cream, and not touch healthier foods./r/n 孩子们在任何聚会上都会撑饱糕饼和冰淇淋，而不沾有营养的食物。/r/n
These desires gnawed away at us constantly./r/n 这些欲望不断地折磨我们。/r/n The rat gnawed a hole through the wall./r/n 耗子在墙上啃了一个洞。/r/n
They are motivated by the twin goads of punishment and reward./r/n 他们受赏与罚的双重因素所激励。/r/n Stop goading the poor beast!/r/n 别再驱赶那可怜的动物了！/r/n
His gorge rose at the sight of gore./r/n 他一看到血污就作呕。/r/n The fat man gorged himself constantly with enormous desserts./r/n 那个胖子经常大吃甜食。/r/n
The night sky is now gorgeous with billions of stars./r/n 星斗万千，夜空璀璨。/r/n Children shout when they see the peacock spread his gorgeous tail./r/n 当孔雀展现它华丽的尾巴时，孩子们大声叫着。/r/n
He was caught by the police because of the graft and corruption./r/n 他因贿赂贪污被警察抓了起来。/r/n New skin had to be grafted on./r/n 需要移植新皮肤。/r/n
That remote barren land has blossomed into rich granaries./r/n 过去的穷乡僻壤变成了富饶的谷仓。/r/n But now they have been adapted for use as storehouses or granaries./r/n 不过现在它们已经被改建，用作库房或粮仓了。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．花岗石gran（＝grain颗粒）＋ite→颗粒状石头→花岗岩．
RECORD.lx: He has a heart of granite./r/n 他有一副铁石心肠。/r/n The valley ended in a perpendicular rim of granite./r/n 那山谷的尽头是花岗石的断崖./r/n
The newspaper article gave a graphic description of the earthquake./r/n 报纸文章生动地描述了地震的情况。/r/n The graphic arts include calligraphy and lithography./r/n 平面造型艺术包括书法和平版印刷术。/r/n
His whistling grated on her nerves./r/n 他的口哨声使她心烦。/r/n It's her ingratitude that grates on me./r/n 是她忘恩负义把我惹火了。/r/n
Your kindness is grateful./r/n 你的友善令人感激。/r/n He was grateful for all you did./r/n 他对你所做的一切表示感激。/r/n

I was gratified to see how much my birthday present was appreciated./r/n 看到我的生日礼物受到极大的赞赏，我感到高兴。/r/n Now that she has a job in France she can gratify her desire to see Europe./r/n 既然现在她在法国工作，那就可以满足她游览欧洲的愿望了。/r/n
A tip; a gratuity./r/n 小费；赏钱/r/n Money given as a gratuity; a tip./r/n 赏钱，小费出于感激而给的钱；小费/r/n
They went out for a walk on the gravelled path./r/n 他们在碎石小径上散步。/r/n The wheels crunched the gravel./r/n 车轮碾在碎石上嘎吱嘎吱地响./r/n
He doesn't seem to understand the gravity of the situation./r/n 他似乎没有意识到形势的严重性。/r/n We are fully aware of the gravity of the situation./r/n 我们十分清楚形势的严峻性。/r/n
She fell down and grazed her knee./r/n 她摔倒在地，碰破了膝盖。/r/n We are grazing the sheep in the next field./r/n 我们在旁边的地里放羊。/r/n
They planted many flowers in their greenhouse./r/n 他们在花房里种了很多花。/r/n He is building a greenhouse in his garden./r/n 他正在花园中建温室。/r/n
He spent the summer buss table in a downtown grill./r/n 整个夏季，他都在城里一个烧烤店帮助清理餐桌。/r/n A place where grilled foods are served to customers; a grill./r/n 烤肉馆，烧烤店向顾客提供烤菜和烧烤的地方，烤菜餐馆/r/n
What grim weather!/r/n 多讨厌的天气！/r/n His expression was grim when he told them they had lost their job./r/n 当他告诉他们说他们已被解雇时，他的表情十分冷酷。/r/n
People in this area were ground down by hunger and poverty./r/n 这个地区的人们受着饥饿和贫穷的折磨。/r/n We grind up the wheat to make flour./r/n 我们把小麦磨成面粉。/r/n
People in this area were ground down by hunger and poverty./r/n 这个地区的人们受着饥饿和贫穷的折磨。/r/n We grind up the wheat to make flour./r/n 我们把小麦磨成面粉。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．沙粒，决心，勇气 v．下定决心，咬紧牙关
RECORD.lx: The soldiers are hard grit./r/n 士兵们全都是刚强勇敢的。/r/n Grit is spread on roads to make them less slippery in icy weather./r/n 在结冰的天气，在路上撒上砂砾心免路面太滑。/r/n
Wheels leave grooves in dirt roads./r/n 车轮在泥路上留下凹痕。/r/n The sink shelf is grooved so that the water will run off./r/n 洗涤池上开槽是为了让水流走。/r/n
We groped our way through the dark streets./r/n 我们摸索着走过黑暗的街道。/r/n I groped for the door handle in the dark./r/n 我在黑暗中摸索着门把手。/r/n
You can tell from his gross language that the man was uneducated./r/n 从他那粗俗的语言可以看出，这个人没受过教育。/r/n The gross national product had increased 5 percent last year./r/n 去年的国民生产总值提高了百分之五。/r/n
Can you show me the road to Legend Grove?/r/n 你能告诉我到传奇路怎么走吗？/r/n The farmer has an orange grove on the hillside./r/n 那位农民在山坡上拥有一片桔子园。/r/n
The dog growled at me./r/n 那狗向我咆哮。/r/n We heard the thunder growling in the distance./r/n 我们听见远处隆隆的雷声。/r/n
I always feel he has a grudge against me, although I don't know why./r/n 我总觉得他讨厌我，但我不知道为什么。/r/n He grudged me my success./r/n 他嫉妒我成功。/r/n
They will grumble about having to do the work./r/n 他们将为不得不干那项工作而抱怨。/r/n He has everything he needs, but he is still full of grumbles./r/n 他需要的一切都得到了，却还牢骚满腹。/r/n
His face showed guilt though he said he had done nothing wrong./r/n 尽管他说自己没做过错事，他的脸上却显出了内疚的神情。/r/n The lawyer shafted the prisoner into an admission of guilt./r/n 这位律师使得这名罪犯承认了自己的罪行。/r/n
She gulped nervously, as if the question bothered her./r/n 她紧张地咽了一下，似乎那问题把她难住了。/r/n He gulped his food./r/n 他狼吞虎咽地吃东西。/r/n
Oil gashed out from the broken pipe./r/n 油从断裂的管道中喷出来。/r/n His words gashed out./r/n 他的话滔滔不绝。/r/n
A gust of wind blew the door shut./r/n 一阵大风吹来，把门关上了。/r/n A sudden gust of wind wafted the papers off her desk./r/n 一阵突然刮来的风把她桌上的文件吹落到地上。/r/n
He took the child out of the gutter./r/n 他收养了这个穷苦孩子。/r/n A gutter under the eaves of a roof./r/n 水槽屋檐下的凹槽：/r/n
This ordinary quiet guy just freaked out and shot ten people./r/n 这个平时温和的家伙简直发疯了, 开枪打死了十个人./r/n What a downer that guy is!/r/n 那家伙多让人泄气呀!/r/n
The polar bear's habitat is the icy waters of the Arctic./r/n 北极熊的栖息地是冰冷的北极海域。/r/n The moth's habitat is being destroyed and it has nearly died out./r/n 这种蛾子因栖息地正受到破坏，几乎绝种了。/r/n
He was hacking at a tree./r/n 他正在砍树。/r/n The publisher paid his hacks low./r/n 出版商付给他雇佣的文人很低的费用。/r/n
He looks haggard./r/n 他显得很憔悴。/r/n The old lady has a haggard face./r/n 老太太的脸很枯槁。/r/n
It's not worth haggling over a few pence./r/n 为几便士争论不休实在不值得./r/n
The newborn baby has a hairy head./r/n 这个新生儿的脑袋上长了很多头发。/r/n A mammoth is a large hairy type of elephant in ancient times./r/n 猛犸是古代一种身体庞大、长着长毛的大象。/r/n
The car came to a halt just in time to prevent an accident./r/n 汽车及时停下，避免了一场车祸。/r/n The soldiers halted for a rest./r/n 士兵们停下来休息。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: v．妨碍，阻挠 n．有盖提篮
RECORD.lx: Our progress was hampered by the bad weather./r/n 我们前进时受到了恶劣天气的阻碍./r/n
Pick up the typewriter case by the handle./r/n 抓住把手，把打字机箱子拿起来。/r/n We don't handle that sort of book./r/n 我们不经销那一类书。/r/n
A fighter plane is revving up on the hanger apron./r/n 飞机库前面停机坪上，一架战斗机正在起动。/r/n One more thing, I also need a couple more of hangers./r/n 还有一件事，我还需要两三个衣架。/r/n
Political dissidents complained that they are harassed by the police./r/n 持有不同政见者申斥他们受到警方的骚扰。/r/n He always looks harassed./r/n 他老是愁眉苦脸。/r/n
A source of harassment, annoyance, or pain./r/n 使人痛苦的东西骚扰，烦恼或痛苦的来源/r/n There is a report about a sexual harassment in the office on this newspaper./r/n 今天的报纸上有一篇关于办公室里的性骚扰的报道。/r/n
The crowing of the cock is a harbinger of dawn./r/n 鸡啼报晓。/r/n The cuckoo is a harbinger of spring./r/n 布谷鸟预告春天的来临。/r/n
This harbor is a natural harbor./r/n 这个港口是天然港。/r/n Harboring criminals is an offence in law./r/n 窝藏罪犯是犯法的。/r/n
A few hardy people swam in the icy water./r/n 一些强壮的人在冰冷的水中游泳。/r/n Strawberry is hardy and easy to grow in all soil./r/n 草莓耐寒，各种土壤里都容易生长。/r/n
The farmer harnessed the horse./r/n 农夫给马套上挽具。/r/n The cashier died in harness./r/n 出纳员以身殉职。/r/n
She hastened home after hearing the news./r/n 听到这个消息后，她匆匆忙忙地回家。/r/n Some of our staff are to be dismissed, but I hasten to add you won't be among them./r/n 有些职员要被解雇，不过请放心，你不在此列。/r/n
Three of the chickens hatched today./r/n 今天有三只小鸡出壳。/r/n Chicks are hatching from the eggs./r/n 小鸡正从蛋壳里孵出来。/r/n

The nobles treated the common people with haughty contempt./r/n 王公贵族以不屑一顾的傲慢态度对待平民百姓。/r/n Some of the more haughty of aristocracy did take exception at his neglecting to raise his cap to them./r/n 一些较为傲慢的贵族对于他不记得向他们脱帽致敬大为不满。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: v．常到，（鬼魂）出没。（事情）萦绕心头n．常去的地方
RECORD.lx: The years of the war still haunt me./r/n 战争年代的往事仍常浮现在我的脑海。/r/n A spirit haunts the castle./r/n 幽灵常出没于古堡。/r/n
They have made their home a haven for the homeless orphans./r/n 他们把自己的家变成了无家可归的孤儿们的避难所。/r/n He came to see us after I have haven my breakfast./r/n 我吃过早饭后，他来看我们了。/r/n
The earthquake wreaked havoc on the city./r/n 地震对这个城市造成了大破坏。/r/n The earthquake has made great havoc of the city./r/n 地震给这个城市造成了巨大的破坏。/r/n
Hawks will not pick other hawks' eyes out./r/n 同类不相残。/r/n The hawk snatched the chicken and flew away./r/n 老鹰抓住小鸡飞走了。/r/n
There are many serious health hazards associated with smoking./r/n 许多危害健康的情况都与吸烟有关。/r/n He hazarded all his money in the attempt to save the business./r/n 他为挽救这家企业，不惜冒险投入他的全部金钱。/r/n

Free of a difficult or hazardous situation; in a position of safety or security./r/n 脱离险境脱离困难或危险的情况；处于安全或保险的位置/r/n Investment is a hazardous business; even those who are in the swim sometimes come a cropper./r/n 投资是一项风险事业，就是那些懂行的人有时也会栽跟头。/r/n
What heading do these items fall under?/r/n 这几项应列在哪个标题下面?/r/n What heading does this come under?/r/n 这个编在什麽标题之下?/r/n
The books lay in a heap on the floor./r/n 书堆放在地板上。/r/n We have heaps of time./r/n 我们有很多时间。/r/n
He hove a chair through the window./r/n 他把椅子从窗户中抛出。/r/n Heave ho, my hearties!/r/n 伙伴们, 用力呀!/r/n
The journalist lead a hectic life./r/n 新闻记者过着紧张兴奋的生活。/r/n
Will the hedge keep the sheep out of the field?/r/n 这篱笆能将羊群挡在田地外面吗？/r/n We had better get under the lee of the hedge until the rain stops./r/n 我们最好在树篱下躲一躲等雨停。/r/n
We found a little hedgehog in the field./r/n 我们在田里发现了一只小刺猬。/r/n The hedgehog rolled up into a spiky ball./r/n 刺 卷起身子成了一个刺球./r/n
Now heed what I say./r/n 现在注意听我要说的话。/r/n Storm warnings are clearly displayed on motorways, but many drivers still take no heed of them./r/n 汽车道上醒目地放着有暴风雪的告示，但许多司机们却没留心。/r/n
I'm just kicking my heels until the beginning of the new term./r/n 新学期开学前，我一直无所事事。/r/n The police were on our heels./r/n 警察紧追着我们。/r/n
Prince Charles is the legal heir of the crown./r/n 查尔斯王子是王位的合法继承人。/r/n He is the only legal heir of the rich man./r/n 他是这位富翁的唯一法定继承人。/r/n
He took an heiress to wife and was regarded with suspicion by her family./r/n 他娶了个女继承人为妻子，女方家庭对他的结婚动机抱有怀疑。/r/n The robber abduct the heiress and hold her to ransom./r/n 强盗劫持了女继承人并向她索取赎金。/r/n
These policemen wear helmets to protect them./r/n 这些警察戴着头盔保护自己。/r/n Jerry: I never had a beard. I kept my hair inside the helmet./r/n 杰端：我以前是从不留胡子，我头发是在头盔里。/r/n
The cuckoo is the herald of the spring./r/n 杜鹃报春。/r/n In England the cuckoo is the herald of spring./r/n 在英国杜鹃鸟是报春的使者。/r/n
The photographer took a photo of a herd of elephants./r/n 这位摄影师拍了一张象群的照片。/r/n The herdsman looks after a herd of animals./r/n 牧人放牧着一群牲畜。/r/n

These beautiful old palaces are part of our national heritage./r/n 这些美丽的古老宫殿是我们民族遗产的一部分。/r/n Telling conservationists that we need to preserve the natural heritage really is preaching to the converted!/r/n 向自然资源保护论者宣讲需要保护自然界遗产的道理, 真是多此一举./r/n
There is a heterogeneous mass of papers in the teacher's office./r/n 老师的办公室里堆满了大批不同的论文。/r/n The quality or state of being heterogeneous./r/n 多种多样含有多种成分的性质或状态/r/n
I haven't seen hide nor hair of him./r/n 我连他的影子也没见到。/r/n I hid the broken plate behind the table./r/n 我把打碎的盘子藏在餐桌后面了。/r/n
He suffered a hideous torment when the enemy caught him./r/n 敌人抓到他后，他受到可怕的折磨。/r/n She calls the new opera house "that hideous erection"./r/n 她把新歌剧院叫作 “那讨厌的庞然大物”。/r/n
It's not as if he was very important in the company hierarchy./r/n 他在公司的领导层中似乎无多大权力。/r/n One who occupies a position of authority in a religious hierarchy./r/n 祭祀长，高僧，大主教掌握高级职位或有权威的宗教领袖/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj．充满欢乐的，引起大笑的
RECORD.lx: Her book is a hilarious send-up of a conventional spy story./r/n 她写的书用的是取笑传统侦探小说的笔法，令人捧腹。/r/n The party get quite hilarious after they bring more wine./r/n 当他们拿来更多葡萄酒後聚会变得十分热闹起来。/r/n
Heavy snow hindered the construction work./r/n 大雪妨碍了这项建筑工程的进行。/r/n The crowd hindered him from leaving./r/n 人群使他无法脱身。/r/n
Some kitchen gadgets are more of a hindrance than a help./r/n 有些小炊具非但没有用处反而碍事。/r/n She regarded him as a hindrance./r/n 她认为他是一个障碍。/r/n
The door opens easily because the hinges were oiled./r/n 这门开起来很容易，因为合页上了油。/r/n A casement is a window that opened by means of hinge at the side./r/n 竖铰链窗是一种用边上的铰链开启的窗户。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: v．作嘘声，（蛇等）发出嘶嘶声
RECORD.lx: The iron hissed as it pressed the wet cloth./r/n 熨斗压在湿布上时发出嘶嘶声。/r/n Hearing the hiss of gas, he rushed in and turned it off./r/n 听到煤气的嘶嘶声，他冲进来把它关掉。/r/n
We shouted ourselves hoarse at the football match./r/n 足球比赛时我们把嗓子都喊哑了。/r/n She screamed herself hoarse./r/n 她把嗓子喊哑了。/r/n
We need a hoist to lift the concrete blocks./r/n 我们需要一台起重机来吊起混凝土块。/r/n The sailors hoisted the flags in the morning./r/n 水手们早晨把旗子升起来。/r/n
The city is held by the enemy./r/n 这座城市已被敌人占领。/r/n Hold yourself still for a moment while I take your photograph./r/n 我给你拍照的那一刹那, 你不要动。/r/n
This tree looks high and strong but actually its trunk is hollow./r/n 这棵树看起来又高又壮，实际上树干是空的。/r/n His protests on human rights sound hollow./r/n 他就人权问题提出的抗议听来很空洞。/r/n

It is unthinkable that we should allow a nuclear holocaust to occur./r/n 我们若竟让核武器大屠杀的惨剧发生, 简直是匪夷所思./r/n It is unthinkable that we shall allow a nuclear holocaust to occur./r/n 我们若竟让核武器大屠杀的惨剧发生，简直是匪夷所思。/r/n
We had a homely meal of bread and cheese./r/n 我们吃了一顿面包加乳酪的家常便餐。/r/n Luke's homely, unpretending style, and his pleasing address catch the ear of the people./r/n 卢克朴实而不矜持的作风以及讨人喜欢的谈吐使得人们都很愉快。/r/n
The state or quality of being homogeneous./r/n 同质同质或相似的性质或状态/r/n A dense, homogeneous rock with constituents so fine that they cannot be seen by the naked eye./r/n 隐晶岩，非显晶岩一种成分细密肉眼不能看到的致密同质岩石/r/n
They took the phone off the hook so no calls would disturb them./r/n 他们摘下电话听筒，以免电话打扰他们。/r/n Please hook the rope over the nail./r/n 请把绳子挂在那根钉子上。/r/n
The sun appeared above the horizon./r/n 太阳出现在地平线上。/r/n The sun sank below the horizon./r/n 太阳已沈入地平线。/r/n

The doctor told him that his disease was caused by unbalanced hormone./r/n 医生告诉他他的病是由荷尔蒙失衡引起的。/r/n A chemical, such as a hormone, a fungicide, or an insecticide, that improves the production of crops./r/n 农药，农用化学品用来增加作物产量的化学品，如激素、杀菌剂、杀虫剂/r/n
The driver blew his horn when the child stepped in front of the car./r/n 当小男孩走到汽车前面时，汽车司机按响了喇叭。/r/n He is an agreeable fellow, but likes to blow his own horn./r/n 他是一个随和的人，但就是喜欢自吹自擂。/r/n
The news struck him with horror./r/n 那消息使他震惊。/r/n He was filled with horror at the bad news./r/n 听到这个坏消息，他心里充满恐怖。/r/n
The host's hospitality left us a very good impression./r/n 主人的好客给我们留下了非常好的印象。/r/n Mrs Brown is known for her hospitality./r/n 布郎太太以好客闻名。/r/n
At the end of the party, we thanked our host and went away./r/n 宴会结束时，我们谢了主人后便回家去了。/r/n Which country will be the host country for the next Olympic Games?/r/n 哪个国家将是下届奥运会的主办国？/r/n
The company took the cars as hostage./r/n 公司把汽车当做抵押品。/r/n He kept the pilot as a hostage./r/n 他把驾驶员当做人质。/r/n
The new government was hostile to them./r/n 新政府对他们怀有敌意。/r/n He shielded me from hostile criticism./r/n 他庇护我使我免受怀敌意的批评。/r/n
The police are always hounding me./r/n 警方一直在追捕我。/r/n He has been hounded by his creditors in the past few months./r/n 近几个月来，他一直被债主追债。/r/n
The mercury hovered around 35 Celsius degree./r/n 水银温度计停留在摄氏35度左右。/r/n The hawk is hovering overhead./r/n 鹰在头顶上盘旋。/r/n
The dog howled over its master's body./r/n 狗对着主人的尸体哀嚎。/r/n The baby howled all night./r/n 那婴儿哇哇地哭了一夜。/r/n

A slot for a key in the hub or shaft of a wheel./r/n 键槽轮子的毂或轴里的键的沟槽/r/n The capital and largest city of Malaysia, on the southwest Malay Peninsula northwest of Singapore. Founded by tin miners in1857, it is the commercial and industrial hub of the country. Population, 937,817./r/n 吉隆坡马来西亚的首都和最大城市，位于马来半岛的西南部、新加坡西北。于1857年由锡矿工人建立，现为该国的商业和工业中心。人口937，817/r/n

RECORD.meaning: v．挤成一堆 n．一堆人（杂物）
RECORD.lx: This novel appeared to have been huddled together./r/n 这部小说看来是草草写成的。/r/n He huddled the children into the automobile./r/n 他急急忙忙地把孩子们推进汽车。/r/n
The diamond shone with every hue under the sun./r/n 这颗钻石在阳光下显得色彩斑斓。/r/n A neutral hue./r/n 中性色彩/r/n
Some fruits and seeds have hulls./r/n 有些水果和种子有外壳。/r/n The hull of a ship loomed up suddenly through the fog./r/n 一条船的船体突然黑压压地在雾中出现。/r/n
People have found many humane methods of killing animals./r/n 人们已经发明了很多宰杀动物的人道方 法。/r/n A humane society always does well by its old people./r/n 一个仁慈的社会对待老人总是很好。/r/n
We should treat people and animals with humanity./r/n 我们应该仁慈地对待人和动物。/r/n Such a man is a stain to humanity./r/n 这种人是人类的耻辱。/r/n
He is a very humble person./r/n 他是一个非常谦恭的人。/r/n Knowledge makes humble; ignorance make proud./r/n 【谚】知识使人谦虚，无知使人骄傲。/r/n
Foods are easily to be mouldy in humid days./r/n 潮湿的日子里，食物很容易发霉。/r/n The humid climate didn't agree with him./r/n 那潮湿的气候对他不合适./r/n
It's said by forecast that the humidity in the air today is 60%./r/n 据预报说今天的空气湿度是百分之六十。/r/n Humidity is a measure of moisture in the atmosphere./r/n 湿度是空气内含水分多少的量度./r/n
She was humiliated because her children behaved so badly./r/n 她为她的孩子表现不好而感到羞辱。/r/n He felt humiliated when the teacher scolded him in front of the whole class./r/n 老师在全班同学面前批评他使他感到羞辱。/r/n
It is not wise to humour a small child./r/n 纵容一个小孩是不明智的。/r/n A sense of humour is prerequisite to understanding her work./r/n 要理解她的作品就必须具有幽默感。/r/n
The hunter hurled his spear at the tiger./r/n 猎人用力把他的长矛向虎投去。/r/n I'll hurl him out of the club if he dare tell the secret!/r/n 如果他胆敢泄密，我就要把他赶出俱乐部。/r/n
It was blowing gales of hurricane this time yesterday./r/n 昨天的这个时候正刮着狂风。/r/n The hurricane has a speed of 73 miles per hour./r/n 飓风每小时73英里。/r/n
She hushed the baby to sleep./r/n 她使婴儿安静入睡。/r/n There was a sudden hush./r/n 突然肃静下来。/r/n
A mule is a hybrid of a donkey and a horse./r/n 骡子是公驴和母马交配而生的杂种。/r/n The hybrid offspring of a coyote and a feral dog./r/n 科伊狗丛林狼和野狗的杂交后代/r/n
In the interests of hygiene, please do not smoke in the shop./r/n 为健康着想，请不要在本店吸烟。/r/n People should wash regularly to ensure personal hygiene./r/n 人们应经常洗澡以保证个人卫生。/r/n
I can hear the hymn from the nearby church./r/n 我能听到从附近的教堂传来的圣歌。/r/n A Protestant hymn melody./r/n 赞美诗曲调新教赞美诗的曲调/r/n
The government's claim to be concerned about unemployment is sheer hypocrisy./r/n 政府声称对失业表示关注纯属做做姿态。/r/n She strongly denounced the Government's hypocrisy./r/n 她强烈谴责政府虚伪./r/n
All these fact have borne out the hypothesis./r/n 所有这些事实证明了假设的正确性。/r/n Several conclusions flow from this hypothesis./r/n 从这项假设中可以得出几个结论。/r/n

A hypothetical substance formerly thought to be a volatile constituent of all combustible substances released as flame in combustion./r/n 燃素，热素原来假设的在所有燃烧物质中挥发性的一种物质成分，在燃烧中作为火焰而被释放出来/r/n The actual or hypothetical organism or stock from which later kinds evolved./r/n 物种原形演化成后来各物种的真实存在的或假设的有机物/r/n

The abnormal, spasmodic swallowing of air, especially as a symptom of hysteria./r/n 吞气症异常的痉挛性吞气，特指歇斯底里的症状/r/n Affected by the vapors; given to spells of hysteria or low spirits./r/n 易忧郁的，忧郁症的被忧郁影响的；被施加了歇斯底里或情绪低落的咒语的/r/n

An icon appears in the upper portion of the screen to indicate when the microphone is muted./r/n 当对麦克风进行消音时，会在屏幕的上部出现一个图标。/r/n Arrange the icon of all minimize application across the bottom of the screen./r/n 沿着屏幕的底部排列所有最小化的应用程序。/r/n
The identification of the accident victims took some time./r/n 验明事故遇难者身分的工作费了不少时间/r/n The study of fingerprints as a method of identification./r/n 指纹学对指纹作为确认身份的一种方法的研究/r/n
Can you identify your umbrella among this lot?/r/n 你能在这些伞中认出你自己的伞吗？/r/n One can not identify happiness with wealth./r/n 幸福和财富不能混为一谈。/r/n
The ideology of the political left./r/n 左派，左翼政治左派的意识形态、观点/r/n An advocate of a particular ideology, especially an official exponent of that ideology./r/n 理论家，倡导者某一理论的提倡者，尤指对此意识形态的正式阐释/r/n
He is an idiot to agree./r/n 他要是同意，就太傻了。/r/n What a stupid idiot!/r/n 真是个愚蠢的白痴!/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj．不做事的，懒惰的v．浪费光阴
RECORD.lx: Don't idle away your time./r/n 不要虚度光阴。/r/n We can't afford to have all this expensive machinery lying idle./r/n 让所有这些机器闲置着，我们可负担不起损失。/r/n
Don't make an idol of money./r/n 不要崇拜财富。/r/n The fans of the actress craned their necks to catch a glimpse of their idol./r/n 那位女演员的崇拜者们伸长了脖子想看一看他们崇拜的偶像。/r/n

In a modern coal burning electric generating plant the steam may be hot enough to ignite wood./r/n 在一个烧煤的现代化发电厂内，蒸汽允许能热到足以把木头点燃起来。/r/n A small solid cylinder of a spark-producing alloy, used in lighters to ignite the fuel./r/n （打火机用的）电石一种由能产生火星的、坚硬的合金小圆柱体，用于点燃打火机燃料/r/n
Ignorance of the law is no excuse./r/n 不懂法律不是藉口。/r/n Pleading ignorance of the law won't help you if you are caught./r/n 假若因犯法被抓住，藉口不知是犯法亦无济於事。/r/n
Her signature was an illegible scrawl./r/n 她的签字潦草难辩。/r/n The lettering on the gravestone was badly worn and almost illegible./r/n 墓碑上的文字已严重磨损难以辨认./r/n

He makes a lot of money by traffic illicit merchandise./r/n 他做违禁商品买卖赚了许多钱。/r/n Kept or done in secret, often in order to conceal an illicit or improper purpose./r/n 秘密的，暗中的保密的或秘密进行的，常为隐藏一个非法的或不正当的目的/r/n
The boy is an illiterate child./r/n 那个孩子不识字。/r/n You must be an illiterate if you've never heard of Marx./r/n 要是连马克思也没听说过，那你一定是个文盲。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．照明，古书上的图案、装饰
RECORD.lx: The illumination in this room is very bad./r/n 这个屋子的照明很不好。/r/n The illumination of the manuscript is delicate./r/n 这个手稿的装饰很精致。/r/n
Children like books filled with illustrations./r/n 孩子们喜欢插图丰富的书。/r/n To give a definition of a word is more difficult than to give an illustration of its use./r/n 给一个词下定义要比举例说明它的用法困难。/r/n
All the characters in this book are imaginary./r/n 这本书中的人物都是虚构的。/r/n People still have a general fear for the imaginary infernal powers./r/n 人们对于虚构的地狱中的鬼神仍具有一种普遍的恐惧。/r/n
The body is material but the soul is immaterial./r/n 躯体是有形的，而灵魂是无形的。/r/n The doctrine that the material world is an immaterial product of the senses./r/n 物质世界幻觉说认为物质世界是感觉的精神上产物的信仰/r/n
It's almost impossible to find him in the immense ocean./r/n 在无边无际的海洋中要找到他几乎是不可能的。/r/n The performance was immense./r/n 演出极为成功。/r/n
He immersed himself totally in his work./r/n 他埋头于工作。/r/n Please immerse the plant in water for a few minutes./r/n 把那棵植物在水里浸泡几分钟。/r/n
An announcement of further cuts in government expenditure is imminent./r/n 最近将发布进一步削减政府开支的公告。/r/n No one has given out a warning of the imminent danger./r/n 没有人对即将发生的危险发出警告。/r/n
Some people still think it is immoral to have sex before marriage./r/n 有些人仍然认为婚前的性行为是不道德的。/r/n An evil, degrading, or immoral practice or habit./r/n 不道德行为，恶习邪恶的、堕落的或者不道德的行为或者习惯/r/n
The little girl is very interested in the old legend of immortal creatures./r/n 小女孩对有关永生的精灵的古老传奇非常感兴趣。/r/n He left behind an immortal example to all posterity./r/n 他给后世留下了不朽的典范。/r/n
He seems to be immune to criticism./r/n 他似乎不受批评的影响。/r/n The criminal was told he would be immune if he helped the police./r/n 这个罪犯被告知，如果他协助警方就可以免于被起诉。/r/n
He has diplomatic immunity./r/n 他有外交豁免权。/r/n They can't be prosecuted for this offence - they have diplomatic immunity./r/n 他们不会因这次违法行为而受到检控 - 他们享有外交豁免权。/r/n
Have you been immunized (against smallpox) yet?/r/n 你接种过（抗天花）疫苗没有?/r/n

His illness has impaired his efficiency./r/n 生病降低了他的效率。/r/n On a communications link, noise or unwanted signals that impair the receipt or correct interpretation of speech or data./r/n 在通信链路上出现的噪音或无用的信号，它损害语音、数据的接收或正确的解释。/r/n

A teacher's aim is to impart knowledge./r/n 教师的作用是传授知识。/r/n Any of various water-soluble pigments that impart to flowers and other plant parts colors ranging from violet and blue to most shades of red./r/n 花青素一种可溶性颜料，可以使花和其它植物部位产生颜色，其颜色变化从紫色和蓝色到大多数红色/r/n
People in the city held the impartial judge in high regard./r/n 这个城市的人们都很尊敬这位公正的法官。/r/n Impartial; just; equitable./r/n 公平的；公正的；无私的/r/n
What impedes you to make progress?/r/n 什么事妨碍你取得进步？/r/n He impedes me to do the job well./r/n 他妨碍我把工作做好。/r/n
Prompt action is imperative./r/n 果断的行动是必要的。/r/n Job creation has become an imperative for the government./r/n 创造就业机会是政府必须做的事。/r/n

The present conflict may provide fresh impetus for peace talk./r/n 目前的冲突可能会给和谈提供新的推动力。/r/n The historic strike gave an enormous impetus to the whole American labor movement./r/n 这次历史性的罢工对整个美国的劳工运动起了很大的推动作用。/r/n
Milton implanted in his daughters a great fear of, if not respect for, their father./r/n 密尔顿对他女儿们灌输的思想不是尊父，就是惧父。/r/n Implant a pacemaker; implant a drug capsule./r/n 植入一个起搏器；植入一个药物胶囊/r/n
What implements are needed for gardening?/r/n 园艺需要些什么工具？/r/n The government is implementing a new policy to help the unemployed./r/n 政府正在实施一项新的帮助失业者的政策。/r/n
He was deeply implicated (ie involved) in the plot./r/n 他与该阴谋牵涉颇深./r/n His enemies tried to implicate him (in the murder)./r/n 他的仇人竭力想把他牵扯进谋杀案中./r/n
Failure to say `No' may, by implication, be taken to mean `Yes'./r/n 没表示否定, 其含义可能理解为是肯定的./r/n Study the implications of the president's statement./r/n 研究总统声明的含义./r/n

Her attitude was implicit in the answer she gave us./r/n 她在给我们的答复中态度是含蓄的。/r/n The system of rules implicit in a language, viewed as a mechanism for generating all sentences possible in that language./r/n 语法规则隐含在一种语言中的规则体系，被看作在该语言中生成所有可能的语句的机制/r/n
She implored me to do her a favor./r/n 她恳求我帮她这个忙。/r/n I implore you to go now./r/n 我恳求你现在就走吧。/r/n
Don't try to impose your wishes on us./r/n 不要试图把你的愿望强加给我们。/r/n The judge imposed a fine of ten dollars on him./r/n 法官判他罚款10 美元。/r/n
Imposing a lenient sentence for such a serious crime sets a dangerous precedent./r/n 对这样严重的罪行轻判就开了个危险的先例./r/n She'd never think of imposing herself./r/n 她决不想勉强别人接纳自己./r/n
It usually take me more than three weeks to prepare a good impromptu speech./r/n 为了准备一则即席的好讲辞，我通常要三个星期以上。/r/n An impromptu visit broke up the long afternoon./r/n 突然的造访打破了漫长的午后时光/r/n
As we've not got the proper materials, we'll just have to improvise./r/n 我们没有弄到合适的材料, 只好临时凑合了./r/n The pianist forgot his music and had to improvise (the accompaniment)./r/n 弹钢琴的人把乐谱忘了, 只好即兴伴奏./r/n
He bought the house on an impulse./r/n 他凭一时冲动买下了这所房子。/r/n We were seized by a sudden impulse to run./r/n 我们身不由己突然想跑./r/n
The city library was inaugurated by the mayor./r/n 市长主持了市图书馆的落成仪式。/r/n Mr. Clinton was inaugurated as the President of the U.S.A./r/n 克林顿就职美国总统。/r/n
I was incensed at his rudeness./r/n 我对他的粗鲁感到愤怒。/r/n The monk burned a stick of incense in the incense burner./r/n 和尚在香炉里焚上一柱香。/r/n
He hasn't much incentive to work hard./r/n 他没有努力工作的动力。/r/n They don't try very hard if there is no incentive./r/n 没有奖励，他们工作就不太努力。/r/n
Detecting incipient tumors; an incipient personnel problem./r/n 发现早期肿瘤；刚出现的个人问题/r/n
They incited the workers to violence./r/n 他们煽动工人暴动。/r/n The captain was accused of inciting other officers to mutiny./r/n 该上尉被控煽动军官叛变。/r/n
You always follow your own inclination instead of thinking of our feelings./r/n 你总是随心所欲而不考虑我们的情感。/r/n She is not free to follow her own inclination in the matter ofmarriage./r/n 她的婚姻不能自主./r/n

RECORD.meaning: n 斜坡 v．倾斜，爱好
RECORD.lx: I'm inclined to believe him innocent./r/n 我倾向于相信他的无辜。/r/n I'm inclined to tiredness in winter./r/n 我在冬天易于疲劳。/r/n
I'm inclined to believe he's innocent./r/n 我颇以为他是无辜的./r/n We can go for a walk, if you feel so inclined./r/n 你要是愿意的话, 咱们去散散步吧./r/n
The state or quality of being incompatible./r/n 不相容性不相容的状态或性质/r/n The incompatible offices of prosecutor and judge./r/n 检察官和法官的职位不能由一个人兼任/r/n
Completely different; incongruous./r/n 异类的完全不同的；不一致的/r/n The state or quality of being incongruous./r/n 不相称自相矛盾的情况或性质/r/n
The new car design incorporates all the latest safety features./r/n 新的汽车设计具备最新安全措施的一切特点。/r/n We had to incorporate for a company for tax reasons./r/n 鉴于税务原因，我们得组成公司。/r/n
Your salary will be 12000 a year, withannual increments of 500./r/n 你的年薪为12000英镑, 每年增加500英镑./r/n A finite increment in a variable./r/n 变量增量变量的有限增量/r/n
The hunter incurred great danger in killing the wolf./r/n 猎人打狼时承受着巨大的危险。/r/n Incurred substantial losses during the stock market crash./r/n 在股票市场剧跌时蒙受了巨大的物质损失/r/n
He was found in incurable disease./r/n 他被查出得了不治之症。/r/n The child has an incurable habit./r/n 那孩子有个无法矫正的习惯。/r/n
He was indebted to her for nursing him through pneumonia./r/n 他感激她护理好了他的肺炎。/r/n Owing something, such as gratitude, to another; indebted./r/n 受惠的欠别人东西，如人情；感激的/r/n
He has rather indefinite views on the question./r/n 他对该问题的看法颇暧昧。/r/n She'll be away for an indefinite period./r/n 她将离开一段时间，何时回来未定。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj．擦试不掉的，不可磨灭的
RECORD.lx: His concern for the masses made an indelible impression on us./r/n 他对群众的关怀给我们留下不可磨灭的印象。/r/n Act promptly to remove spots from these fabrics. The longer you delay, the more indelible will the mark become./r/n 赶快动手把这些污点从这些织物上擦掉。拖延时间越长，就越难擦掉。/r/n
I will indemnify you for any expenses you may incur on my behalf./r/n 我会偿付你为了我而负担的任何花费。/r/n Everyone should learn to indemnify oneself against harm./r/n 每个人都应当，学会使自己不受伤害。/r/n
There are long indented coastlines in the South Sea./r/n 在南海有犬牙交错的海岸线。/r/n Please indent the first line of each paragraph./r/n 请于每段第一行缩格书写。/r/n
Having indentations that extend about halfway to the center, as in certain leaves./r/n 半裂的有锯齿状边缘的，延伸到距中心一半的距离，例如某些叶片/r/n

RECORD.meaning: adj．不感兴趣的，漠不关心的
RECORD.lx: I was so excited to see snow that I was indifferent to the cold./r/n 我看到雪激动得连寒冷都不在乎了。/r/n She seems indifferent, but deep down she's very pleased./r/n 她貌似无动於衷, 其实心里非常高兴./r/n
The indigenous population was soon displaced by the settlers./r/n 没过多久，外来移民就把当地人赶出了家园。/r/n Indians were the indigenous inhabitants of America./r/n 印第安人是美洲的土著居民。/r/n
He is indignant at the false accusation./r/n 他对被诬告愤愤不平。/r/n People are indignant by their shooting of innocent civilians./r/n 对于他们枪杀无辜平民，人们感到义愤填膺。/r/n
I expressed my indignation at being unfairly dismissed./r/n 我对不公平地被解雇表示愤慨。/r/n They felt strong indignation against their teacher./r/n 他们对他们的老师感到强烈愤慨。/r/n
He was indiscriminate in his choice of friends./r/n 他择友不慎重。/r/n Savage, indiscriminate killing; a massacre./r/n 血洗野蛮的、不加区别的杀戳；大屠杀/r/n
Air, food and water are indispensable to life./r/n 空气，食物，水皆为生命不可缺者。/r/n A good dictionary is indispensable for learning a foreign language./r/n 学习外语离不开好的词典。/r/n
Too much food induces sleepiness./r/n 吃得太饱会引起睡意。/r/n We couldn't induce the old lady to travel by air./r/n 我们无法劝服那老太太乘飞机旅行。/r/n
He hasn't much inducement to study English./r/n 他没有学习英语的兴趣。/r/n They have little inducement to work harder./r/n 没有什么可以使他们更加努力工作。/r/n
The centimeter-gram-second unit of magnetic induction, equal to one maxwell per square centimeter./r/n 高斯电磁感应的厘米－克－秒单位，等于每平方厘米的麦克斯韦尔/r/n
His inept handling of a minor problem turned it into a major crisis./r/n 他处理不善使小事变大了./r/n I've never heard anyone so inept at making speeches./r/n 我从未听说过有这样不会讲话的人./r/n
She lay there inert, I thought she must be dead./r/n 她躺在那儿一动不动，我想她一定是死了。/r/n There is an inert management team in our company./r/n 我们公司的管理阶层死气沉沉。/r/n
The inertia of an entrenched bureaucracy./r/n 平稳的官僚机构内存在的惰性/r/n Because of the sheer inertia of the system many badly needed reform is never introduced./r/n 纯粹是由於制度本身有惰性，很多事急需改革却从未实行。/r/n
Her unconscious looks wander to her husband with infantile dependency./r/n 带著像婴儿般的依赖她不由自主地把目光投向了她的丈夫。/r/n An adult or a young person who behaves in an infantile way./r/n 孩子气的人行为表现出孩子气的成年人或年轻人/r/n
The infantry are defending well./r/n 步兵防守甚佳。/r/n We have less infantry than the enemy./r/n 我们的步兵比敌军少。/r/n
It's a garden infested with weeds./r/n 这是杂草丛生的花园。/r/n There is a warehouse infested by rats./r/n 那有一个大批老鼠出没的仓库。/r/n
Multiply y by infinity./r/n 以无穷数乘y./r/n Can you represent infinity to yourself?/r/n 你能在心想像无限吗？/r/n
He was inflamed with anger./r/n 他满腔怒火。/r/n The setting sun inflames the sky./r/n 落日映红天空。/r/n
Petrol is highly inflammable./r/n 汽油是高度易燃的。/r/n
The government is determined to bring down inflation./r/n 政府决心把通货膨胀率降低。/r/n There appears to be a growing discontent about inflation./r/n 对通货膨胀似乎有一种日渐增长的不满情绪。/r/n
The publishing house infringed his copyright./r/n 出版社侵犯了他的版权。/r/n They infringed on her rights./r/n 他们侵犯了她的权力。/r/n
That law is an out-and-out infringement of our civil rights./r/n （那项法令完全侵犯了我们的公民权。）/r/n
This book shows that he is an ingenious author./r/n 这本书表明他是一个有创造力的作家。/r/n I have an ingenious contrivance to get her to sign the document without reading it./r/n 我有一条不经她过目就签署文件的妙计。/r/n

It took some ingenuity to squeeze all the furniture into the little room./r/n 把全部家具都塞进那个小房间是很费了一番心思的。/r/n Something, such as a toy or game, that tests one's ingenuity./r/n 测智力游戏检验一个人的智力的东西，例如玩具或游戏/r/n

Material, usually of plant or animal origin, that contains or consists of essential body nutrients, such as carbohydrates, fats, proteins, vitamins, or minerals, and is ingested and assimilated by an organism to produce energy, stimulate growth, and maintain life./r/n 食物，粮食通常是源于植物和动物的物质，包含有人体营养物的必不可少物质或由其组成如：糖类、脂肪、蛋白质、维他命和矿物质等，由产生能量、促进发育和维持生命的组织消化和吸收/r/n A small stone found in the stomach of some reptiles, fish, and birds that aids in digestion by helping grind ingested food material./r/n 胃石一种小石头，常发现于某些爬虫、鱼和鸟的胃中，通过帮助碾磨食物来帮助消化/r/n
There is a list of ingredients on the side of the packet./r/n 包装袋的边上印有所含配料表。/r/n A source of nourishment, especially a nourishing ingredient in a food./r/n 营养品，滋养物营养的来源，尤指食物中的营养成分/r/n
He inhaled deeply./r/n 他深深地吸了口气。/r/n Follow me please, inhale! exhale!/r/n 跟我做，吸气!呼气!/r/n
There is an inherent weakness in the design./r/n 这设计本身存在弱点。/r/n Inherent quality of character and temperament./r/n 内在的气质性格、脾气的内在气质/r/n

Shyness inhibited him from speaking./r/n 他因害羞而说不出话来./r/n A symbiotic relationship between organisms in which one species is harmed or inhibited and the other species is unaffected./r/n 片害共栖有机体之间共生的作用关系，一个物种受另一个物种侵害或抑制，而后者不受前者的影响/r/n
It's only the initiative of the investigation./r/n 这仅仅是调查的开始。/r/n The child displayed great initiative in going to fetch the police./r/n 那孩子极为主动地把警察找来。/r/n
Inoculation with a vaccine made from microorganisms obtained from the recipient's own body./r/n 自体接种利用从受体自身获得的微生物制备的疫苗作接种/r/n The material used in an inoculation./r/n 接种体，种菌在接种中用的材料/r/n
I have an insane desire to finish that thing./r/n 我疯狂地渴望去完成那件事。/r/n That person is insane./r/n 那人精神错乱。/r/n
I can't read the inscription on this stone because it's getting dark./r/n 天黑了，我看不见这块石头上的碑文。/r/n Time and weather had long ago effaced the inscription on the monument./r/n 岁月和风雨早已磨掉纪念碑上的铭文。/r/n
She inserted the key into the lock./r/n 她把钥匙插入锁中。/r/n A triangular insert, as in the seam of a garment, for added strength or expansion./r/n 衬料一种三角形的插入物，在衣服的缝合处，为加固或加大衣服而用/r/n
There are many insertions of advertisement in the newspapers./r/n 报纸上有很多插入的广告。/r/n He put a coin into the insertion slot./r/n 他往投币孔投入一枚硬币。/r/n
Sickening or insipid in taste./r/n （味道上）令人作呕的，淡而无味的/r/n Insipid; weak; wishy-washy./r/n 无味的；缺乏生气的；软弱无力的/r/n
His staff is insolent to our manager./r/n 他的员工对我们的经理很无礼。/r/n You insolent young puppy!/r/n 你这个目中无人的小子!/r/n

A debtor that, upon voluntary petition or one invoked by the debtor's creditors, is judged legally insolvent. The debtor's remaining property is then administered for the creditors or is distributed among them./r/n 破产者经自愿请求或被债务人的债权人所请求，在法律上被判定为无偿债能力的债务人。该债务人的剩余财产交由债权人管理或在债权人之间分配/r/n A priority of payment given to one or more creditors by an insolvent debtor./r/n 优先偿付由破产负债人给予一个或多个债权人的优先偿付/r/n
The soldiers lined up for their daily inspection by their officers./r/n 士兵们列队接受长官的日常检阅。/r/n I gave the radio a thorough inspection before buying it./r/n 我把收音机彻底检查了一遍才买了下来。/r/n
His wife was a constant inspiration to him./r/n 他的妻子经常鼓励他。/r/n Many poets and artists have drawn their inspiration from nature./r/n 许多诗人和艺术家从大自然中获得他们的灵感。/r/n
His best music was inspired by the memory of his mother./r/n 他最好的乐曲创作灵感来自怀念他的母亲。/r/n Never before have they been so inspired and so daring as at present./r/n 从来没有看见他们像现在这样精神振奋，意气风发。/r/n

It do provide information of the installation of pop specific software on system other than ad3./r/n 它的确提供除AD3以外系统上POP指定的软件的安装信息。/r/n The price of these product will just compensate the cost of equipment and installation of the line./r/n 你方生产的产品价格将正好补偿我方提供的设备及安装生产线的费用。/r/n
We will pay for houses by monthly installments./r/n 我们将按月分期付款买房。/r/n When will you pay the last installment of the loan?/r/n 你什么时候付清最后一期分期贷款？/r/n
Relief was instantaneous./r/n 痛苦的消除是瞬间的事/r/n Death is instantaneous in a fatal accident./r/n 在致命的事故中，死亡是即刻发生的。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: v．制定，创立（社团，规章）n．学院，协会
RECORD.lx: He graduated from a famous foreign language institute./r/n 他毕业于一所知名的外语学院。/r/n The police instituted an inquiry into the cause of the accident./r/n 警方开始调查事故的原因。/r/n
I was instrumental in catching the criminal./r/n 我曾经协助捉拿这罪犯。/r/n Our artistic director was instrumental in persuading the orchestra to come./r/n 我们的艺术指导帮助请来管弦乐队。/r/n

A bank check drawn on insufficient funds to take advantage of the time interval required for collection./r/n 通融票据利用筹款需要的时间间隔开出不足的资金的银行支票/r/n His children were dwarfed by insufficient food./r/n 他的儿女因营养不良而发育不全。/r/n
It is important to insulate the furnace from any neighbouring woodwork with brick and asbestos./r/n 用砖和石棉把炉子与周围所有的木制品隔开，这很重要。/r/n

Canadian physiologist. He shared a1923 Nobel Prize for the discovery of insulin./r/n 班廷，弗雷德里克·格朗1891－1941加拿大生理学家。因发现了胰岛素而获1923年诺贝尔奖/r/n American-born Canadian physiologist noted for his work on the discovery and application of insulin./r/n 贝斯特，查尔斯·赫伯特1899－1978美裔加拿大生理学家，因其对胰岛素的发现与应用方面的工作而著名/r/n
Few buildings survived the bombing raids intact./r/n 空袭过後幸存的建筑物绝无仅有。/r/n His honor remained intact./r/n 他的名誉完整无损。/r/n

Sound and light are intangible./r/n 声和光是触摸不到的。/r/n It is an intangible asset, and so be not show as an asset in a company's account, unless it figured as part of the purchase price paid when acquiring another company./r/n 商誉是一种无形资产，因为它不作为资产显示在公司的帐目中，除非收购另一公司时将它作为所付购买价格的一部分用数字来表示。/r/n
I integrated your suggestion with my plan./r/n 你的建议使我的计划完整了。/r/n I integrated your suggestions into my plans and this has improved them./r/n 我把你的建议采纳到我的计划中，由此改进了我的计划。/r/n
You can trust him; he is a man of complete integrity./r/n 你可以相信他，他是一个刚正不阿的人。/r/n Our integrity as a nation is threatened by these separatist forces./r/n 我们国家的完整受到了这些分裂主义势力的威胁。/r/n
His theory is not intelligible to us./r/n 他的理论我们无法理解。/r/n Readily comprehended or understood; intelligible./r/n 易懂的易于理解或明白的；易懂的/r/n

There should be a lot more interaction between the social services and local doctors./r/n 社会公益服务机构和当地医生应该加强协作。/r/n The dynamics of bodies moving relative to gases, especially the interaction of moving objects with the atmosphere./r/n 空气动力学相对于气体的物体移动，特别是移动物体与大气相互作用的动力学/r/n
Reporters intercepted him as he tried to leave by the rear entrance./r/n 他想从后门溜走，记者把他截住了。/r/n The police had been intercepting my mails./r/n 警方一直截查我的邮件。/r/n

RECORD.meaning: n．中间时期、过渡时期 adj．暂时的
RECORD.lx: The full report isn't ready yet, but you can see the interim report./r/n 正式报告尚未写好，但你可以先看看这份临时报告。/r/n Acting or done ad interim; temporary./r/n 临时的暂时做事的；临时的/r/n
The interlacing branches on the picture look poetic./r/n 图上交错的树枝看起来很有诗意。/r/n Her mother interlaces her hair with ribbons./r/n 母亲用缎带把她的头发扎起来。/r/n

A fastening device consisting of parallel rows of metal, plastic, or nylon teeth on adjacent edges of an opening that are interlocked by a sliding tab./r/n 拉链由平行的金属、塑料或尼龙的齿状物制成的，在开口临近边缘上被滑动的拉环锁住的紧扣物/r/n An interlocking or entanglement of elements or parts./r/n 连接各因素或部分的连接或纠结/r/n
They disliked each other too much to meet, so they conducted all their business through an intermediary./r/n 他们彼此交恶不愿相见, 有事均通过中间人处理./r/n
They saw the intermittent flashes from a lighthouse./r/n 他们看见了灯塔发出一闪一灭的光。/r/n He has intermittent bursts of interest./r/n 他的兴趣是一阵阵的。/r/n
I worked as an intern in that firm last summer./r/n 去年夏天我在那家商行实习。/r/n
He interposed himself between them to stop them fighting./r/n 他挤进两人中间，阻止他们打架。/r/n `But how do you know that?' he interposed./r/n ｀那麽你是怎麽知道那件事的呢?＇他插嘴问道./r/n
Many would say that crime and poverty interrelate/are interrelated (with one another)./r/n 很多人都说犯罪与贫穷是密切相关的./r/n
Cut to the left at the next intersection./r/n 在下一个十字路口向左急转/r/n The point of intersection of a driveway and a road, especially in a rural area./r/n 交汇口车行道和街道的交叉点，尤指在农村地区/r/n
I was alone during intervening years./r/n 这期间的若干年里，我一直一个人。/r/n I will come if nothing intervenes./r/n 假若没有别的事，我一定来。/r/n
The government's intervention in this dispute will not help./r/n 政府对这场争论的干预不会起作用。/r/n Thanks to your timely intervention./r/n 多亏你及时调停。/r/n

Food passed from the stomach to the small intestine./r/n 食物由胃进入小肠。/r/n The absence or closure of a normal body orifice or tubular passage such as the anus, intestine, or external ear canal./r/n （先天性）闭锁，无孔正常的身体孔或管道，如肛门、肠或外耳道的缺失或闭合/r/n

Intestinal obstruction causing colic, vomiting, and constipation./r/n 肠阻塞造成腹绞痛、呕吐和便秘的肠道堵塞/r/n An agent that destroys or causes the expulsion of parasitic intestinal worms./r/n 驱肠虫剂，灭肠虫剂可消灭或驱除肠内寄生虫的药物/r/n
She is my intimate friend./r/n 她是我的密友。/r/n He should listen to his intimate feelings./r/n 人应当倾听自己的内心感觉。/r/n
She is my intimate friend./r/n 她是我的密友。/r/n He should listen to his intimate feelings./r/n 人应当倾听自己的内心感觉。/r/n
The first strike capacity is intended mainly to intimidate adversary./r/n 第一次攻击的武力主要是用来吓阻敌方的。/r/n
He was fined for driving while intoxicated./r/n 他因醉酒开车被罚款。/r/n The businessman was intoxicated by his success./r/n 这个商人因为成功而狂喜。/r/n
I was unable to find out the intricate windings of the labyrinth./r/n 我无法找出迷宫中扑朔迷离的路线。/r/n This is a novel with an intricate plot./r/n 这是一本情节错综复杂的小说。/r/n
She was intriguing with her sister against her mother./r/n 她和妹妹串通捣鬼和母亲作对。/r/n Some of the members had been intriguing to get the secretary dismissed./r/n 有些人一直密谋想让老板把秘书解雇。/r/n

Existing as an essential constituent or characteristic; intrinsic./r/n 固有的作为一种基本成份或典型特征而存在的；内在的/r/n Something of no intrinsic remedial value that is used to appease or reassure another./r/n 安慰的话，宽心的话某些没有内在补救作用的东西，仅仅用来安慰他人/r/n
I don't want to intrude on you if you are very busy./r/n 如果你很忙的话，我就不打扰了。/r/n A translator shouldn't intrude his own opinions into what he's translating./r/n 译者不应该擅自把自己的意思加进译文中。/r/n
When the river burst its banks the fields were inundated./r/n 河岸决堤後, 田地遭洪水淹没./r/n We were inundated with enquiries./r/n 查询的人很多, 我们应接不暇./r/n

He never fully recovered, and had to spend the rest of his life as an invalid./r/n 他没能完全康复，于是不得不成了一名残疾者度过余生。/r/n This ticket has passed its expiration date, and so it is now invalid./r/n 这张票已过了有效期，现在作废了。/r/n
The making of false statements could result in the invalidation of the contract./r/n 提供虚假资料可能导致合同失效./r/n
